 10284                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10285                                  
 10286                                  ; 18/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
 10287                                  ; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.22 IO.SYS)
 10288                                  ; 15/10/2022 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS) -Retro DOS v4 2022- (MSDOS 5.0-6.21)
 10289                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
 10290                                  ; 03/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 10291                                  ; (19/03/2018 - Retro DOS v2.0)
 10292                                  
 10293                                  ; domini **********************************************************************
 10294                                  ;
 10295                                  ;mini disk initialization routine. called right after dohard
 10296                                  ;modified for >2 hardfile support
 10297                                  ;
 10298                                  ; **cs=ds=es=datagrp
 10299                                  ;
 10300                                  ; **domini will search for every extended partition in the system, and
 10301                                  ;   initialize it.
 10302                                  ;
 10303                                  ; **bdsm stands for bds table for mini disk and located right after the label
 10304                                  ;   end96tpi. end_of_bdsm will have the offset value of the ending
 10305                                  ;   address of bdsm table.
 10306                                  ;
 10307                                  ; **bdsm is the same as usual bds structure except that tim_lo, tim_hi entries
 10308                                  ;   are overlapped and used to identify mini disk and the number of hidden_trks.
 10309                                  ;   right now, they are called as ismini, hidden_trks respectively.
 10310                                  ;
 10311                                  ; **domini will use the same routine in sethard routine after label set2 to
 10312                                  ;   save coding.
 10313                                  ;
 10314                                  ; **drvmax determined in dohard routine will be used for the next
 10315                                  ;   available logical mini disk drive number.
 10316                                  ;
 10317                                  ; input: drvmax, dskdrvs
 10318                                  ;
 10319                                  ; output: minidisk installed. bdsm table established and installed to bds.
 10320                                  ;	  end_of_bdsm - ending offset address of bdsm.
 10321                                  ;
 10322                                  ; called modules:
 10323                                  ;		  getboot
 10324                                  ;		  find_mini_partition (new), xinstall_bds (new), M038
 10325                                  ;
 10326                                  ;		  setmini (new, it will use set2 routine)
 10327                                  ;
 10328                                  ; variables used: end_of_bdsm
 10329                                  ;		  rom_minidisk_num
 10330                                  ;		  mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
 10331                                  ;		  BDS_STRUC, start_bds
 10332                                  ;
 10333                                  ;******************************************************************************
 10334                                  
 10335                                  		; 18/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 IO.SYS/IBMBIO.COM
 10336                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:2B10h)
 10337                                  
 10338                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10339                                  domini:
 10340 00002831 8A36[5D1A]              		mov	dh, [hnum]	; get number of hardfiles
 10341                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10342 00002835 20F6                    		and	dh, dh
 10343                                  		;cmp	dh, 0
 10344 00002837 743C                    		jz	short dominiret	; no hard file?	then exit.
 10345 00002839 B280                    		mov	dl, 80h		; start	with hardfile 80h
 10346                                  domini_loop:
 10347                                  		; 18/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0
 10348 0000283B 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax ; 0
 10349                                  		; ds = cs
 10350                                  		;mov	[cs:ep_start_sector], ax
 10351                                  		;mov	[cs:ep_start_sector+2], ax
 10352                                  		;mov	[cs:ep_hidden_secs], ax
 10353                                  		;mov	[cs:ep_hidden_secs+2], ax
 10354 0000283D A3[8923]                		mov	[ep_start_sector], ax
 10355 00002840 A3[8B23]                		mov	[ep_start_sector+2], ax
 10356 00002843 A3[8D23]                		mov	[ep_hidden_secs], ax
 10357 00002846 A3[8F23]                		mov	[ep_hidden_secs+2], ax
 10358                                  		;
 10359 00002849 52                      		push	dx
 10360 0000284A 8816[5C1A]              		mov	[rom_minidisk_num], dl
 10361 0000284E B408                    		mov	ah, 8
 10362 00002850 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	GET CURRENT DRIVE PARAMETERS (XT,AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
 10363                                  					; DL = drive number
 10364                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status code, BL	= drive	type
 10365                                  					; DL = number of consecutive drives
 10366                                  					; DH = maximum value for head number, ES:DI -> drive parameter
 10367                                  		
 10368                                  		; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 10369                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:2B36h
 10370                                  		;inc	dh
 10371                                  		;xor	ax, ax
 10372                                  		;mov	al, dh
 10373 00002852 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax
 10374 00002854 88F0                    		mov	al, dh	; <= 255
 10375 00002856 40                      		inc	ax	; (0FFh -> 100h)
 10376 00002857 A3[621A]                		mov	[mini_hdlim], ax ; # of heads
 10377                                  		;and	cl, 3Fh
 10378                                  		;mov	al, cl
 10379                                  		; 08/08/2023
 10380 0000285A 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
 10381 0000285C 83E03F                  		and	ax, 3Fh
 10382 0000285F A3[641A]                		mov	[mini_seclim], ax ; # of sectors/track
 10383                                  		
 10384                                  		; 18/12/2023
 10385                                  		;push	es ; * ; not necessary
 10386 00002862 8A16[5C1A]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
 10387 00002866 E868FA                  		call	getboot		; read master boot record into
 10388                                  					; initbootsegment:bootbias
 10389 00002869 7203                    		jc	short domininext
 10390 0000286B E80800                  		call	find_mini_partition
 10391                                  domininext:
 10392                                  		;pop	es ; *
 10393 0000286E 5A                      		pop	dx
 10394 0000286F FEC2                    		inc	dl		; next hard file
 10395 00002871 FECE                    		dec	dh
 10396 00002873 75C6                    		jnz	short domini_loop
 10397                                  dominiret:
 10398 00002875 C3                      		retn

 10400                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10401                                  
 10402                                  ; 15/10/2022 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 10403                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
 10404                                  
 10405                                  ;find_mini_partition tries to find every extended partition on a disk.
 10406                                  ;at entry:	di -> bdsm entry
 10407                                  ;		es:bx -> 07c0:bootbias - master boot record
 10408                                  ;		rom_minidisk_num - rom drive number
 10409                                  ;		drvmax - logical drive number
 10410                                  ;		mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
 10411                                  ;
 10412                                  ;called routine: setmini which uses set2 (in sethard routine)
 10413                                  ;variables & equates used from original bios - flags, fnon_removable, fbigfat
 10414                                  
 10415                                  		; 19/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 
 10416                                  		;	(Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
 10417                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSADATA:2BFCh)
 10418                                  
 10419                                  find_mini_partition:	
 10420 00002876 81C3C201                		add	bx, 1C2h	; bx ->	file system id
 10421

 10423                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM
 10424                                  		;mov	word [ld_p_number], 26
 10425                                  fmpnext:
 10426                                  		;add	word [ld_p_number], 16
 10427                                  		;cmp	word [ld_p_number], 4122
 10428                                  		;		; 64 logical disk partitions (64 EBRs)
 10429                                  		;		; (64*4 = 256 pte's, 256*16 = 4096, + 26 = 4122)
 10430                                  		;jg	short fmpnextfound
 10431

 10433 0000287E 7410                    		je	short fmpgot ; Extended DOS CHS
 10434

 10751                                  ;	link next bds (at ds:di) into the chain. assume that the
 10752                                  ;	  chain is entirely within ds == datagrp. also update drvmax,
 10753                                  ;	  dskdrv_table, and end_of_bdss.

 10755                                  		; 19/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0
 10756                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:2CE1h)
 10757                                  xinstall_bds:

 10759 000029D4 53                      		push	bx
 10760 000029D5 8B36[1901]              		mov	si, [start_bds]	; get first bds
 10761                                  xinstall_bds_1:

 10763 000029DC 7404                    		jz	short xinstall_bds_2 ;	skip ahead if so
 10764                                  		;mov	si, [si+BDS.link]
 10765 000029DE 8B34                    		mov	si, [si]	; chain	through	list
 10766 000029E0 EBF7                    		jmp	short xinstall_bds_1
 10767                                  
 10768                                  xinstall_bds_2:
 10769                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link], di
 10770 000029E2 893C                    		mov	[si], di

 10772 000029E4 8C5C02                  		mov	[si+2], ds
 10773                                  		;mov	word [di+BDS.link], -1
 10774 000029E7 C705FFFF                		mov	word [di], 0FFFFh ; make sure it is a null ptr.
 10775                                  		;mov	[di+BDS.link+2], ds
 10776 000029EB 8C5D02                  		mov	[di+2], ds ; might as well plug segment
 10777                                  		; 20/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 10778                                  		;lea	bx, [di+BDS.BPB]
 10779 000029EE 8D5D06                  		lea	bx, [di+6]
 10780 000029F1 8B36[5E1A]              		mov	si, [last_dskdrv_table]
 10781 000029F5 891C                    		mov	[si], bx
 10782 000029F7 8306[5E1A]02            		add	word [last_dskdrv_table], 2
 10783 000029FC FE06[7500]              		inc	byte [drvmax]
 10784                                  		;add	word [end_of_bdss], 100 ; BDS.size = 100

 10787 00002A06 5B                      		pop	bx
 10788 00002A07 5E                      		pop	si

 10799                                  cmos_clock_read:
 10800 00002A09 50                      		push	ax
 10801 00002A0A 51                      		push	cx
 10802 00002A0B 52                      		push	dx
 10803 00002A0C 55                      		push	bp
 10804 00002A0D 31ED                    		xor	bp, bp
 10805                                  loop_clock:
 10806 00002A0F 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx
 10807 00002A11 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 10808 00002A13 B402                    		mov	ah, 2
 10809 00002A15 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
 10810                                  					; Return: CH = hours in	BCD
 10811                                  					; CL = minutes in BCD
 10812                                  					; DH = seconds in BCD
 10813                                  		; 19/12/2023
 10814                                  		;cmp	cx, 0
 10815 00002A17 21C9                    		and	cx, cx
 10816 00002A19 750F                    		jnz	short clock_present
 10817                                  		;cmp	dx, 0
 10818 00002A1B 09D2                    		or	dx, dx
 10819 00002A1D 750B                    		jnz	short clock_present
 10820                                  		;cmp	bp, 1		; read again after a slight delay, in case clock
 10821                                  		;je	short no_readdate ; was	at zero	setting.
 10822 00002A1F 21ED                    		and	bp, bp
 10823 00002A21 751A                    		jnz	short no_readdate
 10824 00002A23 45                      		inc	bp		; only perform delay once.
 10825                                  		;mov	cx, 4000h	; 16384
 10826                                  		; 19/12/2023
 10827 00002A24 B540                    		mov	ch, 40h ; cx = 4000h ; 16384
 10828                                  delay:					
 10829 00002A26 E2FE                    		loop	delay
 10830 00002A28 EBE5                    		jmp	short loop_clock
 10831                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10832                                  
 10833                                  clock_present:
 10834                                  		;mov	byte [cs:havecmosclock], 1 ; set the flag for cmos clock
 10835                                  		; 19/12/2023
 10836                                  		; ds = cs
 10837 00002A2A C606[8C04]01            		mov	byte [havecmosclock], 1 ; set the flag for cmos clock
 10838                                  		
 10839 00002A2F E81000                  		call	cmosck		; reset	cmos clock rate	that may be
 10840                                  					; possibly destroyed by	cp dos and
 10841                                  					; post routine did not restore that.
 10842 00002A32 56                      		push	si
 10843 00002A33 E835EE                  		call	read_real_date	; read real-time clock for date
 10844 00002A36 FA                      		cli
 10845                                  		;mov	ds:daycnt, si	; set system date
 10846 00002A37 8936[8904]              		mov	[daycnt], si
 10847 00002A3B FB                      		sti
 10848 00002A3C 5E                      		pop	si
 10849                                  no_readdate:
 10850 00002A3D 5D                      		pop	bp
 10851 00002A3E 5A                      		pop	dx
 10852 00002A3F 59                      		pop	cx
 10853 00002A40 58                      		pop	ax
 10854                                  cmosck9:	; 19/12/2023
 10855 00002A41 C3                      		retn
 10856                                  
 10857                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10858                                  
 10859                                  ; the following code is written by jack gulley in engineering group.
 10860                                  ; cp dos (CP/DOS, OS/2) is changing cmos clock rate for its own purposes
 10861                                  ; and if the use cold boot the system to use pc dos while running cp dos,
 10862                                  ; the cmos clock rate are still slow which slow down disk operations
 10863                                  ; of pc dos which uses cmos clock. pc dos is put this code in msinit
 10864                                  ; to fix this problem at the request of cp dos.
 10865                                  ;
 10866                                  ; the program is modified to be run on msinit. equates are defined
 10867                                  ; in cmosequ.inc. this program will be called by cmos_clock_read procedure.
 10868                                  ;
 10869                                  ;  the following code cmosck is used to insure that the cmos has not
 10870                                  ;	had its rate controls left in an invalid state on older at's.
 10871                                  ;
 10872                                  ;	it checks for an at model byte "fc" with a submodel type of
 10873                                  ;	00, 01, 02, 03 or 06 and resets the periodic interrupt rate
 10874                                  ;	bits in case post has not done it. this initialization routine
 10875                                  ;	is only needed once when dos loads. it should be run as soon
 10876                                  ;	as possible to prevent slow diskette access.
 10877                                  ;
 10878                                  ;	this code exposes one to dos clearing cmos setup done by a
 10879                                  ;	resident program that hides and re-boots the system.
 10880                                  
 10881                                  cmosck:					; check and reset rtc rate bits
 10882                                  
 10883                                  ;model byte and submodel byte were already determined in msinit.
 10884                                  
 10885                                  	; 16/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 10886                                  	; 19/03/2018 (Model: 0FCh, Sub Model: 01h, REF: AMIBIOS Prog. Guide)
 10887                                  
 10888                                  	; 19/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0
 10889                                  	
 10890                                  		; 19/12/2023
 10891                                  		; ds = cs
 10892                                  		;push	ax ; not necessary ; 19/12/2023
 10893                                  		;
 10894 00002A42 803E[AF05]FC            		cmp	byte [model_byte], 0FCh
 10895                                  		;cmp	byte [cs:model_byte], 0FCh
 10896 00002A47 75F8                    		jnz	short cmosck9	; Exit if not an AT model
 10897 00002A49 2E803E[B005]06          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 6
 10898                                  		;cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 6
 10899                                  					; Is it 06 for the industral AT ?
 10900 00002A4F 7407                    		jz	short cmosck4	; Go reset CMOS periodic rate if 06
 10901 00002A51 803E[B005]04            		cmp	byte [secondary_model_byte], 4
 10902                                  		;cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 4
 10903                                  					; Is it 00, 01, 02, or 03 ?
 10904 00002A56 73E9                    		jnb	short cmosck9	; EXIT if problem fixed by POST
 10905                                  					; Also,Secondary_model_byte = 0
 10906                                  					;   when AH=0C0h, int 15h failed.
 10907                                  					;	RESET THE CMOS PERIODIC RATE
 10908                                  					;  Model=FC submodel=00,01,02,03 or 06
 10909                                  cmosck4:
 10910 00002A58 B08A                    		mov	al, 8Ah		; cmos_reg_a|nmi
 10911                                  					; NMI disabled on return
 10912 00002A5A B426                    		mov	ah, 26h		; 00100110b
 10913                                  					; Set divider & rate selection
 10914 00002A5C E80B00                  		call	cmos_write
 10915 00002A5F B08B                    		mov	al, 8Bh		; cmos_reg_b|nmi
 10916                                  					; NMI disabled on return
 10917 00002A61 E82000                  		call	cmos_read
 10918 00002A64 2407                    		and	al, 7		; 00000111b
 10919                                  					; clear SET,PIE,AIE,UIE,SQWE
 10920 00002A66 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
 10921 00002A68 B00B                    		mov	al, 0Bh		; cmos_reg_b
 10922                                  					; NMI enabled on return
 10923                                  		; 19/12/2023
 10924                                  		;call	cmos_write
 10925                                  ;cmosck9:
 10926                                  		;pop	ax ; 19/12/2023
 10927                                  		;retn
 10928                                  
 10929                                  		; 19/12/2023
 10930                                  		;jmp	short cmos_write
 10931                                  
 10932                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10933                                  
 10934                                  ;--- cmos_write ----------------------------------------------------------------
 10935                                  ;		write byte to cmos system clock configuration table	       :
 10936                                  ;									       :
 10937                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be written to			       :
 10938                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
 10939                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to write		       :
 10940                                  ;	 (ah)=	new value to be placed in the addressed table location	       :
 10941                                  ;									       :
 10942                                  ; output:	value in (ah) placed in location (al) with nmi left disabled   :
 10943                                  ;		if bit 7 of (al) is on. during the cmos update both nmi and    :
 10944                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
 10945                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
 10946                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
 10947                                  ;		only the cmos location and the nmi state is changed.	       :
 10948                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10949                                  
 10950                                  cmos_write:				; write (ah) to location (al)
 10951 00002A6A 9C                      		pushf			;
 10952 00002A6B 50                      		push	ax		; save work register values
 10953 00002A6C FA                      		cli
 10954 00002A6D 50                      		push	ax		; save user nmi	state
 10955 00002A6E 0C80                    		or	al, 80h		; disable nmi for us
 10956 00002A70 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
 10957                                  					; RTC Seconds
 10958 00002A72 90                      		nop
 10959 00002A73 88E0                    		mov	al, ah
 10960 00002A75 E671                    		out	71h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
 10961 00002A77 58                      		pop	ax		; get user nmi
 10962 00002A78 2480                    		and	al, 80h
 10963 00002A7A 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
 10964 00002A7C E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
 10965                                  					; RTC Seconds
 10966 00002A7E 90                      		nop
 10967 00002A7F E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
 10968 00002A81 58                      		pop	ax		; restore work registers
 10969                                  
 10970                                  		; 19/12/2023
 10971                                  		;push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
 10972                                  		;call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
 10973                                  		;retn
 10974 00002A82 EB18                    		jmp	short cmos_rw_popf
 10975                                  
 10976                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10977                                  
 10978                                  ;--- CMOS_READ -----------------------------------------------------------------
 10979                                  ;		read byte from cmos system clock configuration table	       :
 10980                                  ;									       :
 10981                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be read				       :
 10982                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
 10983                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to read		       :
 10984                                  ;									       :
 10985                                  ; output: (al)	value at location (al) moved into (al). if bit 7 of (al) was   :
 10986                                  ;		on then nmi left disabled. during the cmos read both nmi and   :
 10987                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
 10988                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
 10989                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
 10990                                  ;		only the (al) register and the nmi state is changed.	       :
 10991                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10992                                  
 10993                                  cmos_read:				; read location (al) into (al)
 10994 00002A84 9C                      		pushf
 10995 00002A85 FA                      		cli
 10996 00002A86 53                      		push	bx
 10997                                  		;push	ax ; *		; AL = cmos table address to be read
 10998                                  		; 19/12/2023
 10999 00002A87 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax ; * ; input
 11000 00002A89 0C80                    		or	al, 80h
 11001 00002A8B E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
 11002                                  					; RTC Seconds
 11003 00002A8D 90                      		nop			; (undocumented delay needed)
 11004 00002A8E E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
 11005                                  		
 11006                                  		;mov	bx, ax ; output
 11007                                  		;pop	ax ; * ; input
 11008                                  
 11009                                  		; 19/12/2023
 11010                                  		; al = output, bl = input
 11011 00002A90 93                      		xchg	ax, bx ; *
 11012                                  		; bl = output, al = input
 11013                                  	
 11014 00002A91 2480                    		and	al, 80h
 11015 00002A93 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
 11016 00002A95 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
 11017                                  					; RTC Seconds
 11018 00002A97 90                      		nop
 11019 00002A98 E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
 11020                                  		;mov	ax, bx ; * ; output
 11021                                  		; 19/12/2023
 11022 00002A9A 93                      		xchg	ax, bx
 11023 00002A9B 5B                      		pop	bx
 11024                                  
 11025                                  		; 19/12/2023
 11026                                  cmos_rw_popf:
 11027 00002A9C 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
 11028 00002A9D E80100                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
 11029 00002AA0 C3                      		retn			; return with flags restored
 11030                                  
 11031                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11032                                  
 11033                                  cmos_popf:				
 11034 00002AA1 CF                      		iret			; popf for level b- parts
 11035                                  					; return far and restore flags

 11044                                  ;
 11045                                  ; (For Retro DOS, 'IO.SYS' and 'MSDOS.SYS' are already loaded together
 11046                                  ;  at once -as single kernel file- by the Retro DOS boot sector code.

 11053                                  ;ClusterH:	dw 0  ; 20/12/2023
 11054                                  
 11055                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11056                                  
 11057                                  ; GetClus, read in a cluster at a specified address
 11058                                  ;
 11059                                  ;  bx = cluster to read
 11060                                  ;  cx = sectors per cluster
 11061                                  ;  es:di = load location
 11062                                  
 11063                                  ; 17/10/2022
 11064                                  ;DISKRD equ diskrd - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h	; (8E5h for MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 11065                                  ; 09/12/2022
 11066                                  DISKRD equ diskrd
 11067                                  
 11068                                  		; 29/12/2023
 11069                                  		; 20/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0
 11070                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:2DC4h)
 11071                                  
 11072                                  		; si:bx = (32 bit) cluster to read
 11073                                  		; cx = sectors per cluster
 11074                                  		; es:di = load location
 11075                                  
 11076                                  		; 17/10/2022
 11077                                  getclus:
 11078                                  		; 12/12/2023
 11079                                  		; ds = cs
 11080                                  		
 11081 00002AA2 51                      		push	cx ; 1*
 11082 00002AA3 57                      		push	di ; 2*
 11083                                  		;mov	[cs:doscnt], cx
 11084 00002AA4 890E[001A]              		mov	[doscnt], cx ; 12/12/2023
 11085                                  
 11086                                  		; 20/12/2023
 11087                                  		;;mov	[cs:ClusterH], si ; high word of cluster number
 11088                                  		;mov	[ClusterH], si ; high word of cluster number
 11089 00002AA8 89F5                    		mov	bp, si
 11090                                  
 11091 00002AAA 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
 11092                                  
 11093                                  		;dec	ax
 11094                                  		;dec	ax
 11095                                  		; 20/12/2023
 11096 00002AAC 83E802                  		sub	ax, 2
 11097                                  
 11098                                  		;;sbb	[cs:ClusterH], 0
 11099                                  		;sbb	[ClusterH], 0
 11100 00002AAF 83DD00                  		sbb	bp, 0		
 11101                                  
 11102                                  		; 20/12/2023
 11103                                  		;;xchg	ax, [cs:ClusterH]
 11104                                  		;xchg	ax, [ClusterH]
 11105 00002AB2 95                      		xchg	ax, bp
 11106                                  
 11107 00002AB3 F7E1                    		mul	cx
 11108                                  
 11109                                  		;;xchg	ax, [cs:ClusterH]
 11110                                  		;xchg	ax, [ClusterH]
 11111 00002AB5 95                      		xchg	ax, bp ; (+)
 11112                                  		;
 11113 00002AB6 F7E1                    		mul	cx		;; convert to logical sector
 11114                                  					;; dx:ax = matching logical sector number
 11115                                  					;;	  starting from the data sector
 11116                                  		;;add	ax, [cs:bios_l]
 11117                                  		;;adc	dx, [cs:bios_h]	; dx:ax	= first	logical	sector to read
 11118                                  		; 12/12/2023
 11119                                  		;add	ax, [bios_l]
 11120                                  		;adc	dx, [bios_h]	; dx:ax	= first	logical	sector to read
 11121                                  
 11122                                  		; 20/12/2023
 11123                                  		;;add	dx, [cs:ClusterH]
 11124                                  		;add	ax, [cs:First_Data_Sector]
 11125                                  		;adc	dx, [cs:First_Data_Sector+2]
 11126 00002AB8 01EA                    		add	dx, bp ; (+)
 11127                                  		;add	dx, [ClusterH]	; convert to logical sector
 11128                                  					; dx:ax	= matching logical sector number
 11129                                  					;	  starting from the data sector
 11130 00002ABA 0306[FC19]              		add	ax, [First_Data_Sector]
 11131 00002ABE 1316[FE19]              		adc	dx, [First_Data_Sector+2]
 11132                                  					; dx:ax = first logical sector to read
 11133                                  unpack:
 11134                                  		; 20/12/2023
 11135 00002AC2 1E                      		push	ds ; 3* ; ds = cs ; 12/12/2023
 11136 00002AC3 52                      		push	dx ; 4* ; * ; 12/12/2023
 11137 00002AC4 50                      		push	ax ; 5*
 11138                                  		; 29/12/2023
 11139 00002AC5 56                      		push	si ; 6* 
 11140 00002AC6 53                      		push	bx ; 7*
 11141                                  
 11142                                  		;;mov	si, [cs:fatloc]
 11143                                  		;mov	si, [fatloc] ; 12/12/2023
 11144                                  		;mov	ds, si
 11145                                  		; 20/12/2023
 11146                                  		;mov	ax, [fatloc]
 11147                                  		;mov	ds, ax
 11148 00002AC7 53                      		push	bx ; 8*
 11149 00002AC8 FF36[021A]              		push	word [fatloc] ; 9*
 11150                                  
 11151                                  		;test	byte [cs:fbigfat], 20h
 11152 00002ACC F606[061A]20            		test	byte [fbigfat], 20h	; fbigbig FAT32 ?
 11153 00002AD1 1F                      		pop	ds ; 9* ; ds = [fatloc]
 11154 00002AD2 7415                    		jz      short not_32bit_cluster ; no
 11155                                  unpack32:
 11156                                  		;push	dx
 11157 00002AD4 89F2                    		mov	dx, si
 11158                                  		;mov	si, bx
 11159 00002AD6 5E                      		pop	si ; 8* ; si = bx
 11160 00002AD7 01F6                    		add	si, si
 11161 00002AD9 11D2                    		adc	dx, dx
 11162 00002ADB 01F6                    		add	si, si
 11163 00002ADD 11D2                    		adc	dx, dx 
 11164                                  			; dx:si = 4*(si:bx) ; clust num offset from FAT entry 0
 11165 00002ADF E89700                  		call	get_fat_sector
 11166 00002AE2 8B7702                  		mov	si, [bx+2]	; high word of the FAT32 cluster number
 11167 00002AE5 8B1F                    		mov	bx, [bx]	; low word of the FAT32 cluster number
 11168                                  		;pop	dx
 11169 00002AE7 EB45                    		jmp	short getcl1
 11170                                  
 11171                                  not_32bit_cluster:
 11172                                  		;mov	si, bx		; next cluster
 11173 00002AE9 5E                      		pop	si ; 8* ; si = bx
 11174 00002AEA 2EF606[061A]40          		test	byte [cs:fbigfat], 40h	; fbig
 11175                                  					; 16 bit fat?
 11176 00002AF0 752F                    		jnz	short unpack16	; yes
 11177                                  unpack12:
 11178 00002AF2 D1EE                    		shr	si, 1		; 12 bit fat. si = si/2
 11179                                  					; si = clus + clus/2
 11180 00002AF4 01DE                    		add	si, bx		;
 11181                                  					; (si =	byte offset of the cluster in the FAT)
 11182                                  		;push	dx ; 12/12/2023
 11183 00002AF6 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 11184                                  		; 12/12/2023
 11185                                  		; ds = FAT buffer segment
 11186 00002AF8 E87E00                  		call	get_fat_sector
 11187                                  		;pop	dx ; 12/12/2023
 11188                                  
 11189 00002AFB 8B07                    		mov	ax, [bx]	; save it into ax
 11190 00002AFD 750C                    		jnz	short even_odd	; if not a splitted fat, check even-odd.
 11191                                  		; 25/06/2023
 11192                                  		;mov	al, [bx]	; splitted fat
 11193                                  		
 11194                                  		; 12/12/2023
 11195                                  		;mov	[cs:temp_cluster], al
 11196 00002AFF 50                      		push	ax ; **	; al = low 8 bits of 12 bits cluster number
 11197                                  
 11198 00002B00 46                       		inc	si		; (next	byte)
 11199                                  
 11200                                  		;push	dx ; 12/12/2023
 11201 00002B01 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 11202 00002B03 E87300                  		call	get_fat_sector
 11203                                  		;pop	dx ; 12/12/2023
 11204                                  
 11205                                  		;mov	al, ds:0
 11206                                  		; 12/12/2023
 11207                                  		; ds = FAT buffer segment
 11208                                  		;mov	al, [0] ; 19/10/2022
 11209                                  		;mov	[cs:temp_cluster+1], al
 11210                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:temp_cluster]
 11211                                  		; 12/12/2023
 11212                                  		;mov	al, [cs:temp_cluster]
 11213 00002B06 58                      		pop	ax  ; ** ; al = low 8 bits of 12 bits cluster number
 11214 00002B07 8A260000                		mov	ah, [0] ; high 4 bits (bits 7 to 11) of 12 bits cluster num
 11215                                  even_odd:
 11216                                  		; 29/12/2023
 11217 00002B0B 5B                      		pop	bx ; 7*		; restore old fat entry	value
 11218 00002B0C 53                      		push	bx		; save it right	away.
 11219 00002B0D D1EB                    		shr	bx, 1		; was it even or odd?
 11220 00002B0F 7308                    		jnc	short havclus	; it was even.
 11221 00002B11 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1		; odd. massage fat value and keep
 11222                                  					; the highest 12 bits.
 11223 00002B13 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
 11224 00002B15 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
 11225 00002B17 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
 11226                                  havclus:
 11227 00002B19 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax		; now bx = new fat entry.
 11228 00002B1B 81E3FF0F                		and	bx, 0FFFh	; keep low 12 bits.
 11229 00002B1F EB0B                    		jmp	short unpackx
 11230                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11231                                  
 11232                                  unpack16:
 11233                                  		;push	dx	; 12/12/2023
 11234 00002B21 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx ; 0
 11235 00002B23 D1E6                    		shl	si, 1		; extend to 32 bit offset
 11236                                  		;adc	dx, 0
 11237                                  		; 12/12/2023
 11238 00002B25 D1D2                    		rcl	dx, 1
 11239                                  
 11240                                  		; 12/12/2023
 11241                                  		; ds = FAT buffer segment
 11242 00002B27 E84F00                  		call	get_fat_sector
 11243                                  		;pop	dx	; 12/12/2023
 11244 00002B2A 8B1F                    		mov	bx, [bx]	;
 11245                                  					; bx = new fat entry.
 11246                                  unpackx:
 11247                                  		; 20/12/2023
 11248 00002B2C 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; high word of cluster number = 0
 11249                                  					; (FAT12 or FAT16)
 11250                                  getcl1:
 11251                                  		; 29/12/2023
 11252 00002B2E 58                      		pop	ax	; 7* - cluster number lw
 11253                                  		;pop	word [cs:ClusterH]
 11254 00002B2F 5A                      		pop	dx	; 6* - cluster number hw
 11255                                  
 11256                                  		; 20/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
 11257                                  		; (this is a fast kernel loading method by the MSDOS programmer)
 11258                                  		; ((consequtive clusters --> consequtive sectors))
 11259                                  
 11260 00002B30 29D8                    		sub	ax, bx	; previous - current (or current - new)	
 11261                                  		;sbb	[cs:ClusterH], si
 11262 00002B32 19F2                    		sbb	dx, si
 11263                                  		;;cmp	[cs:ClusterH], -1 ; one apart? (current = previous+1)
 11264                                  		;cmp	dx, -1
 11265                                  		; 29/12/2023
 11266 00002B34 42                      		inc	dx ; -1 -> 0
 11267 00002B35 7501                    		jnz	short not_consequental
 11268                                  		;cmp	ax, -1		; 0FFFFh ; is [ClusterH]:ax = -1 ?
 11269 00002B37 40                      		inc	ax ; -1 -> 0
 11270                                  not_consequental:
 11271 00002B38 58                      		pop	ax ; 5* 	; restore logical sector (low)
 11272 00002B39 5A                      		pop	dx ; 4* ; * ; 12/12/2023
 11273 00002B3A 1F                      		pop	ds ; 3*
 11274                                  
 11275                                  		;; 12/12/2023
 11276                                  		;; (this is a fast kernel loading method by the MSDOS programmer)
 11277                                  		;; ((consequtive clusters --> consequtive sectors))
 11278                                  		;; ds = cs
 11279                                  		;sub	si, bx
 11280                                  		;cmp	si, -1		; one apart? (consequtive?)
 11281                                  		;			; (current = previous+1)
 11282                                  
 11283 00002B3B 7507                    		jnz	short getcl2	; no, read [doscnt] sectors 
 11284                                  
 11285                                  		;add	[cs:doscnt], cx ; (cx = sectors per cluster)
 11286 00002B3D 010E[001A]              		add	[doscnt], cx ; 12/12/2023 ; add to read count
 11287 00002B41 E97EFF                  		jmp	unpack
 11288                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11289                                  
 11290                                  getcl2:
 11291 00002B44 56                      		push	si ; 20/12/2023
 11292 00002B45 53                      		push	bx	
 11293                                  		; bx = low word of the new cluster number
 11294                                  		; 20/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 (32 bit cluster numbers)
 11295                                  		; si = high word of the new cluster number
 11296 00002B46 52                      		push	dx		; sector to read (high word)
 11297 00002B47 50                      		push	ax		; sector to read (low word)
 11298                                  		
 11299                                  		; 12/12/2023
 11300                                  		; ds = cs
 11301                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive and	fat spec
 11302                                  		;mov	cx, [cs:doscnt]
 11303 00002B48 A1[FA19]                		mov	ax, [drvfat]	; get drive and	fat spec
 11304                                  
 11305                                  		;;;
 11306                                  		; 20/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
 11307                                  		;
 11308                                  		; dma and segment (64K boundary) overrun precaution
 11309                                  		; (sector count will be decreased if it is required)
 11310 00002B4B 89F9                     		mov	cx, di
 11311 00002B4D F7D1                    		not	cx		; cx = 65535 - cx
 11312 00002B4F D1E9                    		shr	cx, 1		; cx = cx/2
 11313 00002B51 30C9                    		xor	cl, cl
 11314 00002B53 86CD                    		xchg	cl, ch		; cx = cx/256
 11315                                  		
 11316                                  		;cmp	cx, [cs:doscnt]	
 11317                                  				; if sector read count > cx, decrease it to cx
 11318 00002B55 3B0E[001A]              		cmp	cx, [doscnt]
 11319 00002B59 7604                    		jbe	short getcl3
 11320                                  		;;;
 11321                                  		;mov	cx, [cs:doscnt]
 11322 00002B5B 8B0E[001A]              		mov	cx, [doscnt]
 11323                                  getcl3:
 11324 00002B5F 5A                      		pop	dx		; sector to read for diskrd (low)
 11325                                  		;pop	word [cs:start_sec_h]
 11326                                  		; 12/12/2023
 11327 00002B60 8F06[9C04]              		pop	word [start_sec_h]
 11328                                  					; sector to read for diskrd (high)
 11329                                  		; 12/12/2023
 11330                                  		; ds = cs
 11331                                  		;push	ds
 11332                                  		;push	cs
 11333                                  		;pop	ds
 11334                                  		
 11335 00002B64 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
 11336                                  
 11337                                  		; 20/12/2023
 11338                                  		; 17/10/2022
 11339 00002B65 BD[0C0A]                		mov	bp, DISKRD	; offset diskrd
 11340                                  		;mov	bp, 0A2Bh	; 20/12/2023
 11341                                  		;	(PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0A2Bh ; 364h:0A2Bh)
 11342                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; 17/10/2022
 11343                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
 11344                                  
 11345 00002B68 E806EF                  		call	call_bios_code	; read the clusters
 11346                                  		
 11347                                  		;pop	ds
 11348                                  		; 12/12/2023
 11349                                  		; ds = cs
 11350 00002B6B 5B                      		pop	bx		; lw of the new cluster number
 11351 00002B6C 5E                      		pop	si ; 20/12/2023 ; hw of the new cluster number
 11352                                  
 11353 00002B6D 5F                      		pop	di ; 2* - (kernel) load location (es:di)
 11354                                  
 11355                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:doscnt]	; get number of	sectors	read
 11356                                  		; 12/12/2023
 11357 00002B6E A1[001A]                		mov	ax, [doscnt]
 11358 00002B71 86E0                    		xchg	ah, al		; multiply by 256
 11359 00002B73 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1		; times	2 equal	512
 11360 00002B75 01C7                    		add	di, ax		; update load location
 11361                                  
 11362 00002B77 59                      		pop	cx ; 1*		; restore sectors/cluster
 11363                                  
 11364 00002B78 C3                      		retn
 11365                                  
 11366                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11367                                  
 11368                                  ;function: find and read the corresponding fat sector into ds:0
 11369                                  ;
 11370                                  ;in). dx:si - offset value (starting from fat entry 0) of fat entry to find. M054
 11371                                  ;     ds - fatloc segment
 11372                                  ;     cs:drvfat - logical drive number, fat id
 11373                                  ;     cs:md_sectorsize
 11374                                  ;     cs:last_fat_secnum - last fat sector number read in.
 11375                                  ;
 11376                                  ;out). corresponding fat sector read in.
 11377                                  ;      bx = offset value from fatlog segment.
 11378                                  ;      other registers are saved.
 11379                                  ;      zero flag set if the fat entry is splitted, i.e., when 12 bit fat entry
 11380                                  ;      starts at the last byte of the fat sector. in this case, the caller
 11381                                  ;      should save this byte, and read the next fat sector to get the rest
 11382                                  ;      of the fat entry value. (this will only happen with the 12 bit fat.)
 11383                                  
 11384                                  		; 17/10/2022
 11385                                  get_fat_sector:	
 11386                                  		; 20/12/2023
 11387                                  		; 12/12/2023
 11388                                  		; ds = fat buffer segment
 11389                                  
 11390                                  		; 12/12/2023
 11391                                  		;push	ax ; (not necessary)
 11392 00002B79 51                      		push	cx ; read count (sectors per cluster)
 11393 00002B7A 57                      		push	di ; IBMDOS.COM/MSDOS.SYS load offset
 11394 00002B7B 56                      		push	si ; FAT offset value (from fat entry 0)
 11395 00002B7C 06                      		push	es ; IBMDOS.COM/MSDOS.SYS load segment
 11396 00002B7D 1E                      		push	ds ; FAT buffer segment
 11397                                  
 11398                                  		; 12/12/2023
 11399 00002B7E 0E                      		push	cs
 11400 00002B7F 1F                      		pop	ds
 11401                                  	
 11402 00002B80 89F0                    		mov	ax, si
 11403                                  		;;mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
 11404                                  		; 12/12/2023
 11405                                  		;mov	cx, [md_sectorsize] ; 512
 11406                                  		;div	cx		; ax = sector number, dx = offset
 11407                                  		; 12/12/2023
 11408                                  		;nop
 11409                                  
 11410                                  		; 12/12/2023
 11411 00002B82 F736[081A]              		div	word [md_sectorsize] ; 512
 11412                                  
 11413                                  		; ax = FAT sector (sequence/index) number
 11414                                  		; dx = cluster number offset
 11415                                  
 11416                                  		; Get rid of the assumption that
 11417                                  		; there	is only	one reserved sector
 11418                                  
 11419                                  		; 12/12/2023 ; *
 11420                                  		;push	es ; *
 11421                                  		;push	ds ; *
 11422                                  		;push	di ; *
 11423 00002B86 50                      		push	ax
 11424                                  		;push	cs ; *
 11425                                  		;pop	ds ; *
 11426                                  
 11427                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive # and FAT id
 11428                                  		; 12/12/2023
 11429 00002B87 A1[FA19]                		mov	ax, [drvfat]	; get drive # and FAT id 
 11430 00002B8A BD[A405]                		mov	bp, SETDRIVE
 11431                                  		;mov	bp, 5AEh  ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM
 11432                                  		;;mov	bp, 4D7h	; setdrive
 11433                                  					; at 2C7h:4D7h = 70h:2A47h
 11434 00002B8D 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
 11435 00002B8E E8E0EE                  		call	call_bios_code	; get bds for drive
 11436 00002B91 58                      		pop	ax		; (sector number -without reserved and hidden sectors-)
 11437 00002B92 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
 11438                                  					; add #reserved_sectors
 11439                                  		; 12/12/2023
 11440                                  		;pop	di ; *
 11441                                  		;pop	ds ; *
 11442                                  		;pop	es ; *
 11443                                  
 11444                                  		; 12/12/2023
 11445                                  		; ds = cs
 11446 00002B96 3B06[0A1A]              		cmp	ax, [last_fat_sec_num]
 11447                                  		;cmp	ax, [cs:last_fat_sec_num]
 11448 00002B9A 741C                    		jz	short gfs_split_chk ; don't need to read it again.
 11449 00002B9C A3[0A1A]                		mov	[last_fat_sec_num], ax
 11450                                  		;mov	[cs:last_fat_sec_num], ax
 11451                                  					; sector number
 11452                                  					; (in the partition, without hidden sectors)
 11453                                  		; 13/12/2023
 11454 00002B9F 07                      		pop	es ; FAT buffer segment (DS on top of the stack)
 11455 00002BA0 06                      		push	es ; (put it on top of the stack again)
 11456                                  
 11457 00002BA1 52                      		push	dx ; cluster number offset
 11458                                  
 11459                                  		; 12/12/2023
 11460 00002BA2 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx
 11461 00002BA4 890E[9C04]              		mov	[start_sec_h], cx ;0 
 11462                                  		;mov	word [cs:start_sec_h], 0 
 11463                                  					; prepare to read the fat sector
 11464                                  					; start_sec_h is always	0 for fat sector.
 11465 00002BA8 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax
 11466                                  		; 12/12/2023
 11467 00002BAA 41                      		inc	cx ; cx = 1
 11468                                  		;mov	cx, 1		; 1 sector read
 11469                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]
 11470 00002BAB A1[FA19]                		mov	ax, [drvfat]
 11471                                  		;push	ds
 11472                                  		;pop	es
 11473                                  
 11474 00002BAE 31FF                    		xor	di, di	; 0	; es:di	-> fatloc segment:0
 11475                                  		
 11476                                  		; 12/12/2023
 11477                                  		;push	ds
 11478                                  		;push	cs
 11479                                  		;pop	ds
 11480                                  		
 11481 00002BB0 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
 11482                                  
 11483                                  		; 20/12/2023
 11484                                  		; 17/10/2022
 11485 00002BB1 BD[0C0A]                		mov	bp, DISKRD	; offset diskrd
 11486                                  		;mov	bp, 0A2Bh	; 20/12/2023
 11487                                  		;	(PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0A2Bh ; 364h:0A2Bh)
 11488                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; 17/10/2022
 11489                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
 11490                                  
 11491 00002BB4 E8BAEE                  		call	call_bios_code	; read the clusters
 11492                                  
 11493                                  		; 12/12/2023
 11494                                  		;pop	ds
 11495                                  		; ds = cs = biosdata segment
 11496                                  
 11497 00002BB7 5A                      		pop	dx ; cluster number offset 
 11498                                  
 11499                                  gfs_split_chk:
 11500                                  		; 13/12/2023
 11501                                  		;mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
 11502 00002BB8 8B0E[081A]              		mov	cx, [md_sectorsize]
 11503                                  ;gfs_split_chk:					
 11504 00002BBC 49                      		dec	cx		; 511
 11505 00002BBD 39CA                    		cmp	dx, cx		; if offset points to the
 11506                                  					; last byte of this sector,
 11507                                  					; then splitted	entry.
 11508 00002BBF 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; set bx to dx
 11509                                  		
 11510                                  		; 12/12/2023
 11511                                  		; bx = dx = cluster number offset in the FAT buffer
 11512 00002BC1 1F                      		pop	ds ; FAT buffer segment
 11513 00002BC2 07                      		pop	es ; IBMDOS.COM/MSDOS.SYS load segment
 11514 00002BC3 5E                      		pop	si ; FAT offset value (from fat entry 0)
 11515 00002BC4 5F                      		pop	di ; IBMDOS.COM/MSDOS.SYS load offset
 11516 00002BC5 59                      		pop	cx ; read count (sectors per cluster)
 11517                                  		;pop	ax
 11518                                  
 11519 00002BC6 C3                      		retn
 11520                                  ; 15/10/2022
 11521                                  ;Bios_Data_Init	ends
 11522                                  
 11523                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11524                                  
 11525                                  		; 09/12/2022
 11526                                  		;db 0
 11527                                  
 11528                                  numbertodiv	equ ($-BData_start)
 11529                                  numbertomod	equ (numbertodiv % 16)
 11530                                  
 11531                                  %if numbertomod>0 & numbertomod<16
 11532 00002BC7 00<rep 9h>              		times (16-numbertomod) db 0

 11558

 11560                                   
 11561                                  ; 02/10/2022

 11568                                  DOSBIOSEG_2C7h:	;db 30h dup(0)		; SEGMENT 2C7h (2C70h-700h=2570h)
 11569 00000000 00<rep 30h>             		times 48 db 0		; 19/10/2022	
 11570 00000030 7000                    BiosDataWord:	dw 70h
 11571                                  
 11572                                  ; 15/10/2022
 11573                                  ;BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h

 11582                                  ;************************************************************************
 11583                                  ;*									*
 11584                                  ;*	seg_reinit is called with ax = our new code segment value,	*
 11585                                  ;*	  trashes di, cx, es						*
 11586                                  ;*									*
 11587                                  ;*	cas -- should be made disposable!				*
 11588                                  ;*									*
 11589                                  ;************************************************************************
 11590                                  
 11591                                  	; 20/09/2023	
 11592                                  	; 10/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 11593                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0032h 
 11594                                  
 11595                                  _seg_reinit:
 11596 00000032 2E8E06[3000]            		mov	es, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 11597                                  					; at 2C7h:30h or 70h:25A0h
 11598                                  		;mov	di, (offset cdev+2)
 11599 00000037 BF[0406]                		mov	di, cdev+2	; 19/10/2022
 11600                                  		;mov	cx, 4		; (end_BC_entries - cdev)/4
 11601                                  		; 10/08/2023
 11602 0000003A B90300                  		mov	cx, 3 ; (PCDOS 7.1)
 11603                                  _seg_reinit_1:
 11604 0000003D AB                      		stosw			; modify Bios_Code entry points
 11605 0000003E 47                      		inc	di
 11606 0000003F 47                      		inc	di
 11607 00000040 E2FB                    		loop	_seg_reinit_1
 11608                                  		; 10/08/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 11609                                  		; (direct jump to i2f_handler from BIOSDATA:bios_i2f)
 11610                                  		; (instead of 'bcode_i2f: dw i2f_handler, IOSYSCODESEG')
 11611 00000042 26A3[0800]              		mov     [es:bios_i2f_seg], ax ; actual BIOSCODE segment
 11612 00000046 CB                      		retf
 11613                                  
 11614                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11615                                  
 11616                                  ; 15/10/2022
 11617                                  
 11618                                  ;************************************************************************
 11619                                  ;*									*
 11620                                  ;*	chardev_entry - main device driver dispatch routine		*
 11621                                  ;*	   called with a dummy parameter block on the stack		*
 11622                                  ;*	   dw dispatch_table, dw prn/aux numbers (optional)		*
 11623                                  ;*									*
 11624                                  ;*	will eventually take care of doing the transitions in		*
 11625                                  ;*	   out of Bios_Code						*
 11626                                  ;*									*
 11627                                  ;************************************************************************
 11628                                  
 11629                                  		; 20/09/2023
 11630                                  chardev_entry:				; 0070h:25B3h =	02C7h:0043h
 11631 00000047 56                      		push	si
 11632 00000048 50                      		push	ax
 11633 00000049 51                      		push	cx
 11634 0000004A 52                      		push	dx
 11635 0000004B 57                      		push	di
 11636 0000004C 55                      		push	bp
 11637 0000004D 1E                      		push	ds
 11638 0000004E 06                      		push	es
 11639 0000004F 53                      		push	bx
 11640 00000050 89E5                    		mov	bp, sp
 11641 00000052 8B7612                  		mov	si, [bp+18]	; get return address (dispatch table)
 11642                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h]
 11643                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
 11644 00000055 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
 11645                                  		; 20/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:005Ah)
 11646 0000005A C434                    		les	si, [si]
 11647                                  		;mov	ax, [si+2]	; get the device number	if present
 11648 0000005C 8CC0                    		mov	ax, es
 11649 0000005E A2[2100]                		mov	[auxnum], al
 11650 00000061 8826[8004]              		mov	[printdev], ah
 11651                                  		;mov	si, [si]	; point	to the device dispatch table
 11652 00000065 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; get pointer to i/o packet
 11653 00000069 268A4701                		mov	al, [es:bx+1]	; [es:bx+unit]	; al = unit code
 11654 0000006D 268A670D                		mov	ah, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+media]	; ah = media descrip
 11655 00000071 268B4F12                		mov	cx, [es:bx+18]	; [es:bx+count]	; cx = count
 11656 00000075 268B5714                		mov	dx, [es:bx+20]	; [es:bx+start]	; dx = start sector
 11657                                  		; 17/10/2022
 11658 00000079 81FE[6F05]              		cmp	si, DSKTBL
 11659                                  		;;cmp	si, 579h	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
 11660                                  		;cmp	si, 4A2h	; dsktbl
 11661                                  					; at 2C7h:4A2h = 70h:2A12h
 11662 0000007D 7517                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
 11663                                  
 11664                                  ; Special case for 32-bit start sector number:
 11665                                  ;   if (si==dsktbl) /* if this is a disk device call */
 11666                                  ;      set high 16 bits of secnum to 0
 11667                                  ;      if (secnum == 0xffff) fetch 32 bit sector number
 11668                                  ;
 11669                                  ; pass high word of sector number in start_sec_h, low word in dx
 11670                                  ;
 11671                                  ; note: start_l and start_h are the offsets within the io_request packet
 11672                                  ;	  which contain the low and hi words of the 32 bit start sector if
 11673                                  ;	  it has been used.
 11674                                  ;
 11675                                  ; note: remember not to destroy the registers which have been set up before
 11676                                  
 11677                                  		; 20/09/2023
 11678                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	0 ; initialize to 0
 11679 0000007F C706[9C04]0000          		mov	word [start_sec_h], 0
 11680 00000085 83FAFF                  		cmp	dx, 0FFFFh
 11681 00000088 750C                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
 11682 0000008A 268B571C                		mov	dx, [es:bx+28]	; [es:bx+start_h]
 11683                                  					; 32 bits dsk req
 11684                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	dx ; start_sec_h = packet.start_h
 11685 0000008E 8916[9C04]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx
 11686 00000092 268B571A                		mov	dx, [es:bx+26]	; [es:bx+start_l]
 11687                                  					; dx = packet.start_l
 11688                                  no_sector32_mapping:
 11689 00000096 97                      		xchg	ax, di
 11690 00000097 268A4702                		mov	al, [es:bx+2]	; [es:bx+cmd]
 11691 0000009B 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, [cs:si]
 11692 0000009E 732B                    		jnb	short command_error
 11693 000000A0 98                      		cbw			; note that al <= 15 means ok
 11694 000000A1 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 11695 000000A3 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 11696 000000A5 97                      		xchg	ax, di
 11697 000000A6 26C47F0E                		les	di, [es:bx+14]	; [es:bx+trans]
 11698 000000AA FC                      		cld
 11699                                  		; 17/10/2022
 11700 000000AB 2EFF5401                		call	near [cs:si+1]
 11701                                  		;call	word ptr cs:si+1
 11702 000000AF 7202                    		jb	short already_got_ah_status
 11703 000000B1 B401                    		mov	ah, 1
 11704                                  already_got_ah_status:
 11705                                  		;;mov	ds, [cs:0030h]	; 15/10/2022
 11706                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
 11707                                  					; cas note: shouldn't be needed!
 11708 000000B3 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
 11709                                  		;lds	bx, ds:ptrsav
 11710 000000B8 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 11711 000000BC 894703                  		mov	[bx+3],	ax	; [bx+status]
 11712                                  					; mark operation complete
 11713 000000BF 5B                      		pop	bx
 11714 000000C0 07                      		pop	es
 11715 000000C1 1F                      		pop	ds
 11716 000000C2 5D                      		pop	bp
 11717 000000C3 5F                      		pop	di
 11718 000000C4 5A                      		pop	dx
 11719 000000C5 59                      		pop	cx
 11720 000000C6 58                      		pop	ax
 11721 000000C7 5E                      		pop	si
 11722                                  		;add	sp, 2		; get rid of fake return address
 11723                                  		; 20/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1	- IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:00C8h)
 11724 000000C8 44                      		inc	sp
 11725 000000C9 44                      		inc	sp	
 11726                                  
 11727                                  		; fall through into bc_retf
 11728                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------	
 11729                                  bc_retf:
 11730 000000CA CB                      		retf
 11731                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11732                                  
 11733                                  command_error:				
 11734 000000CB E80700                  		call	bc_cmderr
 11735 000000CE EBE3                    		jmp	short already_got_ah_status
 11736                                  ; 15/10/2022
 11737                                  ; 01/05/2019
 11738                                  
 11739                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11740                                  ; The following piece of hack is for supporting CP/M compatibility
 11741                                  ; Basically at offset 5 we have a far call into 0:c0. But this does not call
 11742                                  ; 0:c0 directly instead it call f01d:fef0, because it needs to support 'lhld 6'
 11743                                  ; The following hack has to reside at ffff:d0 (= f01d:fef0) if BIOS is loaded
 11744                                  ; high.
 11745                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11746                                  
 11747                                  		;db 7 dup(0)
 11748                                  
 11749                                  		; 20/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 11750                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0D0h)
 11751                                  		; 15/10/2022
 11752                                  		;dw 0		; pad to bring offset to 0D0h
 11753                                  
 11754 000000D0 00<rep 5h>              off_d0: 	times 5 db 0	; 5 bytes from 0:c0 will be copied onto here
 11755                                  				;  which is the CP/M call 5 entry point
 11756                                  		
 11757                                  
 11758                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11759                                  
 11760                                  ;	exit - all routines return through this path
 11761                                  
 11762                                  bc_cmderr:				
 11763 000000D5 B003                    		mov	al, 3		; 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
 11764                                  					; unknown command error
 11765                                  
 11766                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11767                                  
 11768                                  ;	now zero the count field by subtracting its current value,
 11769                                  ;	  which is still in cx, from itself.
 11770                                  
 11771                                  ;	subtract the number of i/o's NOT YET COMPLETED from total
 11772                                  ;	  in order to return the number actually complete
 11773                                  
 11774                                  bc_err_cnt:	
 11775                                  		;les	bx, ds:ptrsav
 11776                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11777 000000D7 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
 11778 000000DB 26294F12                		sub	[es:bx+18], cx	; [es:bx+count]
 11779                                  					; # of successful i/o's
 11780 000000DF B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; mark error return
 11781 000000E1 F9                      		stc			; indicate abnormal end
 11782 000000E2 C3                      		retn
 11783                                  
 11784                                  ; 15/10/2022
 11785                                  
 11786                                  ;Bios_Code ends

 11789                                  ; MSCHAR.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 11790                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11791                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
