 11793                                  
 11794                                  ; 30/04/2019
 11795                                  
 11796                                  ;title	mschar - character and clock devices
 11797                                  
 11798                                  ;MODE_CTRLBRK	equ	0FFh
 11799                                  
 11800                                  ; BIOSCODE:00E4h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 11801                                  
 11802                                  ;************************************************************************
 11803                                  ;*									*
 11804                                  ;*	device driver dispatch tables					*
 11805                                  ;*									*
 11806                                  ;*	each table starts with a byte which lists the number of		*
 11807                                  ;*	legal functions, followed by that number of words. Each		*
 11808                                  ;*	word represents an offset of a routine in Bios_Code which	*
 11809                                  ;*	handles the function. The functions are terminated with		*
 11810                                  ;*	a near return. If carry is reset, a 'done' code is returned	*
 11811                                  ;*	to the caller. If carry is set, the ah/al registers are		*
 11812                                  ;*	returned as abnormal completion status. Notice that ds		*
 11813                                  ;*	is assumed to point to the Bios_Data segment throughout.	*
 11814                                  ;*									*
 11815                                  ;************************************************************************
 11816                                  
 11817                                  		; 20/09/2023
 11818                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:00E3h)
 11819                                  		; 13/12/2022
 11820 000000E3 00                      		db 0
 11821                                  
 11822                                  		; 13/12/2022
 11823 000000E4 0B                      con_table:	db ((con_table_end - con_table)-1)/2 ; 11
 11824                                  					; 2C7h:0E4h = 70h:2654h
 11825 000000E5 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
 11826                                  					; 00 init
 11827 000000E7 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 01
 11828 000000E9 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 02
 11829 000000EB [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr ; 0D5h	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
 11830                                  					; 03
 11831 000000ED [5C01]                  		dw con_read  ; 15Ch	; con_read at 2C7h:15Ch	= 70h:26CCh
 11832                                  					; 04
 11833 000000EF [9F01]                  		dw con_rdnd  ; 19Fh	; con_rdnd at 2C7h:19Fh	= 70h:270Fh
 11834                                  					; 05
 11835 000000F1 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 06
 11836 000000F3 [0802]                  		dw con_flush ; 209h	; con_flush at 2C7h:209h = 70h:2779h
 11837                                  					; 07
 11838 000000F5 [FC01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; con_writ at 2C7h:1FDh	= 70h:276Dh
 11839                                  					; 08
 11840 000000F7 [FC01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; 09
 11841 000000F9 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 0A
 11842                                  con_table_end:
 11843 000000FB 1A                      prn_table:	db ((prn_table_end - prn_table)-1)/2 ; 26			
 11844                                  					; 2C7h:0FBh = 70h:266Bh
 11845 000000FC [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec
 11846 000000FE [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
 11847 00000100 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
 11848 00000102 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; bc_cmderr
 11849 00000104 [1902]                  		dw prn_input  ;	21Ah	; prn_input
 11850                                  					; 04 indicate zero chars read
 11851 00000106 [C701]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
 11852                                  					; 05 read non-destructive
 11853 00000108 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
 11854 0000010A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
 11855 0000010C [1E02]                  		dw prn_writ   ;	21Fh	; prn_writ
 11856 0000010E [1E02]                  		dw prn_writ   ; 21Fh	; 09
 11857 00000110 [4F02]                  		dw prn_stat   ; 251h	; prn_stat
 11858 00000112 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0B
 11859 00000114 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0C
 11860 00000116 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0D
 11861 00000118 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0E
 11862 0000011A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0F
 11863 0000011C [9402]                  		dw prn_tilbusy ; 28Bh	; prn_tilbusy
 11864 0000011E [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 11
 11865 00000120 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 12
 11866 00000122 [C202]                  		dw prn_genioctl ; 2BAh	; prn_genioctl
 11867 00000124 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 14
 11868 00000126 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 15
 11869 00000128 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 16
 11870 0000012A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 17
 11871 0000012C [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 18
 11872 0000012E [F702]                  		dw prn_ioctl_query ; 2F0h ; prn_ioctl_query
 11873                                  prn_table_end:
 11874 00000130 0B                      aux_table:	db ((aux_table_end - aux_table)-1)/2 ; 11			
 11875                                  					; 2C7h:130h = 70h:26A0h
 11876 00000131 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00 - init
 11877 00000133 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
 11878 00000135 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
 11879 00000137 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
 11880 00000139 [1203]                  		dw aux_read   ; 30Dh	; aux_read ; 04	- read
 11881 0000013B [3703]                  		dw aux_rdnd   ; 335h	; aux_rdnd - 05	- read non-destructive
 11882 0000013D [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
 11883 0000013F [7803]                  		dw aux_flsh   ;	36Ch	; aux_flsh
 11884 00000141 [7F03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; aux_writ
 11885 00000143 [7F03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; 09
 11886 00000145 [5703]                  		dw aux_wrst   ;	355h	; aux_wrst
 11887                                  aux_table_end:
 11888 00000147 0A                      tim_table	db ((tim_table_end - tim_table)-1)/2 ; 10
 11889                                  					; 2C7h:147h = 70h:26B7h
 11890 00000148 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00
 11891 0000014A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
 11892 0000014C [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
 11893 0000014E [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
 11894 00000150 [E404]                  		dw tim_read   ;	435h	; tim_read
 11895 00000152 [C701]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
 11896 00000154 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
 11897 00000156 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
 11898 00000158 [E503]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; tim_writ
 11899 0000015A [E503]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; 09
 11900                                  tim_table_end:
 11901                                  
 11902                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11903                                  
 11904                                  ;************************************************************************
 11905                                  ;*									*
 11906                                  ;*	con_read - read cx bytes from keyboard into buffer at es:di	*
 11907                                  ;*									*
 11908                                  ;************************************************************************
 11909                                  
 11910                                  con_read:				; 2C7h:15Ch = 70h:26CCh
 11911                                  		;jcxz	short con_exit	; read cx bytes	from keyboard into buffer
 11912 0000015C E306                    		jcxz	con_exit	; 19/10/2022
 11913                                  con_loop:				
 11914 0000015E E80500                  		call	chrin		; get char in al
 11915 00000161 AA                      		stosb			; store	char at	es:di
 11916 00000162 E2FA                    		loop	con_loop
 11917                                  con_exit:				
 11918 00000164 F8                      		clc
 11919 00000165 C3                      		retn
 11920                                  
 11921                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11922                                  
 11923                                  ;************************************************************************
 11924                                  ;*									*
 11925                                  ;*	chrin - input single char from keyboard into al			*
 11926                                  ;*									*
 11927                                  ;*	  we are going to issue extended keyboard function, if		*
 11928                                  ;*	  supported. the returning value of the extended keystroke	*
 11929                                  ;*	  of the extended keyboard function uses 0E0h in al		*
 11930                                  ;*	  instead of 00h as in the conventional keyboard function.	*
 11931                                  ;*	  this creates a conflict when the user entered real		*
 11932                                  ;*	  greek alpha charater (= 0E0h) to  distinguish the extended	*
 11933                                  ;*	  keystroke and the greek alpha. this case will be handled	*
 11934                                  ;*	  in the following manner:					*
 11935                                  ;*									*
 11936                                  ;*	      ah = 16h							*
 11937                                  ;*	      int 16h							*
 11938                                  ;*	      if al == 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
 11939                                  ;*	      else if al == 0E0h, then					*
 11940                                  ;*	      if ah <> 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
 11941                                  ;*		else greek_alpha character.				*
 11942                                  ;*									*
 11943                                  ;*	also, for compatibility reason, if an extended code is		*
 11944                                  ;*	  detected, then we are going to change the value in al		*
 11945                                  ;*	  from 0E0h to 00h.						*
 11946                                  ;*									*
 11947                                  ;************************************************************************
 11948                                  
 11949                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11950                                  chrin:		
 11951 00000166 8A26[7E04]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; set by msinit. 0 or 10h
 11952 0000016A 30C0                    		xor	al, al
 11953 0000016C 8606[0C00]              		xchg	al, [altah]	; get character	& zero altah
 11954 00000170 08C0                    		or	al, al
 11955 00000172 752A                    		jnz	short keyret
 11956 00000174 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
 11957 00000176 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
 11958 00000178 74EC                    		jz	short chrin
 11959 0000017A 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
 11960 0000017D 7504                    		jnz	short alt_ext_chk
 11961 0000017F B010                    		mov	al, 10h
 11962 00000181 EB1B                    		jmp	short keyret
 11963                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11964                                  
 11965                                  ;  if operation was extended function (i.e. keyrd_func != 0) then
 11966                                  ;    if character read was 0E0h then
 11967                                  ;      if extended byte was zero (i.e. ah == 0) then
 11968                                  ;	 goto keyret
 11969                                  ;      else
 11970                                  ;	 set al to zero
 11971                                  ;	 goto alt_save
 11972                                  ;      endif
 11973                                  ;    endif
 11974                                  ;  endif
 11975                                  
 11976                                  alt_ext_chk:
 11977 00000183 803E[7E04]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0
 11978 00000188 740C                    		jz	short not_ext
 11979 0000018A 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h
 11980 0000018C 7508                    		jnz	short not_ext
 11981 0000018E 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 11982 00000190 740C                    		jz	short keyret
 11983 00000192 30C0                    		xor	al, al
 11984 00000194 EB04                    		jmp	short alt_save
 11985                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11986                                  
 11987                                  not_ext:				
 11988 00000196 08C0                    		or	al, al		; special case?
 11989 00000198 7504                    		jnz	short keyret
 11990                                  alt_save:				
 11991 0000019A 8826[0C00]              		mov	[altah], ah	; store	special	key
 11992                                  keyret:					
 11993 0000019E C3                      		retn
 11994                                  
 11995                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11996                                  
 11997                                  ;************************************************************************
 11998                                  ;*									*
 11999                                  ;*	con_rdnd - keyboard non destructive read, no wait		*
 12000                                  ;*									*
 12001                                  ;*	pc-convertible-type machine: if bit 10 is set by the dos	*
 12002                                  ;*	in the status word of the request packet, and there is no	*
 12003                                  ;*	character in the input buffer, the driver issues a system	*
 12004                                  ;*	wait request to the rom. on return from the rom, it returns	*
 12005                                  ;*	a 'char-not-found' to the dos.					*
 12006                                  ;*									*
 12007                                  ;************************************************************************
 12008                                  
 12009                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12010                                  con_rdnd:				
 12011 0000019F A0[0C00]                		mov	al, [altah]
 12012 000001A2 08C0                    		or	al, al
 12013 000001A4 754C                    		jnz	short rdexit
 12014 000001A6 8A26[7F04]              		mov	ah, [keysts_func]
 12015 000001AA CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
 12016 000001AC 751D                    		jnz	short gotchr
 12017 000001AE 803E[7900]00            		cmp	byte [fhavek09], 0
 12018 000001B3 7412                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
 12019 000001B5 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
 12020                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12021 000001B9 26F6470404              		test	byte [es:bx+4], 04h
 12022                                  		;test	word [es:bx+3], 400h ; [es:bx+status]
 12023 000001BE 7407                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
 12024 000001C0 B80041                  		mov	ax, 4100h
 12025 000001C3 30DB                    		xor	bl, bl
 12026 000001C5 CD15                    		int	15h		; SYSTEM - WAIT	ON EXTERNAL EVENT (CONVERTIBLE)
 12027                                  					; AL = condition type, BH = condition compare or mask value
 12028                                  					; BL = timeout value times 55 milliseconds, 00h	means no timeout
 12029                                  					; DX = I/O port	address	if AL bit 4 set
 12030                                  z_bus_exit:				
 12031 000001C7 F9                      		stc			; 2C7h:1C8h = 70h:2738h
 12032 000001C8 B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; indicate busy	status
 12033 000001CA C3                      		retn
 12034                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12035                                  
 12036                                  gotchr:					
 12037 000001CB 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
 12038 000001CD 7508                    		jnz	short notbrk	; check	for null after break
 12039 000001CF 8A26[7E04]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; issue keyboard read function
 12040 000001D3 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
 12041 000001D5 EBC8                    		jmp	short con_rdnd	; get a	real status
 12042                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12043                                  
 12044                                  notbrk:					
 12045 000001D7 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
 12046 000001DA 7504                    		jnz	short rd_ext_chk
 12047 000001DC B010                    		mov	al, 10h		; ('P' & 1Fh) ; return control p
 12048 000001DE EB12                    		jmp	short rdexit
 12049                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12050                                  
 12051                                  rd_ext_chk:				
 12052 000001E0 803E[7E04]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0 ; extended keyboard function?
 12053 000001E5 740B                    		jz	short rdexit
 12054 000001E7 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h	; extended key value or	greek alpha?
 12055 000001E9 7507                    		jnz	short rdexit
 12056 000001EB 80FC00                  		cmp	ah, 0		; scan code exist?
 12057 000001EE 7402                    		jz	short rdexit	; yes. greek alpha char.
 12058 000001F0 B000                    		mov	al, 0		; no. extended key stroke.
 12059                                  					; change it for	compatibility
 12060                                  rdexit:					
 12061 000001F2 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
 12062 000001F6 2688470D                		mov	[es:bx+13], al	; [es:bx+media]
 12063                                  					; return keyboard character here
 12064                                  bc_exvec:				
 12065 000001FA F8                      		clc			; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
 12066                                  					; indicate normal termination
 12067 000001FB C3                      		retn
 12068                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12069                                  
 12070                                  ;************************************************************************
 12071                                  ;*									*
 12072                                  ;*	con_write - console write routine				*
 12073                                  ;*									*
 12074                                  ;*	entry:	es:di -> buffer						*
 12075                                  ;*		cx    =  count						*
 12076                                  ;*									*
 12077                                  ;************************************************************************
 12078                                  
 12079                                  con_writ:
 12080                                  		;jcxz	short bc_exvec
 12081 000001FC E3FC                    		jcxz	bc_exvec	; 19/10/2022
 12082                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12083                                  		;jcxz	cc_ret
 12084                                  con_lp:					
 12085 000001FE 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]
 12086 00000201 47                      		inc	di
 12087 00000202 CD29                    		int	29h		; DOS 2+ internal - FAST PUTCHAR
 12088                                  					; AL = character to display
 12089 00000204 E2F8                    		loop	con_lp
 12090                                  cc_ret:					
 12091 00000206 F8                      		clc
 12092 00000207 C3                      		retn
 12093                                  
 12094                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12095                                  
 12096                                  ;************************************************************************
 12097                                  ;*									*
 12098                                  ;*	con_flush - flush out keyboard queue				*
 12099                                  ;*									*
 12100                                  ;************************************************************************
 12101                                  
 12102                                  con_flush:
 12103 00000208 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0	; clear	out holding buffer
 12104                                  flloop:					; while	(charavail()) charread();	
 12105 0000020D B401                    		mov	ah, 1
 12106 0000020F CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - CHECK BUFFER, DO NOT CLEAR
 12107                                  					; Return: ZF clear if character	in buffer
 12108                                  					; AH = scan code, AL = character
 12109                                  					; ZF set if no character in buffer
 12110 00000211 74F3                    		jz	short cc_ret
 12111 00000213 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
 12112 00000215 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY
 12113                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
 12114 00000217 EBF4                    		jmp	short flloop
 12115                                  
 12116                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12117                                  
 12118                                  ; 15/10/2022
 12119                                  
 12120                                  ;************************************************************************
 12121                                  ;*									*
 12122                                  ;*	some equates for rom bios printer i/o				*
 12123                                  ;*									*
 12124                                  ;************************************************************************
 12125                                  
 12126                                  ; ibm rom status bits (i don't trust them, neither should you)
 12127                                  ; warning!!! the ibm rom does not return just one bit. it returns a
 12128                                  ; whole slew of bits, only one of which is correct.
 12129                                  
 12130                                  ;notbusystatus	equ 10000000b		; not busy
 12131                                  ;nopaperstatus	equ 00100000b		; no more paper
 12132                                  ;prnselected	equ 00010000b		; printer selected
 12133                                  ;ioerrstatus	equ 00001000b		; some kinda error
 12134                                  ;timeoutstatus	equ 00000001b		; time out.
 12135                                  ;
 12136                                  ;noprinter	equ 00110000b		; no printer attached
 12137                                  
 12138                                  ; 18/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 12139                                  ;error_I24_out_of_paper	equ 9 ; MSDOS 6.0, ERR.INC, 1991
 12140                                  
 12141                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12142                                  
 12143                                  ;************************************************************************
 12144                                  ;*									*
 12145                                  ;*	prn_input - return with no error but zero chars read		*
 12146                                  ;*									*
 12147                                  ;*	enter with cx = number of characters requested			*
 12148                                  ;*									*
 12149                                  ;************************************************************************
 12150                                  
 12151                                  prn_input:				; 2C7h:21Ah = 70h:278Ah
 12152 00000219 E8BBFE                  		call	bc_err_cnt	; reset	count to zero
 12153                                  					; (sub reqpkt.count,cx)
 12154                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12155                                  prn_done:
 12156 0000021C F8                      		clc			; but return with carry	reset for no error
 12157 0000021D C3                      		retn
 12158                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12159                                  
 12160                                  ;************************************************************************
 12161                                  ;*									*
 12162                                  ;*	prn_writ - write cx bytes from es:di to printer device		*
 12163                                  ;*									*
 12164                                  ;*	auxnum has printer number					*
 12165                                  ;*									*
 12166                                  ;************************************************************************
 12167                                  
 12168                                  prn_writ:				; 2C7h:21Fh = 70h:278Fh
 12169                                  		;jcxz	short prn_done	; no chars to output
 12170 0000021E E3FC                    		jcxz	prn_done	; 19/10/2022
 12171                                  prn_loop:				
 12172 00000220 BB0200                  		mov	bx, 2		; retry	count
 12173                                  prn_out:				
 12174 00000223 E83600                  		call	prnstat		; get status
 12175 00000226 751D                    		jnz	short TestPrnError
 12176 00000228 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to print
 12177 0000022B 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
 12178 0000022D E82E00                  		call	prnop		; print	to printer
 12179 00000230 7419                    		jz	short prn_con	; no error - continue
 12180 00000232 80FCFF                  		cmp	ah, 0FFh	; MODE_CTRLBRK
 12181 00000235 7509                    		jnz	short _prnwf
 12182 00000237 B00C                    		mov	al, 0Ch		; error_I24_gen_failure
 12183 00000239 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0
 12184 0000023E EB08                    		jmp	short pmessg
 12185                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12186                                  
 12187                                  _prnwf:					
 12188 00000240 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; timeoutstatus
 12189 00000243 7406                    		jz	short prn_con
 12190                                  TestPrnError:				
 12191 00000245 4B                      		dec	bx		; retry	until count is exhausted.
 12192 00000246 75DB                    		jnz	short prn_out
 12193                                  pmessg:					
 12194 00000248 E98CFE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
 12195                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12196                                  
 12197                                  prn_con:				
 12198 0000024B 47                      		inc	di		; point	to next	char and continue
 12199 0000024C E2D2                    		loop	prn_loop
 12200                                  ;prn_done:				
 12201                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12202                                  prn_done2:
 12203                                  		;clc
 12204                                  		; cf=0
 12205 0000024E C3                      		retn
 12206                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12207                                  
 12208                                  ;************************************************************************
 12209                                  ;*									*
 12210                                  ;*	prn_stat - device driver entry to return printer status		*
 12211                                  ;*									*
 12212                                  ;************************************************************************
 12213                                  
 12214                                  prn_stat:				; 2C7h:251h = 70h:27C1h
 12215 0000024F E80A00                  		call	prnstat		; device in dx
 12216 00000252 75F4                    		jnz	short pmessg
 12217 00000254 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; notbusystatus
 12218                                  		;jnz	short prn_done
 12219                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12220 00000257 75F5                    		jnz	short prn_done2 ; cf=0
 12221 00000259 E96BFF                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
 12222                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12223                                  
 12224                                  ;************************************************************************
 12225                                  ;*									*
 12226                                  ;*	prnstat - utility function to call ROM BIOS to check		*
 12227                                  ;*		 printer status. Return meaningful error code		*
 12228                                  ;*									*
 12229                                  ;************************************************************************
 12230                                  
 12231                                  prnstat:				
 12232 0000025C B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; set command for get status
 12233                                  					; PRINTER - GET	STATUS
 12234                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
 12235                                  					; Return: AH = status
 12236                                  
 12237                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12238                                  
 12239                                  ;************************************************************************
 12240                                  ;*									*
 12241                                  ;*	prnop - call ROM BIOS printer function in ah			*
 12242                                  ;*		return zero true if no error				*
 12243                                  ;*		return zero false if error, al = error code		*
 12244                                  ;*									*
 12245                                  ;************************************************************************
 12246                                  
 12247                                  prnop:
 12248                                  		; 20/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0
 12249                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM
 12250                                  		
 12251                                  		;mov	dx, [auxnum]	; get printer number
 12252                                  		;int	17h
 12253                                  
 12254 0000025E 1E                      		push	ds
 12255 0000025F FF36[2100]              		push	word [auxnum]
 12256 00000263 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx ; 0
 12257 00000265 8EDA                    		mov	ds, dx
 12258 00000267 5A                      		pop	dx
 12259 00000268 9C                      		pushf			; simulate int 17h
 12260 00000269 FA                      		cli
 12261                                  		;call	dword ptr ds:5ghghCh
 12262 0000026A FF1E5C00                		call	far [17h*4]	; 0:5Ch = INT 17h vector
 12263 0000026E 1F                      		pop	ds
 12264                                  
 12265                                  	; This check was added to see if this is a case of no
 12266                                  	; printer being installed. This tests checks to be sure
 12267                                  	; the error is noprinter (30h)
 12268                                  
 12269 0000026F 50                      		push	ax
 12270 00000270 80E430                  		and	ah, 30h
 12271 00000273 80FC30                  		cmp	ah, 30h		; noprinter
 12272 00000276 58                      		pop	ax
 12273 00000277 7506                    		jnz	short NextTest
 12274 00000279 80E4DF                  		and	ah, 0DFh	; ~nopaperstatus
 12275 0000027C 80CC08                  		or	ah, 8		; ioerrstatus
 12276                                  
 12277                                  ; examine the status bits to see if an error occurred. unfortunately, several
 12278                                  ; of the bits are set so we have to pick and choose. we must be extremely
 12279                                  ; careful about breaking basic.
 12280                                  
 12281                                  NextTest:				
 12282 0000027F F6C428                  		test	ah, 28h		; (ioerrstatus+nopaperstatus)
 12283                                  					; i/o error?
 12284 00000282 740A                    		jz	short checknotready ; no, try not ready
 12285                                  
 12286                                  ; at this point, we know we have an error. the converse is not true
 12287                                  
 12288 00000284 B009                    		mov	al, 9		; error_I24_out_of_paper
 12289                                  					; first, assume	out of paper
 12290 00000286 F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; out of paper set?
 12291 00000289 7502                    		jnz	short ret1	; yes, error is	set
 12292 0000028B FEC0                    		inc	al		; return al=10 (i/o error)
 12293                                  ret1:					
 12294 0000028D C3                      		retn
 12295                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12296                                  
 12297                                  checknotready:				
 12298 0000028E B002                    		mov	al, 2		; assume not-ready
 12299 00000290 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1
 12300 00000293 C3                      		retn
 12301                                  
 12302                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12303                                  
 12304                                  ;************************************************************************
 12305                                  ;*									*
 12306                                  ;*	prn_tilbusy - output until busy. Used by print spooler.		*
 12307                                  ;*		     this entry point should never block waiting for	*
 12308                                  ;*		     device to come ready.				*
 12309                                  ;*									*
 12310                                  ;*	inputs:	cx = count, es:di -> buffer				*
 12311                                  ;*	outputs: set the number of bytes transferred in the		*
 12312                                  ;*		 device driver request packet				*
 12313                                  ;*									*
 12314                                  ;************************************************************************
 12315                                  
 12316                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12317                                  prn_tilbusy:				; 2C7h:28Bh = 70h:27FBh
 12318 00000294 89FE                    		mov	si, di		; everything is	set for	lodsb
 12319                                  prn_tilbloop:				
 12320 00000296 51                      		push	cx
 12321 00000297 53                      		push	bx
 12322 00000298 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
 12323 0000029A 8A1E[8004]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
 12324 0000029E D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
 12325                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	wait count times to come ready
 12326 000002A0 8B8F[8104]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
 12327 000002A4 5B                      		pop	bx
 12328                                  prn_getstat:				
 12329 000002A5 E8B4FF                  		call	prnstat		; get status
 12330 000002A8 7514                    		jnz	short prn_bperr	; error
 12331 000002AA F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; ready	yet?
 12332 000002AD E1F6                    		loope	prn_getstat	; no, go for more
 12333 000002AF 59                      		pop	cx		; get original count
 12334 000002B0 740D                    		jz	short prn_berr	; still	not ready => done
 12335 000002B2 26                      		es
 12336 000002B3 AC                      		lodsb
 12337                                  		;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ; es
 12338                                  					; lodsb
 12339 000002B4 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
 12340 000002B6 E8A5FF                  		call	prnop
 12341 000002B9 7504                    		jnz	short prn_berr	; error
 12342 000002BB E2D9                    		loop	prn_tilbloop
 12343                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12344                                  		; cf=0 (prnop)
 12345                                  		;clc			; normal no-error return
 12346 000002BD C3                      		retn			;   from device driver
 12347                                  
 12348                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12349                                  
 12350                                  prn_bperr:				
 12351 000002BE 59                      		pop	cx		; restore transfer count from stack
 12352                                  prn_berr:				
 12353 000002BF E915FE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
 12354                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12355                                  
 12356                                  ; 15/10/2022
 12357                                  
 12358                                  ;************************************************************************
 12359                                  ;*									*
 12360                                  ;*	prn_genioctl - get/set printer retry count			*
 12361                                  ;*									*
 12362                                  ;************************************************************************
 12363                                  
 12364                                  ; IOCTL.INC (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 12365                                  ; 11/01/2019
 12366                                  
 12367                                  ;********************************;*
 12368                                  ; CHARACTER DEVICES (PRINTERS)	 ;*
 12369                                  ;********************************;*
 12370                                  
 12371                                  ;;RAWIO SUB-FUNCTIONS
 12372                                  ;;get_retry_count equ 65h
 12373                                  ;;set_retry_count equ 45h
 12374                                  
 12375                                  ;;struc A_RETRYCOUNT
 12376                                  ;;.rc_count: resw 1
 12377                                  ;;endstruc
 12378                                  
 12379                                  ;ioc_pc equ 5
 12380                                  
 12381                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12382                                  
 12383                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12384                                  prn_genioctl:				; 2C7h:2BAh = 70h:282Ah
 12385 000002C2 C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]
 12386 000002C6 26807D0D05              		cmp	byte [es:di+13], 5 ; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 12387                                  					; ioc_pc
 12388 000002CB 7403                    		jz	short prnfunc_ok
 12389                                  
 12390                                  prnfuncerr:				
 12391 000002CD E905FE                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
 12392                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12393                                  
 12394                                  prnfunc_ok:				
 12395 000002D0 268A450E                		mov	al, [es:di+14]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
 12396 000002D4 26C47D13                		les	di, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12397 000002D8 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
 12398                                  		;mov	bl, ds:printdev	; get index into retry counts
 12399 000002DA 8A1E[8004]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
 12400 000002DE D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
 12401                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	pull out retry count for device
 12402 000002E0 8B8F[8104]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
 12403 000002E4 3C65                    		cmp	al, 65h		; get_retry_count
 12404 000002E6 7407                    		jz	short prngetcount
 12405 000002E8 3C45                    		cmp	al, 45h		; set_retry_count
 12406 000002EA 75E1                    		jnz	short prnfuncerr
 12407 000002EC 268B0D                  		mov	cx, [es:di]
 12408                                  prngetcount:				
 12409                                  		;mov	ds:wait_count[bx], cx
 12410 000002EF 898F[8104]              		mov	[wait_count+bx], cx
 12411 000002F3 26890D                  		mov	[es:di], cx	; [es:di+A_RETRYCOUNT.RC_COUNT]
 12412                                  					; return current retry count
 12413                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12414                                  		; cf=0
 12415                                  		;clc
 12416 000002F6 C3                      		retn
 12417                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12418                                  
 12419                                  ;************************************************************************
 12420                                  ;*									*
 12421                                  ;*  prn_ioctl_query							*
 12422                                  ;*									*
 12423                                  ;*  Added for 5.00							*
 12424                                  ;************************************************************************
 12425                                  
 12426                                  prn_ioctl_query:			; 2C7h:2F0h = 70h:2860h
 12427 000002F7 C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]
 12428 000002FB 26807D0D05              		cmp	byte [es:di+13], 5 ; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 12429                                  					; ioc_pc
 12430 00000300 750D                    		jnz	short prn_query_err
 12431 00000302 268A450E                		mov	al, [es:di+14]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
 12432 00000306 3C65                    		cmp	al, 65h		; GET_RETRY_COUNT
 12433 00000308 7404                    		jz	short IOCtlSupported
 12434 0000030A 3C45                    		cmp	al, 45h		; SET_RETRY_COUNT
 12435 0000030C 7501                    		jnz	short prn_query_err
 12436                                  IOCtlSupported:	
 12437                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12438                                  		; cf=0		
 12439                                  		;clc
 12440 0000030E C3                      		retn
 12441                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12442                                  
 12443                                  prn_query_err:
 12444                                  		; 12/12/2022				
 12445                                  		;stc
 12446 0000030F E9C3FD                  		jmp	bc_cmderr ; (bc_cmderr sets cf to 1)
 12447                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12448                                  
 12449                                  ;************************************************************************
 12450                                  ;*									*
 12451                                  ;*	aux port driver code -- "aux" == "com1"				*
 12452                                  ;*									*
 12453                                  ;*	the device driver entry/dispatch code sets up auxnum to		*
 12454                                  ;*	give the com port number to use (0=com1, 1=com2, 2=com3...)	*
 12455                                  ;*									*
 12456                                  ;************************************************************************
 12457                                  
 12458                                  ;	values in ah, requesting function of int 14h in rom bios
 12459                                  
 12460                                  ;auxfunc_send	 equ	1	;transmit
 12461                                  ;auxfunc_receive equ	2	;read
 12462                                  ;auxfunc_status	 equ	3	;request status
 12463                                  
 12464                                  ;	error flags, reported by int 14h, reported in ah:
 12465                                  
 12466                                  ;flag_data_ready equ	01h	;data ready
 12467                                  ;flag_overrun	 equ	02h	;overrun error
 12468                                  ;flag_parity	 equ	04h	;parity error
 12469                                  ;flag_frame	 equ	08h	;framing error
 12470                                  ;flag_break	 equ	10h	;break detect
 12471                                  ;flag_tranhol_emp equ	20h	;transmit holding register empty
 12472                                  ;flag_timeout	 equ	80h	;timeout
 12473                                  
 12474                                  ;	these flags reported in al:
 12475                                  
 12476                                  ;flag_cts	 equ	10h	;clear to send
 12477                                  ;flag_dsr	 equ	20h	;data set ready
 12478                                  ;flag_rec_sig	 equ	80h	;receive line signal detect

 12480                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12481                                  
 12482                                  ;************************************************************************
 12483                                  ;*									*
 12484                                  ;*	aux_read - read cx bytes from [auxnum] aux port to buffer	*
 12485                                  ;*		   at es:di						*
 12486                                  ;*									*
 12487                                  ;************************************************************************

 12489                                  aux_read:				; 2C7h:30Dh = 70h:287Dh
 12490                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2
 12491 00000312 E311                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
 12492 00000314 E88000                  		call	getbx		; put address of auxbuf	in bx
 12493 00000317 30C0                    		xor	al, al
 12494 00000319 8607                    		xchg	al, [bx]
 12495 0000031B 08C0                    		or	al, al
 12496 0000031D 7503                    		jnz	short aux2
 12497                                  aux1:					
 12498 0000031F E80500                  		call	auxin		; get character	from port
 12499                                  					; won't return if error
 12500                                  aux2:					
 12501 00000322 AA                      		stosb
 12502 00000323 E2FA                    		loop	aux1		; if more characters, go around	again
 12503                                  exvec2:					
 12504 00000325 F8                      		clc			; all done, successful exit
 12505                                  auxin_retn:	; 18/12/2022
 12506 00000326 C3                      		retn

 12508                                  
 12509                                  ;************************************************************************
 12510                                  ;*									*
 12511                                  ;*	auxin - call rom bios to read character from aux port		*
 12512                                  ;*		if error occurs, map the error and return one		*
 12513                                  ;*		level up to device driver exit code, setting		*
 12514                                  ;*		the number of bytes transferred appropriately		*
 12515                                  ;*									*
 12516                                  ;************************************************************************
 12517                                  
 12518                                  auxin:					
 12519 00000327 B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; auxfunc_receive
 12520 00000329 E83A00                  		call	auxop
 12521 0000032C F6C40E                  		test	ah, 0Eh		; flag_frame|flag_parity|flag_overrun
 12522                                  		;jnz	short arbad	; skip if any error bits set
 12523                                  		;retn
 12524                                  		; 25/06/2023 (BugFix)
 12525 0000032F 74F5                    		jz	short auxin_retn
 12526                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12527                                  
 12528                                  arbad:					
 12529 00000331 58                      		pop	ax		; remove return	address	(near call)
 12530                                  		;xor	al, al
 12531                                  		;or	al, 0B0h	; flag_rec_sig|	flag_dsr|flag_cts
 12532                                  		; 11/08/2023
 12533 00000332 B0B0                    		mov	al, 0B0h	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0334h
 12534 00000334 E9A0FD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
 12535

 12537                                  
 12538                                  ;************************************************************************
 12539                                  ;*									*
 12540                                  ;*	aux_rdnd - non-destructive aux port read			*
 12541                                  ;*									*
 12542                                  ;************************************************************************
 12543                                  
 12544                                  aux_rdnd:				; 2C7h:335h = 70h:28A5h
 12545 00000337 E85D00                  		call	getbx

 12547 0000033C 08C0                    		or	al, al		; if al	is non-zero (char in buffer)
 12548 0000033E 7511                    		jnz	short auxdrx	; then return character

 12550 00000343 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; flag_data_ready - test data ready
 12551 00000346 740C                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
 12552 00000348 A820                    		test	al, 20h		; flag_dsr - test data set ready
 12553 0000034A 7408                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
 12554 0000034C E8D8FF                  		call	auxin		; else aux is ready, get character
 12555 0000034F 8807                    		mov	[bx], al
 12556                                  auxdrx:

 12570                                  aux_wrst:				; 2C7h:355h = 70h:28C5h

 12574 0000035E F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; flag_tranhol_emp - test transmit hold	reg empty
 12575 00000361 74F1                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
 12576                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12577                                  		; cf=0	; (test instruction resets cf)
 12578                                  		;clc
 12579 00000363 C3                      		retn

 12583                                  ;*									*
 12584                                  ;*	auxstat - call rom bios to determine aux port status		*
 12585                                  ;*									*
 12586                                  ;*	exit:	ax = status						*
 12587                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
 12588                                  ;*									*
 12589                                  ;************************************************************************

 12591                                  auxstat:				
 12592 00000364 B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; auxfunc_status
 12593                                  
 12594                                  		; fall into auxop
 12595                                  
 12596                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12597                                  
 12598                                  ;************************************************************************
 12599                                  ;*									*
 12600                                  ;*	auxop - perform rom-biox aux port interrupt			*
 12601                                  ;*									*
 12602                                  ;*	entry:	ah = int 14h function number				*
 12603                                  ;*	exit:	ax = results						*
 12604                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
 12605                                  ;*									*
 12606                                  ;************************************************************************
 12607                                  
 12608                                  auxop:		; proc near
 12609                                  		; 20/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0
 12610                                  		;mov	dx, [auxnum]	; ah=function code
 12611                                  		;			; 0=init, 1=send, 2=receive, 3=status
 12612                                  		;			; get port number
 12613                                  		;
 12614                                  		;int	14h		; SERIAL I/O - GET USART STATUS
 12615                                  		;			; DX = port number (0-3)
 12616                                  		;			; Return: AX = port status code
 12617                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
 12618 00000366 1E                      		push	ds
 12619 00000367 FF36[2100]              		push	word [auxnum]
 12620 0000036B 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx ; 0
 12621 0000036D 8EDA                    		mov	ds, dx
 12622 0000036F 5A                      		pop	dx
 12623 00000370 9C                      		pushf			; simulate INT 14h
 12624 00000371 FA                      		cli
 12625                                  		;call	dword ptr ds:50h
 12626 00000372 FF1E5000                		call	far [14h*4]	; INT 14h vector (14h*4 = 50h)
 12627 00000376 1F                      		pop	ds
 12628 00000377 C3                      		retn
 12629                                  
 12630                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12631                                  
 12632                                  ;************************************************************************
 12633                                  ;*									*
 12634                                  ;*	aux_flsh - flush aux input buffer - set contents of		*
 12635                                  ;*		   auxbuf [auxnum] to zero				*
 12636                                  ;*									*
 12637                                  ;*	cas - shouldn't this code call the rom bios input function	*
 12638                                  ;*	      repeatedly until it isn't ready?  to flush out any	*
 12639                                  ;*	      pending serial input queue if there's a tsr like MODE	*
 12640                                  ;*	      which is providing interrupt-buffering of aux port?	*
 12641                                  ;*									*
 12642                                  ;************************************************************************
 12643                                  
 12644                                  aux_flsh:				; 2C7h:36Ch = 70h:28DCh
 12645 00000378 E81C00                  		call	getbx		; flush	aux input buffer
 12646 0000037B C60700                  		mov	byte [bx], 0	; get bx to point to auxbuf
 12647                                  					; zero out buffer
 12648                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
 12649                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12650                                  		; cf=0 ('add' instruction in 'getbx')
 12651 0000037E C3                      		retn
 12652                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12653                                  
 12654                                  ;************************************************************************
 12655                                  ;*									*
 12656                                  ;*	aux_writ - write to aux device					*
 12657                                  ;*									*
 12658                                  ;************************************************************************
 12659                                  
 12660                                  aux_writ:				; 2C7h:374h = 70h:28E4h
 12661                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2	; write	to aux device (if cx > 0)
 12662 0000037F E3A4                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
 12663                                  aux_loop:				
 12664 00000381 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to be written
 12665                                  					; move di pointer to next character
 12666 00000384 47                      		inc	di
 12667 00000385 B401                    		mov	ah, 1		; auxfunc_send - indicates a write
 12668 00000387 E8DCFF                  		call	auxop		; send character over aux port
 12669 0000038A F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; check	for error
 12670 0000038D 7405                    		jz	short awok	; then no error
 12671 0000038F B00A                    		mov	al, 10		; else indicate	write fault
 12672 00000391 E943FD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt	; call error routines
 12673                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12674                                  
 12675                                  awok:					
 12676 00000394 E2EB                    		loop	aux_loop	; if cx	is non-zero,
 12677                                  					; still	more character to print
 12678                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
 12679                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12680                                  		; cf=0 (test instruction above)	
 12681 00000396 C3                      		retn
 12682                                  
 12683                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12684                                  
 12685                                  ;************************************************************************

 12689                                  ;*									*
 12690                                  ;************************************************************************
 12691                                  
 12692                                  getbx:	
 12693 00000397 8B1E[2100]              		mov	bx, [auxnum]	; return bx -> single byte input buffer
 12694                                  					; for selected aux port	([auxnum])
 12695                                  		;add	bx, offset auxbuf
 12696 0000039B 81C3[1600]              		add	bx, auxbuf	; 19/10/2022
 12697                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12698                                  		; cf=0 (if [auxnum] is valid number) 
 12699 0000039F C3                      		retn
