 14813                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14814                                  ;	disk i/o handler
 14815                                  ;
 14816                                  ;	al = drive number (0-6)
 14817                                  ;	ah = media descriptor
 14818                                  ;	cx = sector count
 14819                                  ;	dx = first sector (low)
 14820                                  ;	[start_sec_h] = first sector (high)  32 bit calculation.
 14821                                  ;	ds = cs
 14822                                  ;	es:di = transfer address
 14823                                  ;	[rflag]=operation (2=read, 3=write)
 14824                                  ;	[verify]=1 for verify after write
 14825                                  ;
 14826                                  ;	if successful carry flag = 0
 14827                                  ;	  else cf=1 and al contains error code
 14828                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14829                                  
 14830                                  		; 12/12/2023
 14831                                  		; ds = biosdata segment (cs = bioscode segment)
 14832                                  diskrd:	
 14833                                  		;mov	ds:rflag, 2	; romread
 14834                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14835 00000A0C C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2 ; romread
 14836                                  
 14837                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14838                                  
 14839                                  		; 22/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0
 14840                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0A30h
 14841                                  ; 22/12/2023
 14842                                  %if 0
 14843                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14844                                  diskio:
 14845                                  		mov	bx, di		; es:bx	= transfer address
 14846                                  		mov	[xfer_seg], es	; save transfer	segment
 14847                                  		call	SetDrive
 14848                                  		mov	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 14849                                  		mov	[medbyt], al
 14850                                  		;jcxz	short ioret
 14851                                  		jcxz	ioret
 14852                                  
 14853                                  ; see if the media is formatted or not by checking the flags field in
 14854                                  ; in the bds. if it is unformatted we cannot allow i/o, so we should
 14855                                  ; go to the error exit at label unformatteddrive.
 14856                                  
 14857                                  		test	byte [es:di+24h], 2
 14858                                  		;test	byte ptr es:[di+24h], 2	; [es:di+BDS.flags+1]
 14859                                  					; unformatted_media
 14860                                  		jnz	short unformatteddrive
 14861                                  		mov	[seccnt], cx	; save sector count
 14862                                  		mov	[spsav], sp	; save sp
 14863                                  
 14864                                  ; ensure that we are trying to access valid sectors on the drive
 14865                                  
 14866                                  		mov	ax, dx
 14867                                  		xor	si, si ; 0
 14868                                  		add	dx, cx
 14869                                  		;adc	si, 0
 14870                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 14871                                  		rcl	si, 1
 14872                                  		cmp	word [es:di+0Eh], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs16]
 14873                                  					; 32 bit sector ?
 14874                                  		jz	short sanity32
 14875                                  		;cmp	si, 0
 14876                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14877                                  		or	si, si
 14878                                  		jnz	short baddrive
 14879                                  		cmp	dx, [es:di+0Eh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs16]
 14880                                  		ja	short baddrive
 14881                                  		jmp	short sanityok
 14882                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14883                                  
 14884                                  sanity32:
 14885                                  		add	si, [start_sec_h]
 14886                                  		cmp	si, [es:di+1Dh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs32+2]
 14887                                  		jb	short sanityok
 14888                                  		ja	short baddrive
 14889                                  		cmp	dx, [es:di+1Bh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs32]
 14890                                  		ja	short baddrive
 14891                                  sanityok:
 14892                                  		mov	dx, [start_sec_h]
 14893                                  		add	ax, [es:di+17h]	; [es:di+BDS.hiddensecs]
 14894                                  		adc	dx, [es:di+19h]	; [es:di+BDS.hiddensecs+2]
 14895                                  
 14896                                  ; now dx;ax have the physical first sector.
 14897                                  ; since the following procedures is going to destroy ax, let's
 14898                                  ; save it temporarily to saved_word.
 14899                                  
 14900                                  		mov	[saved_word], ax ; save the sector number (low)
 14901                                  
 14902                                  ; set up pointer to disk base table in [dpt]. we cannot assume that iosetup
 14903                                  ; will do it because we will skip the set up stuff with hard disks.
 14904                                  
 14905                                  		push	es
 14906                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]
 14907                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14908                                  		xor	si, si ; 0
 14909                                  		mov	es, si
 14910                                  		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 14911                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 14912                                  					; current disk parm table

 14914                                  		mov	[dpt+2], es
 14915                                  		pop	es
 14916                                  		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14917                                  					; fnon_removable
 14918                                  		jnz	short skip_setup
 14919                                  		call	checksingle
 14920                                  
 14921                                  ; check to see if we have previously noted a change line. the routine
 14922                                  ; returns if everything is ok. otherwise, it pops off the stack and returns
 14923                                  ; the proper error code.
 14924                                  
 14925                                  		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0 ; do we have changeline support?
 14926                                  		jz	short diskio_nochangeline ; brif not
 14927                                  		call	checklatchio	; will do a sneaky pop stack return
 14928                                  					; if a disk error occurs
 14929                                  diskio_nochangeline:			
 14930                                  		call	iosetup		; set up tables	and variables for i/o
 14931                                  
 14932                                  ; now the settle values are correct for the following code
 14933                                  
 14934                                  skip_setup:
 14935                                  
 14936                                  ; 32 bit sector calculation.
 14937                                  ; dx:[saved_word] = starting sector number.
 14938                                  				
 14939                                  		mov	ax, dx
 14940                                  		xor	dx, dx
 14941                                  		;div	word [es:di+13h] ; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 14942                                  					 ; divide by sec per track
 14943                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14944                                  		mov	cx, [es:di+13h]
 14945                                  		div	cx
 14946                                  		mov	[temp_h], ax
 14947                                  		mov	ax, [saved_word]
 14948                                  		div	cx ; 02/09/2023
 14949                                  		;div	word [es:di+13h] ; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 14950                                  					; now, [temp_h]:ax = track #, dx = sector
 14951                                  		;inc	dl		; sector number	is 1 based.
 14952                                  		; 18/12/2022
 14953                                  		inc	dx
 14954                                  		mov	[cursec], dl	; save current sector
 14955                                  		mov	cx, [es:di+15h]	; es:di+BDS.heads]
 14956                                  					; get number of	heads
 14957                                  		push	ax
 14958                                  		xor	dx, dx
 14959                                  		mov	ax, [temp_h]	; divide tracks	by heads per cylinder
 14960                                  		div	cx
 14961                                  		mov	[temp_h], ax
 14962                                  		pop	ax
 14963                                  		div	cx		; now, [temp_h]:ax = cylinder #, dx = head
 14964                                  		cmp	word [temp_h], 0
 14965                                  		ja	short baddrive_brdg
 14966                                  		cmp	ax, 1024	; 2^10 currently maxium	for track #.
 14967                                  		ja	short baddrive_brdg
 14968                                  		mov	[curhd], dl	; save current head
 14969                                  		mov	[curtrk], ax	; save current track
 14970                                  
 14971                                  ; we are now set up for the i/o. normally, we consider the dma boundary
 14972                                  ; violations here. not true. we perform the operation as if everything is
 14973                                  ; symmetric; let the int 13 handler worry about the dma violations.
 14974                                  
 14975                                  		mov	ax, [seccnt]
 14976                                  		call	block		; (cas - call/ret)
 14977                                  		;call	done
 14978                                  		;retn
 14979                                  		; 18/12/2022
 14980                                  		jmp	done
 14981                                  %else
 14982                                  		;;;	; 22/12/2023
 14983                                  diskio:

 14985                                  					; cx = sector count

 14988                                  					;

 14991 00000A17 E88AFB                  		call	SetDrive

 15624                                  ; check the error returned in ah to see if it is a soft ecc error.
 15625                                  ; if it is not we needn't do anything special. if it is a soft
 15626                                  ; ecc error then decrement the soft_ecc_cnt error retry count. if
 15627                                  ; this retry count becomes 0 then we just ignore the error and go to

 15829                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15830                                  
 15831                                  ; this routine is called if an error occurs while formatting or verifying.
 15832                                  ; it resets the drive,and decrements the retry count.
 15833                                  ; on entry - ds:di - points to bds for the drive
 15834                                  ;	     bp    - contains retry count
 15835                                  ; on exit    flags indicate result of decrementing retry count

 15837                                  again:

 15843 00000DE9 C3                      		retn

 15950 00000E75 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; timeout (not ready)
 15951 00000E78 7406                    		je	short ioctl_input_5
 15952                                  ioctl_input_4:
 15953 00000E7A 26895D01                		mov	[es:di+1], bx
 15954 00000E7E EBB9                    		jmp	short ioctl_lock_err
 15955                                  ioctl_input_5:
 15956 00000E80 81CB0108                		or	bx, 801h	; bit 0 error bit (1 = error, 31h or 80h)
 15957                                  					; bit 11 (not ready -removable media error- bit)
 15958                                  					; if bit 11 = 0, another error (except 31h and 80h)

 15977                                  ;      This function is intended to give the user to control the

 16103                                  ;
 16104                                  ;    input: AL contains logical drive
 16105                                  ;
 16106                                  ;	functions are dispatched through a call. On return, carry indicates
 16107                                  ;	error code in al. Note::bES:b& ds undefined on return from

 16524                                  
 16525                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16526                                  ; FormatTrack:
 16527                                  ; if specialfunction byte is 1,then this is a status call to see if there is
 16528                                  ; rom support for the combination of sec/trk and # of cyln,and if the
 16529                                  ; combination is legal. if specialfunction byte is 0,then format the track.
 16530                                  ;
 16531                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 16532                                  ;
 16533                                  ; output:
 16534                                  ;	for status call:
 16535                                  ;	specialfunction byte set to:
 16536                                  ;		0 - rom support + legal combination
 16537                                  ;		1 - no rom support
 16538                                  ;		2 - illegal combination
 16539                                  ;		3 - no media present
 16540                                  ;	carry cleared.
 16541                                  ;
 16542                                  ;	for format track:
 16543                                  ;		carry set if error
 16544                                  ;
 16545                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16546                                  
 16547                                  ; 16/03/2019
 16548                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 16549                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:10B7h)
 16550                                  
 16551                                  		; 19/10/2022
 16552                                  FormatTrack:
 16553 0000106C C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 16554 00001070 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET
 16555 00001073 F60701                  		test	byte [bx], 1	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 16556                                  					; STATUS_FOR_FORMAT
 16557 00001076 740E                    		jz	short DoFormatTrack
 16558 00001078 1E                      		push	ds
 16559                                  		; 17/10/2022
 16560 00001079 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 16561                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 16562 0000107E E82502                  		call	SetMediaForFormat ; Also moves current Dpt to TempDpt
 16563 00001081 1F                      		pop	ds
 16564 00001082 8807                    		mov	[bx], al	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 16565 00001084 F8                      		clc
 16566 00001085 C3                      		retn
 16567                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16568                                  
 16569                                  DoFormatTrack:
 16570                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 16571 00001086 26807D3E05              		cmp	byte [es:di+3Eh], 5				
 16572                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+34], 5 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 16573                                  					; DEV_HARDDISK
 16574 0000108B 7508                    		jnz	short DoFormatDiskette
 16575                                  		; 17/10/2022
 16576 0000108D 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 16577                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 16578                                  					; Point	to Bios_Data (at 2C7h:30h or 70h:25A0h)

 16580                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16581                                  
 16582                                  DoFormatDiskette:

 16585 0000109B F60702                  		test	byte [bx], 2
 16586                                  		; 17/10/2022
 16587 0000109E 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 16588                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 16589                                  					; Setup	ds-> Bios_Data for verify
 16590 000010A3 7403                    		jz	short DoFormatDiskette_1
 16591 000010A5 E9E500                  		jmp	VerifyTrack_Err

 16594                                  DoFormatDiskette_1:
 16595 000010A8 E8FB01                  		call	SetMediaForFormat ; Also moves current Dpt to TempDpt
 16596 000010AB 3C01                    		cmp	al, 1		;  ROM support for sec/trk,# trks comb?
 16597 000010AD 7406                    		jz	short NeedToSetDasd ; Old rom
 16598 000010AF 3C03                    		cmp	al, 3		; Time out error?
 16599 000010B1 7507                    		jnz	short NoSetDasd	; No,fine. (at this point, don't care
 16600                                  					; about	the illegal combination)
 16601 000010B3 EB68                    		jmp	short FormatFailed
 16602                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16603                                  
 16604                                  NeedToSetDasd:
 16605 000010B5 52                      		push	dx
 16606 000010B6 E89001                  		call	SetDasd		; INT 13h, AH=17h
 16607 000010B9 5A                      		pop	dx
 16608                                  NoSetDasd:
 16609 000010BA E8BAF8                  		call	checksingle	; Do any needed	diskette swapping
 16610 000010BD 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx		; Get track from packet
 16611 000010BF A3[3901]                		mov	[trknum], ax
 16612 000010C2 880E[3801]              		mov	[hdnum], cl	; Store	head from packet
 16613 000010C6 88CC                    		mov	ah, cl
 16614 000010C8 BB[AC04]                		mov	bx, tracktable
 16615 000010CB 8B0E[AA04]              		mov	cx, [sectorspertrack]
 16616                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 16617 000010CF E307                    		jcxz	set_fmt_retry_count
 16618                                  StoreCylinderHead:
 16619 000010D1 8907                    		mov	[bx], ax	; Store	into TrackTable
 16620 000010D3 83C304                  		add	bx, 4		; Skip to next sector field
 16621 000010D6 E2F9                    		loop	StoreCylinderHead
 16622                                  set_fmt_retry_count:	; 24/12/2023
 16623                                  		;mov	cx, 5		; MAXERR - Set up retry	count
 16624                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16625 000010D8 B105                    		mov	cl, 5
 16626                                  FormatRetry:
 16627 000010DA 51                      		push	cx
 16628 000010DB BB[AC04]                		mov	bx, tracktable
 16629 000010DE A0[AA04]                		mov	al, [sectorspertrack]
 16630 000010E1 B405                    		mov	ah, 5		; romformat
 16631 000010E3 8C1E[A804]              		mov	[xfer_seg], ds
 16632 000010E7 E86602                  		call	ToRom
 16633 000010EA 59                      		pop	cx
 16634 000010EB 7216                    		jb	short FormatError
 16635 000010ED 51                      		push	cx		; Now verify the sectors just formatted.
 16636                                  					; NOTE:	because	of bug in some BIOSes we have to
 16637                                  					;	set ES:BX to 00:00
 16638 000010EE 53                      		push	bx
 16639 000010EF 31DB                    		xor	bx, bx
 16640 000010F1 891E[A804]              		mov	[xfer_seg], bx
 16641 000010F5 A0[AA04]                		mov	al, [sectorspertrack]
 16642 000010F8 B404                    		mov	ah, 4		; romverify
 16643 000010FA B101                    		mov	cl, 1
 16644 000010FC E85102                  		call	ToRom
 16645 000010FF 5B                      		pop	bx
 16646 00001100 59                      		pop	cx
 16647 00001101 7329                    		jnb	short FormatOk
 16648                                  FormatError:
 16649 00001103 E83402                  		call	ResetDisk
 16650 00001106 C606[AA05]01            		mov	byte [had_format_error], 1
 16651 0000110B 50                      		push	ax
 16652 0000110C 51                      		push	cx
 16653 0000110D 52                      		push	dx
 16654 0000110E E89501                  		call	SetMediaForFormat
 16655 00001111 3C01                    		cmp	al, 1
 16656 00001113 7503                    		jnz	short WhileErr
 16657 00001115 E83101                  		call	SetDasd
 16658                                  WhileErr:
 16659 00001118 5A                      		pop	dx
 16660 00001119 59                      		pop	cx
 16661 0000111A 58                      		pop	ax
 16662 0000111B E2BD                    		loop	FormatRetry
 16663                                  FormatFailed:
 16664 0000111D C606[AA05]01            		mov	byte [had_format_error], 1
 16665                                  					; Set the format error flag
 16666 00001122 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6		; DSK_CHANGELINE_ERR - convert change line
 16667 00001125 7502                    		jnz	short DoMapIt	; Error	to time	out error
 16668 00001127 B480                    		mov	ah, 80h		; DSK_TIMEOUT_ERR
 16669                                  DoMapIt:

 16671                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16672                                  
 16673                                  FormatOk:

 16680                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16681                                  ;
 16682                                  ; VerifyTrack:
 16683                                  ;
 16684                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 16685                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16686                                  
 16687                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 16688                                  VerifyTrack:
 16689 00001132 1E                      		push	ds
 16690 00001133 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX points to request header.
 16691 00001137 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 16692                                  
 16693                                  		; Come here with DS:[BX] -> packet, ES:[DI] -> bds
 16694                                  
 16695 0000113A 8B4F03                  		mov	cx, [bx+3]	; [bx+A_VERIFYPACKET.VP_CYLINDER]
 16696 0000113D 8B4701                  		mov	ax, [bx+1]	; [bx+A_VERIFYPACKET.VP_HEAD]
 16697 00001140 8B5705                  		mov	dx, [bx+5]	; [bx+A_FORMATPACKET.FP_TRACKCOUNT]
 16698 00001143 8A1F                    		mov	bl, [bx]	; [bx+A_FORMATPACKET.FP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 16699                                  					; Get option flag word
 16700 00001145 1F                      		pop	ds
 16701 00001146 C606[2001]04            		mov	byte [rflag], 4	; romverify
 16702 0000114B 890E[3301]              		mov	[curtrk], cx
 16703 0000114F A2[3201]                		mov	[curhd], al	; ASSUME heads < 256
 16704 00001152 8B0E[AA04]              		mov	cx, [sectorspertrack]
 16705                                  
 16706                                  		; Check specialfunctions to see if DO_FAST_FORMAT has been
 16707                                  		; specified if not we should go to the normal track verification
 16708                                  		; routine. If fast format has been specified we should get the
 16709                                  		; number of tracks to be verified and check it to see if it is
 16710                                  		; > 255. If it is then it is an error and we should go to
 16711                                  		; VerifyTrack_Err. If not multiply the number of tracks by the
 16712                                  		; sectors per track to get the total number of sectors to be
 16713                                  		; verified. This should also be less than equal to 255
 16714                                  		; otherwise we go to same error exit. If everything is okay
 16715                                  		; we initalise cx to the total sectors. use ax as a temporary
 16716                                  		; register.
 16717                                  
 16718                                  					; Special function requested?	
 16719 00001156 F6C302                  		test	bl, 2		; DO_FAST_FORMAT
 16720 00001159 7421                    		jz	short NormVerifyTrack
 16721 0000115B 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx		; Get ax = number of trks to verify
 16722 0000115D 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 16723 0000115F 752C                    		jnz	short VerifyTrack_Err ; #tracks > 255
 16724 00001161 F6E1                    		mul	cl
 16725 00001163 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 16726 00001165 7526                    		jnz	short VerifyTrack_Err ; #sectors > 255	
 16727 00001167 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax
 16728                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16729 00001169 26F6453F01              		test	byte [es:di+3Fh], 1 ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM
 16730                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16731                                  		;test	byte [es:di+35], 1
 16732                                  		;;test	word [es:di+35], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 16733                                  					; fnon_removable
 16734 0000116E 740C                    		jz	short NormVerifyTrack
 16735                                  					; Multitrack operation = on?
 16736                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16737                                  		; 19/10/2022
 16738 00001170 F606[A004]80            		test	byte [multrk_flag], 80h
 16739                                  		;test	word [multrk_flag], 80h ; MULTI_TRK_ON
 16740                                  		;;test	ds:multrk_flag,	80h ; MULTI_TRK_ON
 16741 00001175 7405                    		jz	short NormVerifyTrack
 16742 00001177 C606[A704]01            		mov	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 1
 16743                                  NormVerifyTrack:
 16744 0000117C 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax		; 1st sector
 16745 0000117E 31DB                    		xor	bx, bx
 16746 00001180 891E[A804]              		mov	[xfer_seg], bx	; Use 0:0 as the transfer address for verify
 16747 00001184 E83F00                  		call	TrackIo
 16748 00001187 C606[A704]00            		mov	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 0
 16749 0000118C C3                      		retn
 16750                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16751                                  
 16752                                  VerifyTrack_Err:

 16757                                  ; 16/10/2022

 16789                                  ;
 16790                                  ; input:
 16791                                  ;    ES:di points to bds for drive
 16792                                  ;    rFlag - 2 for read,3 for write
 16793                                  ;
 16794                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16795                                  
 16796                                  ReadWriteTrack:	
 16797                                  		; save bds pointer segment so we can use it to access
 16798                                  		; our packet. Notice that this is not the standard register
 16799                                  		; assignment for accessing packets
 16800                                  		
 16801                                  		; 19/10/2022
 16802 0000119E 06                      		push	es
 16803 0000119F C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	-> to request header
 16804 000011A3 26C45F13                		les	bx, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 16805 000011A7 268B4703                		mov	ax, [es:bx+3]	; [es:bx+A_TRACKREADWRITEPACKET.TRWP_CYLINDER]
 16806 000011AB A3[3301]                		mov	[curtrk], ax
 16807 000011AE 268B4701                		mov	ax, [es:bx+1]	; [es:bx+A_TRACKREADWRITEPACKET.TRWP_HEAD]
 16808 000011B2 A2[3201]                		mov	[curhd], al	; Assume heads < 256!!!
 16809 000011B5 268B4705                		mov	ax, [es:bx+5]	; [es:bx+A_TRACKREADWRITEPACKET.TRWP_FIRSTSECTOR]
 16810 000011B9 268B4F07                		mov	cx, [es:bx+7]	; [es:bx+A_TRACKREADWRITEPACKET.TRWP_SECTORSTOREADWRITE]
 16811 000011BD 26C45F09                		les	bx, [es:bx+9]	; [es:bx+A_TRACKREADWRITEPACKET.TRWP_TRANSFERADDRESS]
 16812                                  					; Get transfer address
 16813                                  
 16814                                  		; we just trashed our packet address, but we no longer care
 16815                                  
 16816 000011C1 8C06[A804]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es	; Pass transfer	segment
 16817 000011C5 07                      		pop	es
 16818                                  
 16819                                  		; Fall into TrackIo
 16820                                  
 16821                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16822                                  
 16823                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 16824                                  
 16825                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16826                                  ;
 16827                                  ; TrackIo:
 16828                                  ;    performs track read/write/verify
 16829                                  ;
 16830                                  ;   input:
 16831                                  ;      rFlag	- 2 = read
 16832                                  ;		  3 = write
 16833                                  ;		  4 = verify
 16834                                  ;      AX	- Index into track table of first sector to io
 16835                                  ;      CX	- Number of sectors to io
 16836                                  ;      Xfer_Seg:BX - Transfer address
 16837                                  ;      ES:DI	- Pointer to bds
 16838                                  ;      CurTrk	- Current cylinder
 16839                                  ;      CurHd	- Current head
 16840                                  ;
 16841                                  ; ==========================================================================
 16842                                  
 16843                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 16844                                  
 16845                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0		
 16846                                  
 16847                                  		; 19/10/2022
 16848                                  TrackIo:
 16849                                  					; Procedure `disk' will pop stack to
 16850 000011C6 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; SpSav	and return if error
 16851 000011CA E8AAF7                  		call	checksingle	; Ensure correct disk is in drv
 16852 000011CD 803E[A905]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 16853                                  					; See if we have already set	disk
 16854 000011D2 7407                    		jz	short Dptalreadyset ; base table
 16855 000011D4 50                      		push	ax		; set up tables	and variables for i/o
 16856 000011D5 51                      		push	cx
 16857 000011D6 E8A1F9                  		call	iosetup
 16858 000011D9 59                      		pop	cx
 16859 000011DA 58                      		pop	ax
 16860                                  Dptalreadyset:				; Point si at the table entry of the			
 16861 000011DB BE[AC04]                		mov	si, tracktable	; first sector to be io'd
 16862                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16863                                  		;add	ax, ax		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM
 16864                                  		;add	ax, ax
 16865 000011DE D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 16866 000011E0 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 16867 000011E2 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 16868                                  
 16869                                  		; WE WANT:
 16870                                  		; CX to	be the number of times we have to loop
 16871                                  		; DX to	be the number of sectors we read on each iteration
 16872                                  		
 16873 000011E4 BA0100                  		mov	dx, 1
 16874                                  
 16875                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16876 000011E7 26F6453F08              		test	byte [es:di+3Fh], 8 ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM
 16877                                  		; 12/12/2022
 16878                                  		;test	byte [es:di+23h], 8
 16879                                  		;;test	word [es:di+35], 8 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 16880                                  					; good_tracklayout
 16881 000011EC 7402                    		jz	short ionextsector
 16882                                  		
 16883 000011EE 87D1                    		xchg	dx, cx		; HEY! We can read all secs in one blow
 16884                                  ionextsector:
 16885 000011F0 51                      		push	cx
 16886 000011F1 52                      		push	dx
 16887 000011F2 46                      		inc	si
 16888 000011F3 46                      		inc	si		; Skip over the	cylinder and head in
 16889                                  					; the track table
 16890 000011F4 AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector ID	from track table
 16891 000011F5 A2[3101]                		mov	[cursec], al
 16892                                  
 16893                                  		; assumptions for a fixed disk multi-track disk	i/o
 16894                                  		; 1). In the input CX (# of sectors to go) to TrackIo,
 16895                                  		;     only CL is valid.
 16896                                  		; 2). Sector size should be set	to 512 bytes.
 16897                                  		; 3). Good track layout
 16898                                  		
 16899                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16900 000011F8 26F6453F01              		test	byte [es:di+3Fh], 1 ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM
 16901                                  		; 12/12/2022
 16902                                  		;test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 16903                                  		;;test	word [es:di+35], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 16904                                  					; fnon_removable ; Fixed disk?
 16905 000011FD 7414                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No
 16906                                  
 16907                                  		; 12/12/2022
 16908 000011FF F606[A004]80            		test	byte [multrk_flag], 80h
 16909                                  		;test	word [multrk_flag], 80h ; MULTI_TRK_ON
 16910                                  						; Allow multi-track operation?
 16911 00001204 740D                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No,don't do that.
 16912 00001206 8916[2201]              		mov	[seccnt], dx
 16913 0000120A 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 16914 0000120C E826FA                  		call	Disk
 16915 0000120F 5A                      		pop	dx
 16916 00001210 59                      		pop	cx
 16917 00001211 F8                      		clc
 16918 00001212 C3                      		retn
 16919                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16920                                  
 16921                                  IoRemovable:
 16922 00001213 AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector size index	from track
 16923                                  					; table	and save it
 16924 00001214 50                      		push	ax
 16925 00001215 56                      		push	si
 16926 00001216 1E                      		push	ds		; Save Bios_Data
 16927 00001217 50                      		push	ax
 16928 00001218 8A26[2C01]              		mov	ah, [eot]	; Preserve whatever might be in	ah
 16929                                  					; Fetch	EOT while ds-> Bios_Data
 16930 0000121C C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 16931 00001220 884403                  		mov	[si+3],	al	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_SECTOR_SIZ]
 16932 00001223 886404                  		mov	[si+4],	ah	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]
 16933 00001226 58                      		pop	ax
 16934 00001227 1F                      		pop	ds

 16936 0000122A A3[2201]                		mov	[seccnt], ax
 16937 0000122D E805FA                  		call	Disk
 16938 00001230 5E                      		pop	si		; Advance buffer pointer by adding
 16939                                  					; sector size
 16940                                  		;pop	ax
 16941                                  		; 24/12/2023
 16942 00001231 59                      		pop	cx
 16943                                  
 16944                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 16945                                  		;call	SectorSizeIndexToSectorSize
 16946                                  		;mov	cl, al	; 24/12/2023
 16947 00001232 B88000                  		mov	ax, 128
 16948 00001235 D3E0                    		shl	ax, cl
 16949                                  
 16950 00001237 01C3                    		add	bx, ax
 16951 00001239 5A                      		pop	dx
 16952 0000123A 59                      		pop	cx
 16953 0000123B E2B3                    		loop	ionextsector
 16954 0000123D 803E[A905]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 16955                                  		;jz	short NoNeedDone
 16956                                  		; 12/12/2022
 16957 00001242 7404                    		je	short NoNeedDone2
 16958 00001244 E87AF9                  		call	done		; set time of last access, and reset
 16959                                  					; entries in Dpt.
 16960                                  NoNeedDone:
 16961 00001247 F8                      		clc	; not necessary ('done' clears cf) ; 24/12/2023
 16962                                  NoNeedDone2:
 16963 00001248 C3                      		retn

 16965                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16966                                  
 16967                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16968                                  ;
 16969                                  ; The sector size in bytes needs to be converted to an index value for the ibm
 16970                                  ; rom. (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024). It is assumed that only these values
 16971                                  ; are permissible.
 16972                                  ;
 16973                                  ; On Input   AX contains sector size in bytes
 16974                                  ; On Output  AL Contains index
 16975                                  ; All other registers preserved
 16976                                  ;
 16977                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 16980                                  ;SectSizeToSectIndex:

 16985                                  ;		retn

 16991                                  ;		retn

 16998                                  ;		mov	ax, 128
 16999                                  ;		shl	ax, cl
 17000                                  ;		retn
 17001                                  
 17002                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 17003                                  
 17004                                  ; 16/10/2022
 17005                                  
 17006                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17007                                  ;
 17008                                  ; SetDASD
 17009                                  ;
 17010                                  ; Set up the rom for formatting.
 17011                                  ; we have to tell the rom bios what type of disk is in the drive.
 17012                                  ;
 17013                                  ; On Input   - ES:di - Points to bds
 17014                                  ;
 17015                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17016                                  
 17017                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 17018                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:129Bh)
 17019                                  
 17020                                  		; 19/10/2022
 17021                                  SetDasd:
 17022 00001249 803E[AA05]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1 ;
 17023                                  					; See if we've previously set dasd type
 17024 0000124E 740C                    		jz	short DoSetDasd
 17025                                  		; 24/12/2023
 17026 00001250 26F6453F80              		test	byte [es:di+3Fh], 80h
 17027                                  		; 10/12/2022
 17028                                  		;test	byte [es:di+23h], 80h
 17029                                  		;;test	word [es:di+23h], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 17030                                  					; set_dasd_true
 17031 00001255 7446                    		jz	short DasdHasBeenSet
 17032                                  		; 24/12/2023
 17033 00001257 2680653F7F              		and	byte [es:di+3Fh], 7Fh
 17034                                  		; 10/12/2022
 17035                                  		;and	byte [es:di+23h], 7Fh
 17036                                  		;;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FF7Fh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 17037                                  					; ~set_dasd_true
 17038                                  DoSetDasd:
 17039 0000125C C606[AA05]00            		mov	byte [had_format_error], 0 ; Reset it
 17040 00001261 C606[3B01]50            		mov	byte [gap_patch], 50h ; Format gap for 48tpi disks
 17041 00001266 B004                    		mov	al, 4
 17042                                  		; 24/12/2023
 17043 00001268 268A653E                		mov	ah, [es:di+3Eh]
 17044                                  		; 02/09/2023
 17045                                  		;mov	ah, [es:di+22h] ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 17046 0000126C 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2
 17047                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 17048                                  					; DEV_3INCH720KB
 17049 0000126F 7414                    		jz	short DoSet
 17050                                  		; 24/12/2023
 17051 00001271 B001                    		mov	al, 1
 17052                                  		;cmp	ah, 1
 17053 00001273 38C4                    		cmp	ah, al	; 1
 17054                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 17055                                  					; DEV_5INCH96TPI
 17056                                  		;jz	short GotBig
 17057                                  		; 24/12/2023
 17058                                  		;mov	al, 1
 17059                                  		;jmp	short DoSet
 17060                                  		; 02/09/2023
 17061 00001275 750E                    		jnz	short DoSet
 17062                                  GotBig:
 17063                                  		;mov	al, 2		; 160/320k in a	1.2 meg	drive
 17064                                  		; 02/09/2023
 17065 00001277 40                      		inc	ax  ; mov al, 2
 17066 00001278 803E[A805]00            		cmp	byte [mediatype], 0
 17067 0000127D 7506                    		jnz	short DoSet
 17068                                  		;mov	al, 3		; 1.2meg in a 1.2meg drive
 17069                                  		; 10/12/2022
 17070                                  		;inc	al  ; al = 3
 17071                                  		; 18/12/2022
 17072 0000127F 40                      		inc	ax  ; al = 3
 17073 00001280 C606[3B01]54            		mov	byte [gap_patch], 54h
 17074                                  DoSet:
 17075 00001285 1E                      		push	ds
 17076 00001286 56                      		push	si
 17077                                  
 17078                                  		;mov	ds, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vectors
 17079                                  		; 02/09/2023
 17080 00001287 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 17081 00001289 8EDE                    		mov	ds, si	; 0
 17082                                  
 17083 0000128B C5367800                		lds	si, [DSKADR]
 17084                                  		;lds	si, [78h]	; [DSKADR]  (Int 1Eh)
 17085                                  		;;lds	si, ds:78h
 17086                                  
 17087 0000128F C644090F                		mov	byte [si+9], 0Fh ;
 17088                                  					; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 17089 00001293 5E                      		pop	si
 17090 00001294 1F                      		pop	ds
 17091 00001295 B417                    		mov	ah, 17h
 17092 00001297 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]
 17093 0000129B CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	SET TYPE (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS
 17094                                  					; AL = disk type AL = 03h - high-capacity disk in high-capacity	drive
 17095                                  DasdHasBeenSet:
 17096 0000129D 268A6513                		mov	ah, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 17097 000012A1 8826[3701]              		mov	[formt_eot], ah
 17098 000012A5 C3                      		retn
 17099                                  
 17100                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 17101                                  
 17102                                  ; 16/10/2022
 17103                                  
 17104                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17105                                  ;
 17106                                  ; Set Media Type for Format
 17107                                  ; Performs the int 13 with ah = 18h to see if the medium described in the
 17108                                  ; BPB area in the BDS can be handled by the rom.
 17109                                  ; On Input, ES:DI -> current BDS.
 17110                                  ; The status of the operation is returned in AL
 17111                                  ;
 17112                                  ;	- 0 - if the support is available,and the combination is valid.
 17113                                  ;	- 1 - no rom support
 17114                                  ;	- 2 - illegal combination
 17115                                  ;	- 3 - no media present (rom support exists but cannot determine now)
 17116                                  ;
 17117                                  ; Flags also may be altered. All other registers preserved.
 17118                                  ; If the call to rom returns no error,then the current Dpt is "replaced" by
 17119                                  ; the one returned by the rom. This is Done by changing the pointer in [Dpt]
 17120                                  ; to the one returned. the original pointer to the disk base table is stored
 17121                                  ; in TempDpt, until it is restored.
 17122                                  ;
 17123                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17124                                  
 17125                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 17126                                  
 17127                                  		; 19/10/2022
 17128                                  SetMediaForFormat:	
 17129 000012A6 51                      		push	cx
 17130 000012A7 52                      		push	dx
 17131                                  
 17132                                  		; If we have a format error, then do not change Dpt, TempDpt.
 17133                                  		; but we need to call int 13h, ah=18h again.
 17134                                  
 17135 000012A8 803E[AA05]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 17136 000012AD 7425                    		jz	short SkipSaveDskAdr
 17137 000012AF 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; If already done return 0
 17138 000012B1 803E[A905]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 17139 000012B6 7502                    		jnz	short DoSetMediaForFormat
 17140 000012B8 EB7D                    		jmp	SetMediaRet	; Media	already	set
 17141                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17142                                  
 17143                                  DoSetMediaForFormat:
 17144 000012BA 06                      		push	es
 17145 000012BB 56                      		push	si
 17146                                  
 17147                                  		; 02/09/2023
 17148                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point to interrupt vectors
 17149 000012BC 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 17150 000012BE 8EC6                    		mov	es, si
 17151                                  
 17152 000012C0 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 17153                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 17154                                  					; Get pointer to disk base table
 17155 000012C5 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 17156 000012C9 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 17157                                  
 17158                                  		; Initialize the head settle time to 0Fh. See the offsets
 17159                                  		; given in dskprm.inc.
 17160                                  
 17161 000012CD 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 17162 000012D2 5E                      		pop	si
 17163 000012D3 07                      		pop	es
 17164                                  SkipSaveDskAdr:
 17165                                  		; 24/12/2023
 17166 000012D4 268B4D41                		mov	cx, [es:di+41h]	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
 17167                                  		;mov	cx, [es:di+25h]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 17168 000012D8 49                      		dec	cx
 17169 000012D9 80E503                  		and	ch, 3
 17170 000012DC D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 17171 000012DE D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 17172 000012E0 86E9                    		xchg	ch, cl
 17173 000012E2 260A4D13                		or	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 17174 000012E6 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 17175 000012EA 06                      		push	es
 17176 000012EB 1E                      		push	ds
 17177 000012EC 56                      		push	si
 17178 000012ED 57                      		push	di
 17179 000012EE B418                    		mov	ah, 18h
 17180 000012F0 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - SET MEDIA TYPE	FOR FORMAT (AT model 3x9,XT2,XT286,PS)
 17181                                  					; DL = drive number, CH	= lower	8 bits of number of tracks, CL = sectors per track
 17182 000012F2 7231                    		jc	short FormaStatErr
 17183 000012F4 803E[AA05]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 17184 000012F9 7423                    		jz	short skip_disk_base_setting
 17185 000012FB 06                      		push	es		; Save segment returned	by the rom
 17186                                  
 17187                                  		; 02/09/2023
 17188                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vector segment
 17189 000012FC 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 17190 000012FE 8EC6                    		mov	es, si ; 0
 17191 00001300 06                      		push	es ; * ; 02/09/2023
 17192                                  
 17193 00001301 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 17194                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR] (Int 1Eh)
 17195                                  					; Get current disk base	table
 17196 00001306 8936[AB05]              		mov	[tempdpt], si
 17197 0000130A 8C06[AD05]              		mov	[tempdpt+2], es ; Save it
 17198                                  
 17199                                  		; 02/09/2023
 17200                                  		;;mov	es, [zeroseg]
 17201                                  		;xor	si, si ; 0
 17202                                  		;mov	es, si
 17203 0000130E 07                      		pop	es ; * ; 02/09/2023
 17204                                  
 17205                                  		;mov	es:78h,	di
 17206 0000130F 26893E7800              		mov	[es:DSKADR], di
 17207                                  		;pop	word ptr es:7Ah	; replace with one returned by rom
 17208 00001314 268F067A00              		pop	word [es:DSKADR+2]
 17209 00001319 C606[A905]01            		mov	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 17210                                  skip_disk_base_setting:
 17211 0000131E 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; Legal	combination + rom support code
 17212                                  		;mov	ds:had_format_error, al	; Reset	the flag
 17213 00001320 A2[AA05]                		mov	[had_format_error], al
 17214 00001323 EB0E                    		jmp	short PopStatRet
 17215                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17216                                  
 17217                                  FormaStatErr:
 17218                                  		; 10/12/2022
 17219 00001325 B003                    		mov	al, 3
 17220                                  
 17221 00001327 80FC0C                  		cmp	ah, 0Ch		; DSK_ILLEGAL_COMBINATION
 17222                                  					; Illegal combination =	0Ch
 17223 0000132A 7406                    		jz	short FormatStatIllegalComb
 17224 0000132C 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; DSK_TIMEOUT_ERR
 17225 0000132F 7402                    		jz	short FormatStatTimeOut
 17226                                  		; 10/12/2022
 17227                                  		;dec	al
 17228                                  		; 18/12/2022
 17229 00001331 48                      		dec	ax
 17230                                  		; al = 2
 17231                                  		;mov	al, 1		; Function not supported.
 17232                                  		;jmp	short PopStatRet
 17233                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17234                                  
 17235                                  FormatStatIllegalComb:
 17236                                  		; 10/12/2022
 17237                                  		;dec	al	; 3 -> 2 or 2 -> 1
 17238                                  		; 18/12/2022
 17239 00001332 48                      		dec	ax
 17240                                  		; al = 2
 17241                                  		;mov	al, 2		; Function supported, but
 17242                                  					; Illegal sect/trk,trk combination.

 17266                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17267                                  ;
 17268                                  ; RESET THE DRIVE
 17269                                  ;
 17270                                  ; we also set [Step_Drv] to -1 to force the main disk routine to use the
 17271                                  ; slow head settle time for the next operation. this is because the reset
 17272                                  ; operation moves the head to cylinder 0,so we need to do a seek the next
 17273                                  ; time around - there is a problem with 3.5" drives in that the head does
 17274                                  ; not settle down in time,even for read operations!!
 17275                                  ;
 17276                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17277                                  
 17278                                  ResetDisk:
 17279 0000133A 50                      		push	ax
 17280                                  
 17281                                  		; 02/09/2023
 17282 0000133B B80100                  		mov	ax, 1 ; PCDOS 7.1
 17283 0000133E 3806[A905]              		cmp	[media_set_for_format], al ; 1
 17284                                  		;cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 17285                                  					; Reset while formatting?
 17286 00001342 7503                    		jnz	short ResetDisk_cont
 17287                                  					; Then verify operation in "fmt & vrfy"
 17288                                  		;mov	byte [had_format_error], 1 ; Might have failed.
 17289 00001344 A2[AA05]                		mov	[had_format_error], al ; 1
 17290                                  ResetDisk_cont:
 17291                                  		; 02/09/2023 (ah=0)
 17292                                  		;xor	ah, ah		; So signals that we had a format error
 17293 00001347 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - RESET DISK SYSTEM
 17294                                  					; DL = drive (if bit 7 is set both hard	disks and floppy disks reset)
 17295 00001349 C606[7600]FF            		mov	byte [step_drv], 0FFh ; -1
 17296                                  					; Zap up the speed
 17297 0000134E 58                      		pop	ax
 17298 0000134F C3                      		retn

 17303                                  
 17304                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17305                                  ;
 17306                                  ; This routine sets up the drive parameter table with the values needed for
 17307                                  ; format,does an int 13. values in Dpt are restored after a verify is done.
 17308                                  ;
 17309                                  ; on entry  -	ES:DI - points to bds for the drive
 17310                                  ;		Xfer_Seg:BX - points to trkbuf
 17311                                  ;		AL    - number of sectors
 17312                                  ;		AH    - int 13 function code
 17313                                  ;		CL    - sector number for verify
 17314                                  ;		DS    - Bios_Data
 17315                                  ;
 17316                                  ; ON EXIT   -	DS,DI,ES,BX remain unchanged.
 17317                                  ;		AX and flags are the results of the int 13
 17318                                  ;
 17319                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17320                                  
 17321                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0

 17380                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)

 17382                                  
 17383                                  ; BIOSCODE:1124h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 17384                                  ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:1404h
 17385                                  
 17386                                  ; ==========================================================================
 17387                                  ;
 17388                                  ; get the owner of the physical drive represented by the logical drive in al.
 17389                                  ; the assumption is that we **always** keep track of the owner of a drive!!
 17390                                  ; if this is not the case, the system may hang, just following the linked list.
 17391                                  ;
 17392                                  ; ==========================================================================
 17393                                  
 17394                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 17395

 17397                                  ioctl_getown:
 17398 000013A6 E8FBF1                  		call	SetDrive
 17399 000013A9 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 17400                                  					; Get physical drive number
 17401 000013AD C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; Get start of bds chain
 17402                                  ownloop:
 17403 000013B1 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 17404 000013B5 7507                    		jnz	short getnextBDS
 17405                                  		; 24/12/2023
 17406 000013B7 26F6453F20              		test	byte [es:di+3Fh], 20h ; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
 17407                                  		; 10/12/2022
 17408                                  		;test	byte [es:di+23h], 20h
 17409                                  		;;test	word [es:di+23h], 20h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 17410                                  					; fi_own_physical
 17411 000013BC 7514                    		jnz	short exitown
 17412                                  getnextBDS:
 17413 000013BE 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 17414 000013C1 EBEE                    		jmp	short ownloop
 17415                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17416                                  
 17417                                  ; ==========================================================================
 17418                                  ;
 17419                                  ; set the ownership of the physical drive represented by the logical drive
 17420                                  ; in al to al.
 17421                                  ;
 17422                                  ; ==========================================================================
 17423                                  
 17424                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0

 17436                                  		; Fall into ExitOwn

 17440                                  ; if there is only one logical drive assigned to this physical drive, return
 17441                                  ; 0 to user to indicate this. Enter with ES:di -> the owner's bds.

 17525                                  ; ==========================================================================
 17526                                  ;	get media id
 17527                                  ; ==========================================================================
 17528                                  ;
 17529                                  ; FUNCTION: get the volume label,the system id and the serial number from
 17530                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 17531                                  ;	    for the conventional media,this routine will return "unknown
 17532                                  ;	    media type" error to dos.
 17533                                  ;
 17534                                  ; INPUT :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 17535                                  ;
 17536                                  ; OUTPUT:   the request packet filled with the information,if not carry.
 17537                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 17538                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 17539                                  ;	    register DS,DX,AX,CX,DI,SI destroyed.
 17540                                  ;
 17541                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 17542                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 17543                                  ;
 17544                                  ; LOGIC:
 17545                                  ;	to recognize the extended boot record,this logic will actually
 17546                                  ;	access the boot sector even if it is a hard disk.
 17547                                  ;	note:the valid extended bpb is recognized by looking at the mediabyte
 17548                                  ;	field of bpb and the extended boot signature.
 17549                                  ;
 17550                                  ; {
 17551                                  ;	get logical drive number from bds table;
 17552                                  ;	rFlag = read operation;
 17553                                  ;	BootIo;		 /*get the media boot record into the buffer
 17554                                  ;	if (no error) then
 17555                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 17556                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 17557                                  ;		  of the request packet to those of the boot record;
 17558                                  ;		};
 17559                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 17560                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 17561                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 17562                                  ;		};
 17563                                  ;	else
 17564                                  ;	     ret;	/*already error code is set in the register al
 17565                                  ;
 17566                                  ; ==========================================================================
 17567                                  
 17568                                  ;size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL equ 4
 17569                                  ;;size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL equ 11
 17570                                  ;;size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID equ 8
 17571                                  
 17572                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 17573                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:1478h)
 17574                                  
 17575                                  		; 19/10/2022
 17576                                  GetMediaId:
 17577 00001411 E8B000                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 17578 00001414 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet] ; Logical drive number
 17579 00001418 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; Read operation
 17580 0000141D E88C00                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sector into	DiskSector
 17581 00001420 722E                    		jb	short IOCtl_If1
 17582                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 17583 00001422 803E[6701]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 17584                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 17585                                  		;jb	short IOCtl_If2	; brif not valid (0F0h - 0FFh)
 17586                                  		; 24/12/2023
 17587 00001427 7225                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7		
 17588                                  
 17589                                  		; 24/12/2023
 17590                                  		; 10/12/2022
 17591                                  		;mov	si, disksector+26h
 17592                                  		;;;
 17593                                  		; 24/12/2023
 17594                                  		;mov	si, disksector+43h ; BS_FAT32_VolID
 17595 00001429 BE[9401]                		mov	si, disksector+42h ; BS_FAT32_BootSig ; 24/12/2023
 17596 0000142C 833E[6801]00            		cmp	word [disksector+16h], 0 ; BPB.FATSz16
 17597 00001431 7403                    		jz	short IOCtl_If3 ; FAT32 fs
 17598 00001433 83EE1C                  		sub	si, 1Ch         ; FAT (12-16) fs ; 43h-1Ch = 27h ; BS_VolID
 17599                                  		; si = disksector+26h = BS_BootSig ; 24/12/2023
 17600                                  IOCtl_If3:
 17601                                  		;cmp	byte [si-1], 29h ; BS_BootSig or BS_FAT32_BootSig
 17602                                  		;;;
 17603 00001436 803C29                  		cmp	byte [si], 29h
 17604                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 17605                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 17606 00001439 7512                    		jne	short IOCtl_If2	; not extended boot record
 17607 0000143B C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]	; es:di	points to request header
 17608 0000143F 26C47F13                		les	di, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 17609                                  		; 10/12/2022
 17610                                  		;mov	si, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 17611 00001443 46                      		inc	si
 17612                                  		; 24/12/2023
 17613                                  		; si = disksector+27h (BS_VolID)
 17614                                  		;      or disksector+43h (BS_FAT32_VolID)
 17615                                  
 17616 00001444 83C702                  		add	di, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 17617                                  IOCtl_If4:		; 24/12/2023
 17618 00001447 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 17619                                  					; L+size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 17620                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 17621 0000144A F3A4                    		rep movsb		; Move from Bios_Data into request packet
 17622                                  	
 17623                                  		; 10/12/2022
 17624                                  		; cf = 0
 17625                                  		;clc
 17626                                  
 17627 0000144C C3                      		retn
 17628                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17629                                  
 17630                                  		; 24/12/2023
 17631                                  IOCtl_If2:
 17632 0000144D F9                      		stc	
 17633                                  IOCtl_If7:
 17634 0000144E B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 17635                                  		;stc
 17636                                  IOCtl_If6:
 17637                                  IOCtl_If1:
 17638 00001450 C3                      		retn
 17639                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
