 17641                                  ; 16/10/2022
 17642                                  
 17643                                  ; ==========================================================================
 17644                                  ;  set media id
 17645                                  ; ==========================================================================
 17646                                  
 17647                                  ; function: set the volume label, the system id and the serial number of
 17648                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 17649                                  ;	    for the conventional media, this routine will return "unknown
 17650                                  ;	    media.." error to dos.
 17651                                  ;	    this routine will also set the corresponding informations in
 17652                                  ;	    the bds table.
 17653                                  ;
 17654                                  ; input :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 17655                                  ;
 17656                                  ; output:   the extended boot record in the media will be set according to
 17657                                  ;	    the request packet.
 17658                                  ;	    if carry set, then al contains the device driver error number
 17659                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 17660                                  ;
 17661                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 17662                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 17663                                  ;
 17664                                  ; logic:
 17665                                  ;
 17666                                  ; {
 17667                                  ;	get drive_number from bds;
 17668                                  ;	rFlag = "read operation";
 17669                                  ;	BootIo;
 17670                                  ;	if (no error) then
 17671                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 17672                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 17673                                  ;		  of the boot record to those of the request packet;
 17674                                  ;		  rFlag = "write operation";
 17675                                  ;		  get drive number from bds;
 17676                                  ;		  BootIo;	  /*write it back*/
 17677                                  ;		};
 17678                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 17679                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 17680                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 17681                                  ;		  ret;	 /*return back to caller */
 17682                                  ;		};
 17683                                  ;	else
 17684                                  ;	     ret;		 /*already error code is set */
 17685                                  ;
 17686                                  ; ==========================================================================
 17687                                  
 17688                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 17689                                  
 17690                                  		; 19/10/2022
 17691                                  SetMediaId:
 17692 00001451 E87000                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 17693 00001454 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 17694                                  					; Logical drive	number
 17695 00001458 88C2                    		mov	dl, al
 17696 0000145A C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; romread
 17697 0000145F 52                      		push	dx
 17698 00001460 E84900                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sec	to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 17699 00001463 5A                      		pop	dx
 17700 00001464 72EA                    		jb	short IOCtl_If6
 17701                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 17702 00001466 803E[6701]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 17703                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 17704 0000146B 72E1                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	; Brif not
 17705                                  
 17706                                  		; 24/12/2023
 17707                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 17708                                  		;			; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 17709                                  		;jnz	short IOCtl_If7	; not extended boot record
 17710                                  		
 17711 0000146D 06                      		push	es		; Save BDS pointer
 17712 0000146E 57                      		push	di
 17713 0000146F 1E                      		push	ds		; Point	ES To boot record
 17714 00001470 07                      		pop	es
 17715                                  
 17716                                  		; 24/12/2023
 17717                                  		;;;
 17718                                  		;mov	di, disksector+43h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 17719 00001471 BF[9401]                		mov	di, disksector+42h ; BS_FAT32_BootSig ; 24/12/2023 
 17720 00001474 833E[6801]00            		cmp	word [disksector+16h], 0 ; BPB.FATSz16
 17721 00001479 7403                    		jz      short IOCtl_If5	; FAT32 fs
 17722 0000147B 83EF1C                  		sub	di, 1Ch		; 67-28 ; offset disksektor+27h
 17723                                  		; di = disksector+26h = BS_BootSig ; 24/12/2023
 17724                                  IOCtl_If5:
 17725                                  		;cmp	byte [di-1], 29h ; BS_BootSig or BS_FAT32_BootSig
 17726 0000147E 803D29                  		cmp	byte [di], 29h
 17727 00001481 7404                    		je	short IOCtl_If8
 17728 00001483 5F                      		pop	di		; not extended boot record
 17729 00001484 07                      		pop	es
 17730                                  		;jmp	short IOCtl_If7
 17731                                  		; 24/12/2023
 17732 00001485 EBC6                    		jmp	short IOCtl_If2
 17733                                  IOCtl_If8:
 17734                                  		;;;
 17735                                  		; 24/12/2023
 17736                                  		;mov	di, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 17737 00001487 47                      		inc	di
 17738                                  		; di = disksector+27h (BS_VolID)
 17739                                  		;      or disksector+43h (BS_FAT32_VolID)
 17740                                  
 17741 00001488 C536[1200]              		lds	si, [ptrsav]	; ds:si	points to request header.
 17742 0000148C C57413                  		lds	si, [si+19]	; [si+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 17743 0000148F 83C602                  		add	si, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 17744                                  		
 17745                                  		; 24/12/2023
 17746                                  		;mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 17747                                  		;			; +size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 17748                                  		;			; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 17749                                  		;rep movsb
 17750 00001492 E8B2FF                  		call	IOCtl_If4       ; copy volume serial, label and system id
 17751                                  
 17752 00001495 06                      		push	es		; point	ds back	to Bios_Data
 17753 00001496 1F                      		pop	ds

 17758 0000149E C606[2001]03            		mov	byte [rflag], 3	; romwrite
 17759 000014A3 E80600                  		call	BootIo		; write	it back.
 17760 000014A6 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 17761                                  					; make sure chk_media check the driver
 17762                                  					; return with error code from BootIo
 17763 000014AB C3                      		retn

 17773                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 17774                                  
 17775                                  ; 16/10/2022
 17776                                  
 17777                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17778                                  ;	BootIo
 17779                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17780                                  ;
 17781                                  ; function: read/write the boot record into boot sector.
 17782                                  ;
 17783                                  ; input :
 17784                                  ;	    al=logical drive number
 17785                                  ;	    rFlag = operation (read/write)
 17786                                  ;
 17787                                  ; output:   for read operation,the boot record of the drive specified in bds
 17788                                  ;	    be read into the DiskSector buffer.
 17789                                  ;	    for write operation,the DiskSector buffer image will be written
 17790                                  ;	    to the drive specified in bds.
 17791                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 17792                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 17793                                  ;	    AX,CX,DX register destroyed.
 17794                                  ;	    if carry set,then al will contain the error code from DiskIO.
 17795                                  ;
 17796                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 17797                                  ;	DiskIO:NEAR
 17798                                  ;
 17799                                  ; logic:
 17800                                  ;
 17801                                  ; {
 17802                                  ;	first_sector = 0;	 /*logical sector 0 is the boot sector */
 17803                                  ;	sectorcount = 1;	 /*read 1 sector only */
 17804                                  ;	buffer = DiskSector;	 /*read it into the DiskSector buffer */
 17805                                  ;	call DiskIO (rFlag,drive_number,first_sector,sectorcount,buffer);
 17806                                  ; }
 17807                                  ; ==========================================================================
 17808                                  
 17809                                  		; 19/10/2022
 17810                                  BootIo:	
 17811 000014AC 06                      		push	es
 17812 000014AD 57                      		push	di
 17813 000014AE 53                      		push	bx
 17814 000014AF 1E                      		push	ds
 17815 000014B0 07                      		pop	es		; Point ES: to Bios_Data
 17816                                  
 17817                                  		; Call DiskIO to read/write the boot sec. The parameters which
 17818                                  		; need to be initialized for this subroutine out here are
 17819                                  		; - Transfer address to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 17820                                  		; - Low sector needs to be initalized to 0. this is a reg. param
 17821                                  		; - Hi sector in [Start_Sec_H] needs to be initialised to 0.
 17822                                  		; - Number of sectors <-- 1
 17823                                  
 17824 000014B1 BF[5201]                		mov	di, disksector	; es:di -> transfer address
 17825 000014B4 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx		; First	sector (h) -> 0
 17826 000014B6 8916[9C04]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx ; Start sector (h) -> 0
 17827 000014BA B90100                  		mov	cx, 1
 17828 000014BD E851F5                  		call	diskio
 17829 000014C0 5B                      		pop	bx
 17830 000014C1 5F                      		pop	di
 17831 000014C2 07                      		pop	es
 17832 000014C3 C3                      		retn
 17833                                  
 17834                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 17835                                  
 17836                                  ; 16/10/2022
 17837                                  
 17838                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17839                                  ;	ChangeLineChk
 17840                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17841                                  ;
 17842                                  ; when the user calls get/set media id call before dos establishes the media
 17843                                  ; by calling "media_chk",the change line activity of the drive is going to be
 17844                                  ; lost.	this routine will check the change line activity and will save the
 17845                                  ; history in the flags.
 17846                                  ;
 17847                                  ; FUNCTION: check the change line error activity
 17848                                  ;
 17849                                  ; INPUT :  ES:di -> bds table.
 17850                                  ;
 17851                                  ; OUTPUT:   flag in bds table will be updated if change line occurs.
 17852                                  ;
 17853                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 17854                                  ;	Set_Changed_DL
 17855                                  ;
 17856                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17857                                  
 17858                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 17859                                  ChangeLineChk:	
 17860 000014C4 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 17861 000014C8 08D2                    		or	dl, dl		; Fixed	disk?
 17862 000014CA 7821                    		js	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Yes, skip it.
 17863                                  		; 24/12/2023
 17864 000014CC 26F6453F04              		test	byte [es:di+3Fh], 4 ; [es:di+BDS.flags] ; PCDOS 7.1
 17865                                  		; 12/12/2022
 17866                                  		;test	byte [es:di+23h], 4
 17867                                  		;;test	word [es:di+23h], 4 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 17868                                  					; return_fake_bpb
 17869 000014D1 751A                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 17870 000014D3 803E[7700]01            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 1   ; This rom support change line?
 17871 000014D8 7513                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 17872 000014DA E8B207                  		call	haschange	; This drive support change line?
 17873 000014DD 740E                    		jz	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Do nothing
 17874                                  
 17875                                  		; Execute the rom disk interrupt to check changeline activity.
 17876                                  
 17877 000014DF B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 17878 000014E1 CD13                    		int	13h	; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 17879                                  				; DL = drive to	check
 17880                                  				; Return: AH = disk change status
 17881 000014E3 7308                    		jnb	short ChangeLnChkRet
 17882 000014E5 53                      		push	bx
 17883 000014E6 BB4000                  		mov	bx, 40h		; fchanged
 17884                                  					; Update flag in BDS for this
 17885                                  					; physical drive
 17886 000014E9 E87C07                  		call	set_changed_dl
 17887 000014EC 5B                      		pop	bx
 17888                                  ChangeLnChkRet:				
 17889 000014ED C3                      		retn
 17890

 17895                                  ; ==========================================================================
 17896                                  ;	GetAccessFlag
 17897                                  ; ==========================================================================
 17898                                  ;
 17899                                  ; FUNCTION: get the status of UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 17900                                  ;
 17901                                  ; INPUT :
 17902                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 17903                                  ;
 17904                                  ; OUTPUT:   a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 if disk i/o not allowed.
 17905                                  ;						 = 1 if disk i/o allowed.
 17906                                  ; ==========================================================================
 17907                                  
 17908                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 17909                                  
 17910                                  		; 19/10/2022
 17911                                  GetAccessFlag:				
 17912 000014EE C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 17913 000014F2 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 17914                                  		;mov	al, 0		; Assume result	is unformatted
 17915                                  		; 10/12/2022
 17916 000014F5 28C0                    		sub	al, al
 17917                                  		; 24/12/2023
 17918 000014F7 26F6454002              		test	byte [es:di+40h], 02h ; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
 17919                                  		;test	word ptr es:[di+3Fh], 200h
 17920                                  		; 10/12/2022
 17921                                  		;test	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 17922                                  		;;test	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 17923                                  					; unformatted_media
 17924 000014FC 7501                    		jnz	short GafDone	; Done if unformatted
 17925                                  		;inc	al		; Return true for formatted
 17926                                  		; 24/12/2023
 17927 000014FE 40                      		inc	ax
 17928                                  GafDone:				
 17929 000014FF 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 17930 00001502 C3                      		retn
 17931                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17932                                  
 17933                                  ; 16/10/2022
 17934                                  
 17935                                  ; ==========================================================================
 17936                                  ;	SetAccessFlag
 17937                                  ; ==========================================================================
 17938                                  ;
 17939                                  ; function: set/reset the UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 17940                                  ;
 17941                                  ; input :
 17942                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 17943                                  ;
 17944                                  ; output:   unformtted_media bit modified according to the user request
 17945                                  ; ==========================================================================
 17946                                  
 17947                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 17948                                  
 17949                                  		; 19/10/2022
 17950                                  SetAccessFlag:				
 17951 00001503 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	points to request header
 17952 00001507 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 17953                                  		; 24/12/2023
 17954 0000150A 26806540FD              		and	byte [es:di+40h], 0FDh ; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
 17955                                  		;and	word ptr es:[di+3Fh], 0FDFFh
 17956                                  		; 10/12/2022
 17957                                  		;and	byte [es:di+36], 0FDh
 17958                                  		;;and	word [es:di+35], 0FDFFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 17959                                  					; ~unformatted_media
 17960 0000150F 807F0100                		cmp	byte [bx+1], 0	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 17961 00001513 750A                    		jnz	short saf_Done
 17962                                  		; 24/12/2023
 17963 00001515 26804D4002              		or	byte [es:di+40h], 02h ; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
 17964                                  		;or	word ptr es:[di+3Fh], 200h
 17965                                  		; 10/12/2022
 17966 0000151A 26804D2402              		or	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 17967                                  		;or	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 17968                                  					; unformatted_media
 17969                                  saf_Done:				
 17970 0000151F C3                      		retn
 17971                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 17972                                  
 17973                                  ; 16/10/2022
 17974                                  
 17975                                  ; ==========================================================================
 17976                                  ; Ioctl_Support_Query
 17977                                  ; ==========================================================================
 17978                                  ;
 17979                                  ; New device command which was added in DOS 5.00 to allow a query of a 
 17980                                  ; specific GENERIC IOCtl to see if it is supported. Bit 7 in the
 17981                                  ; device attributes specifies if this function is supported.
 17982                                  ;
 17983                                  ; ==========================================================================
 17984                                  
 17985                                  		; 24/12/2023 - Retro DOS 5.0
 17986                                  
 17987                                  		; 19/10/2022
 17988                                  ioctl_support_query:
 17989 00001520 06                      		push	es
 17990 00001521 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX Points to request header.
 17991 00001525 268B470D                		mov	ax, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 17992                                  					; AL ==	Major, AH == Minor
 17993                                  		; 24/12/2023
 17994                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 17995 00001529 3C48                    		cmp	al, 48h		; IOC_NEW_DC (PCDOS 7.1)
 17996                                  					; new generic ioctl function (FAT32)
 17997 0000152B 7404                    		je	short ioctl_support
 17998                                  
 17999 0000152D 3C08                    		cmp	al, 8		; IOC_DC
 18000                                  					; See if major code is 8
 18001 0000152F 7513                    		jne	short nosupport
 18002                                  ioctl_support:
 18003 00001531 0E                      		push	cs
 18004 00001532 07                      		pop	es
 18005                                  		; 24/12/2023
 18006                                  		; 02/09/2023
 18007 00001533 B90E00                  		mov	cx, 14          ; (PCDOS 7.1) IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 18008                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 18009                                  		; 10/12/2022
 18010 00001536 BF[BC0E]                		mov	di, IOC_DC_Table
 18011                                  		;mov	di, 0C60h	; IOC_DC_Table
 18012                                  					; at 2C7h:0C60h	= 70h:31D0h
 18013 00001539 86C4                    		xchg	al, ah		; Put minor code in AL
 18014 0000153B F2AE                    		repne scasb		; Scan for minor code in AL
 18015 0000153D 7505                    		jnz	short nosupport	; it was not found
 18016 0000153F B80001                  		mov	ax, 100h
 18017                                  		; 10/12/2022
 18018                                  		; (jump to ioctlsupexit is not required)
 18019                                  		;jmp	short $+2	; ioctlsupexit
 18020                                  					; Signal ioctl is supported
 18021                                  		;;jmp	short ioctlsupexit
 18022                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18023                                  ioctlsupexit:
 18024 00001542 07                      		pop	es
 18025                                  		; 10/12/2022
 18026                                  		; cf = 0
 18027                                  		;clc
 18028 00001543 C3                      		retn
 18029                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18030                                  nosupport:
 18031 00001544 07                      		pop	es
 18032 00001545 E98DEB                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
 18033                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18034                                  
 18035                                  ; 16/10/2022
 18036                                  
 18037                                  ; ==========================================================================
 18038                                  ;	GetMediaSenseStatus
 18039                                  ; ==========================================================================
 18040                                  ;
 18041                                  ; FUNCTION: Will return the type of diskette media in the specified DOS
 18042                                  ;	    diskette drive and whether the media is the default type
 18043                                  ;	    for that drive. (default type means the max size for that
 18044                                  ;	    drive)
 18045                                  ;
 18046                                  ; INPUT :   ES:DI -> BDS table
 18047                                  ; OUTPUT:   If carry clear
 18048                                  ;	    DS:BX -> Updated IOCtlPacket
 18049                                  ;
 18050                                  ;			 Special Function at offset 0:
 18051                                  ;				0	- Media detected is not default type
 18052                                  ;				1	- Media detected is default type
 18053                                  ;
 18054                                  ;			 Device Type at offset 1:
 18055                                  ;				2       - 720K 3.5" 80 tracks
 18056                                  ;				7	- 1.44M 3.5" 80 tracks
 18057                                  ;				9	- 2.88M 3.5" 80 tracks
 18058                                  ;
 18059                                  ; Error Codes returned in AX if carry set:
 18060                                  ;
 18061                                  ; 8102 - Drive not ready	- No disk is in the drive.
 18062                                  ; 8107 - Unknown media type	- Drive doesn't support this function or
 18063                                  ;				  the media is really unkown, any error
 18064                                  ;				  other than "media not present"
 18065                                  ; 
 18066                                  ; ==========================================================================
 18067                                  
 18068                                  		; 19/10/2022
 18069                                  SenseMediaType:
 18070 00001548 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header.
 18071 0000154C C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 18072                                  		; 10/10/2022
 18073                                  		;mov	word [bx], 0	; Initialize the 2 packet bytes
 18074 0000154F 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 18075 00001551 8917                    		mov	[bx], dx ; 0
 18076                                  		;
 18077 00001553 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 18078                                  					; Get int 13h drive number from	BDS
 18079                                  		; 10/12/2022
 18080                                  		;xor	dh, dh		; DX = physical	drive number
 18081 00001557 B420                    		mov	ah, 20h		; Get Media Type function
 18082                                  					; If no	carry media type in AL
 18083 00001559 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - QCACHE	- DISMOUNT
 18084 0000155B 7216                    		jc	short MediaSenseEr ; error code	in AH
 18085 0000155D FE07                    		inc	byte [bx]	; Signal media type is default (bit 1)
 18086                                  DetermineMediaType:
 18087 0000155F FEC8                    		dec	al
 18088 00001561 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; Chk for 720K ie: (3-1) = 2
 18089 00001563 740A                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 18090 00001565 0404                    		add	al, 4
 18091 00001567 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7		; Chk for 1.44M ie: (4-1+4) = 7
 18092 00001569 7404                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 18093 0000156B 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9		; Chk for 2.88M	ie: (6-1+4) = 9
 18094 0000156D 7510                    		jnz	short UnknownMediaType ; Just didn't recognize media type
 18095                                  GotMediaType:
 18096 0000156F 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; Save the return value
 18097                                  		; 10/12/2022
 18098                                  		; cf = 0
 18099                                  		;clc			; Signal success
 18100 00001572 C3                      		retn
 18101                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18102                                  
 18103                                  MediaSenseEr:
 18104 00001573 80FC32                  		cmp	ah, 32h		; See if not default media error
 18105 00001576 74E7                    		jz	short DetermineMediaType ; Not really an error
 18106 00001578 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; Now assume drive not ready
 18107 0000157A 80FC31                  		cmp	ah, 31h		; See if media was present
 18108 0000157D 7402                    		jz	short SenseErrExit ; Return drive not ready
 18109                                  UnknownMediaType:
 18110 0000157F B007                    		mov	al, 7		; Just don't know the media type
 18111                                  SenseErrExit:
 18112 00001581 B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Signal error return
 18113 00001583 F9                      		stc
 18114 00001584 C3                      		retn
 18115                                  
 18116                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18117                                  		; 10/12/2022
 18118                                  		;db    0
 18119                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18120                                  
 18121                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18122                                  ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:15F2h
 18123                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18124                                  ; 26/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1)
 18125                                  
 18126                                  ; =============== S U B R O U T I N E =======================================
 18127                                  
 18128                                  SetLockState:
 18129 00001585 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; set media lock state
 18130 00001589 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+13h]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 18131                                  		;mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 18132                                  		;call	check_int13h_exts_present

 18135                                  		;mov	al, 3		; unknown command error

 18138 00001593 B445                    		mov	ah, 45h
 18139 00001595 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - IBM/MS Extension - LOCK/UNLOCK DRIVE
 18140                                  		; (DL - drive, [SI - disk address packet)
 18141 00001597 884701                  		mov	[bx+1], al	; 1 = locked, 0 = not locked
 18142                                  		; [bx+A_LOCKSTATE_CONTROL.LOCKSTATE_FLAG]
 18143                                  		
 18144                                  		; 26/12/2023
 18145 0000159A EB0A                    		jmp	short sls_em
 18146

 18155                                  
 18156                                  EjectMedia:
 18157                                  		;mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; eject media in drive
 18158                                  		;			; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 18159                                  		;call	check_int13h_exts_present

 18161 0000159C E81100                  		call	check_int13h_exts_p
 18162                                  		;mov	al, 3		; unknown command error
 18163 0000159F 720C                    		jc	short ejectm_ret
 18164 000015A1 B80046                  		mov	ax, 4600h
 18165 000015A4 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - IBM/MS Extension - EJECT MEDIA
 18166                                  		; (DL - drive)
 18167                                  sls_em:			; 26/12/2023
 18168 000015A6 7305                    		jnc	short ejectm_ret
 18169 000015A8 88E0                    		mov	al, ah
 18170 000015AA E8FBF7                  		call	maperror

 18182                                  check_int13h_exts_present:

 18184 000015B6 53                      		push	bx
 18185 000015B7 BBAA55                  		mov	bx, 55AAh
 18186 000015BA CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - Check for INT 13h Extensions
 18187                                  					; BX = 55AAh, DL = drive number
 18188                                  					; Return: CF set if not supported
 18189                                  					; AH = extensions version

 18207                                  GetDrvMapInfo:
 18208 000015CC 8CD9                    		mov	cx, ds		; get drive map information
 18209                                  					;
 18210                                  					; es:di points to BDS which belongs to
 18211                                  					;	  the requested logical/dos drive number
 18212                                  					;
 18213                                  					; Format of parameter block:
 18214                                  					; Offset  Description (Table 01570)
 18215                                  					;  00h    (call) length of this buffer (in bytes)
 18216                                  					;  01h    (ret) number of bytes in parameter block
 18217                                  					;	    actually used
 18218                                  					;  02h    (ret) drive flags
 18219                                  					;  03h    (ret) physical drive number
 18220                                  					;	    00h-7Fh floppy
 18221                                  					;	    80h-FEh hard
 18222                                  					;	    FFh no physical drive
 18223                                  					;  04h    (ret) bitmap of logical drives associated with
 18224                                  					;	    physical drive
 18225                                  					;	    bit 0 = drive A:, etc.
 18226                                  					;  08h    (ret) relative block address of partition start
 18227                                  					;	    qword
 18228                                  					;
 18229                                  					; Ref: Ralf Brown's Interrupt List, INTERRUP.G
 18230 000015CE C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 18231 000015D2 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+13h]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 18232 000015D5 B80381                  		mov	ax, 8103h	; ah = generic ioctl error code (81h)
 18233                                  					; al = unknown command error (03h)
 18234 000015D8 803F10                  		cmp	byte [bx], 10h	; parameter buffer length = 16 bytes
 18235 000015DB 7251                    		jb	short gdmi_4
 18236 000015DD 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 18237 000015E1 885703                  		mov	[bx+3], dl	; parameter block - offset 3 - physical drive number
 18238 000015E4 C6470110                		mov	byte [bx+1], 10h ; parameter block - actually used length
 18239 000015E8 268B4517                		mov	ax, [es:di+17h]	; [es:di+BDS.hiddensectors]
 18240 000015EC 894708                  		mov	[bx+8], ax	; parameter block - offset 8 - partition start LBA
 18241 000015EF 268B4519                		mov	ax, [es:di+19h]	; [es:di+BDS.hiddensectors+2]
 18242 000015F3 89470A                  		mov	[bx+0Ah], ax	; parameter block - offset 10
 18243 000015F6 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax ; 0
 18244 000015F8 884702                  		mov	[bx+2], al	; drive flags = 0 (protected mode flags etc.)
 18245 000015FB 89470C                  		mov	[bx+0Ch], ax	; high dword of partition start address (LBA) is 0
 18246 000015FE 89470E                  		mov	[bx+0Eh], ax
 18247 00001601 894704                  		mov	[bx+4], ax	; logical drive bitmap of same physical drive
 18248                                  					; initialized as 0
 18249 00001604 894706                  		mov	[bx+6], ax ; 0
 18250 00001607 8EC1                    		mov	es, cx
 18251                                  		;les	di, dword ptr es:start_bds ; 1st BDS
 18252 00001609 26C43E[1901]            		les	di, [es:start_bds]
 18253 0000160E B90100                  		mov	cx, 1		; bit 0 (drive A:)
 18254                                  gdmi_1:
 18255 00001611 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh	; last BDS ?
 18256 00001614 7415                    		jz	short gdmi_3	; yes
 18257 00001616 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum], dl
 18258                                  					; is it same physical drive ?
 18259 0000161A 7506                    		jnz	short gdmi_2	; no
 18260 0000161C 094F04                  		or	[bx+4], cx	; set bit for logical drive index of this BDS
 18261                                  					; (previously) shifted bit (which is 1/ON) is in ax:cx
 18262 0000161F 094706                  		or	[bx+6], ax
 18263                                  gdmi_2:
 18264 00001622 D1E1                    		shl	cx, 1		; shift one left for setting the next drive's bit
 18265 00001624 D1D0                    		rcl	ax, 1		; set high word of the bit select (set) value
 18266 00001626 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; next BDS
 18267 00001629 EBE6                    		jmp	short gdmi_1	; loop until di = -1 (last BDS sign)
 18268                                  gdmi_3:
 18269 0000162B B80001                  		mov	ax, 100h	; success
 18270                                  gdmi_4:
 18271 0000162E C3                      		retn
 18272                                  
 18273                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18274                                  
 18275                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 18276                                  ; 26/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 (Modified PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
 18277                                  
 18278                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18279                                  ; MSINT13.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 18280                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18281                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 18282                                  
 18283                                  ;	int 2f function 13h allows the user to change the orig13 int_13 vector
 18284                                  ;	after booting. this allows testing and implementation of custom int_13
 18285                                  ;	handlers, without giving up ms-dos error recovery
 18286                                  ;	entry:	ds:dx	== addr. of new int_13 handler
 18287                                  ;		es:bx	== addr. of new int_13 vector used by warm boot (int19)
 18288                                  ;	exit:	orig13	== address of new int_13 handler
 18289                                  ;		ds:dx	== old orig13 value
 18290                                  ;		es:bx	== old old13  value
 18291                                  ;
 18292                                  ; int 2f handler for external block drivers to communicate with the internal
 18293                                  ; block driver in msdisk. the multiplex number chosen is 8. the handler
 18294                                  ; sets up the pointer to the request packet in [ptrsav] and then jumps to
 18295                                  ; dsk_entry, the entry point for all disk requests.
 18296                                  ;
 18297                                  ; on exit from this driver, we will return to the external driver
 18298                                  ; that issued this int 2f, and can then remove the flags from the stack.
 18299                                  ; this scheme allows us to have a small external device driver, and makes
 18300                                  ; the maintainance of the various drivers (driver and msbio) much easier,
 18301                                  ; since we only need to make changes in one place (most of the time).
 18302                                  ;
 18303                                  ;   ax=800h - check for installed handler - reserved
 18304                                  ;   ax=801h - install the bds into the linked list
 18305                                  ;   ax=802h - dos request
 18306                                  ;   ax=803h - return bds table starting pointer in ds:di
 18307                                  ;	   (ems device driver hooks int 13h to handle 16kb dma overrun
 18308                                  ;	    problem. bds table is going to be used to get head/sector
 18309                                  ;	    informations without calling generic ioctl get device parm call.)
 18310                                  
 18311                                  ;BIOSSEGMENT equ 70h
 18312                                  DOSBIOSSEG equ 0070h ; 17/10/2022
 18313                                  
 18314                                  ;;BIOSCODE:1302h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 18315                                  ;BIOSCODE:16AAh (PCDOS 7.1, IBMBIO.COM) ; 26/12/2023
 18316                                  
 18317                                  i2f_handler:				; here is 02C7h:1302h =	0070h:3872h
 18318 0000162F 80FC13                  		cmp	ah, 13h
 18319 00001632 7413                    		jz	short int2f_replace_int13
 18320 00001634 80FC08                  		cmp	ah, 8
 18321 00001637 7432                    		jz	short mine
 18322                                  
 18323                                  ; Check for WIN386 startup and return the BIOS instance data
 18324                                  
 18325 00001639 80FC16                  		cmp	ah, 16h		; MultWin386
 18326 0000163C 746D                    		jz	short win386call
 18327 0000163E 80FC4A                  		cmp	ah, 4Ah		; multMULT
 18328 00001641 7503                    		jnz	short i2f_handler_iret
 18329 00001643 E99800                  		jmp	handle_multmult
 18330                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18331                                  
 18332                                  i2f_handler_iret:			
 18333 00001646 CF                      		iret
 18334                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 18335

 18459                                  win386call:

 18461 000016AC 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]

 18463                                  					; at 2C7h:30h =	70h:25A0h

 18465                                  					; is it	win386 initializing?
 18466 000016B3 7410                    		jz	short Win386Init
 18467 000016B5 3C06                    		cmp	al, 6		; Win386_Exit
 18468                                  					; is it	win386 exiting?
 18469 000016B7 7523                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not, continue int2f chain
 18470                                  		; 12/12/2022
