 36272                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36273                                  ;*** toDigit - converts a character-digit to its binary counterpart
 36274                                  ;            -- verifies that CL contains a valid character-digit; if so, it
 36275                                  ; changes CL to its counterpart binary digit ((CL-'0') or (CL-'A'+10)).
 36276                                  ; A-F are considered valid iff gnradix is 16.
 36277                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36278                                  ; ENTRY:    CL contains a digit ('0' to '9' or, if gnradix==16, 'A' to 'F')
 36279                                  ; EXIT:     CL contains digit in binary (0 to 9 or, if gnradix==16, 0 to 15)
 36280                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set indicates invalid digit; carry clear indicates good digit
 36281                                  ; USES:     CL, Flags
 36282                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36283                                  ; If the string is preceeded with "0x", the value is read as hexadecimal; else,
 36284                                  ; as decimal. After a read, you may check the radix by examining gnradix--it
 36285                                  ; will be 10 or 16.
 36286                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36287                                  
 36288                                  gnradix:
 36289 00002BB5 0000                    	dw	0		; Must be a word--16x16 multiplication
 36290                                  
 36291                                  toDigit:
 36292 00002BB7 2E833E[B52B]10          	cmp	word [cs:gnradix],16
 36293 00002BBD 751C                    	jne	short td20	; Don't check hex digits if radix isn't 16
 36294                                  
 36295                                  toDigit_hex:
 36296 00002BBF 80F961                  	cmp	cl,'a'	; 61h
 36297 00002BC2 7209                    	jb	short td10
 36298 00002BC4 80F966                  	cmp	cl,'f'	; 66h
 36299 00002BC7 7720                    	ja	short tdE	; Nothing valid above 'z' at all...
 36300 00002BC9 80E957                  	sub	cl,'a'-10 ; 57h	; Make 'a'==10 and return.
 36301                                  	;clc			; <- CLC is implicit from last SUB
 36302 00002BCC C3                      	retn
 36303                                  td10:	
 36304 00002BCD 80F941                  	cmp	cl,'A'  ; 41h
 36305 00002BD0 7209                    	jb	short td20	; Below 'A'?  Not a letter...
 36306 00002BD2 80F946                  	cmp	cl,'F'	; 46h
 36307 00002BD5 7712                    	ja	short tdE	; Above 'F'?  Not a digit.
 36308 00002BD7 80E937                  	sub	cl,'A'-10 ; 37h	; Make 'A'==10 and return.
 36309                                  	;clc			; <- CLC is implicit from last SUB
 36310 00002BDA C3                      	retn
 36311                                  toDigit_dec:
 36312                                  td20:	
 36313 00002BDB 80F930                  	cmp	cl,'0'		; If less than zero,
 36314                                  	;jb	short tdE	; Done.
 36315 00002BDE 720A                    	jb	short tdEr ; 08/04/2019
 36316 00002BE0 80F939                  	cmp	cl,'9'		; Or, if greater than nine,
 36317 00002BE3 7704                    	ja	short tdE	; Done.
 36318 00002BE5 80E930                  	sub	cl,'0'	; 30h	; Okay--make '0'==0 and return.
 36319                                  	;clc			; <- CLC is implicit from last SUB
 36320 00002BE8 C3                      	retn
 36321                                  tdE:	
 36322 00002BE9 F9                      	stc
 36323                                  tdEr:		; 08/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0	
 36324 00002BEA C3                      	retn
 36325                                  
 36326                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36327                                  ;*** GetXNum - reads a 32-bit ASCII number at ES:SI and returns it in DX:AX
 36328                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36329                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:SI points to an ascii string to scan
 36330                                  ; EXIT:     ES:SI moved to first invalid digit, DX:AX contains value read
 36331                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if # is too big, or has no digits (EOL possibly)
 36332                                  ; USES:     ES:SI, DX, AX, Flags, gnradix
 36333                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36334                                  ; If the string is preceeded with "0x", the value is read as hexadecimal; else,
 36335                                  ; as decimal. After a read, you may check the radix by examining gnradix--it
 36336                                  ; will be 10 or 16.
 36337                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36338                                  
 36339                                  ; 08/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36340                                  
 36341                                  ; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36342                                  ; (SYSINIT:3109h)
 36343                                  
 36344                                  GetXNum:
 36345                                  	;pushreg <bx, cx, ds>
 36346                                  	; 01/01/2023
 36347                                  	;push	bx
 36348 00002BEB 51                      	push	cx ; *
 36349                                  	;push	ds
 36350                                  
 36351 00002BEC FC                      	cld
 36352 00002BED 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 36353 00002BEF 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 36354 00002BF1 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 36355 00002BF3 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			; Start with 0 (makes sense)
 36356                                  
 36357 00002BF5 2EC706[B52B]0A00        	mov	word [cs:gnradix],10	; And default to a radix of 10 (dec)
 36358                                  
 36359 00002BFC 268A0C                  	mov	cl,[es:si]		; Now AX=0, BX=0, CH=0/CL=char, DX=0
 36360                                  	;call	toDigit
 36361 00002BFF E8D9FF                  	call	toDigit_dec
 36362                                  	;jc	short gxnE		; If it's not a digit, leave now.
 36363                                  	; 01/01/2023
 36364 00002C02 7233                    	jc	short gxnX
 36365                                  
 36366 00002C04 08C9                    	or	cl,cl
 36367 00002C06 7517                    	jnz	short gxn20		; Doesn't have '0x'
 36368 00002C08 268A4C01                	mov	cl,[es:si+1]
 36369 00002C0C 80F978                  	cmp	cl,'x'			; Either 'x'...
 36370 00002C0F 7405                    	je	short gxn10
 36371 00002C11 80F958                  	cmp	cl,'X'			; ...or 'X' means it's hexadecimal
 36372 00002C14 7509                    	jne	short gxn20
 36373                                  
 36374                                  gxn10:	
 36375 00002C16 2EC706[B52B]1000        	mov	word [cs:gnradix], 16
 36376 00002C1D 46                      	inc	si			; Since we read "0x", march over it.
 36377 00002C1E 46                      	inc	si
 36378                                  
 36379                                  ; ------------------------------------------------------
 36380                                  ; GXN20--ES:SI = a digit in a number; if not, we're done
 36381                                  ;        DX:AX = current total
 36382                                  ;        BX    = 0
 36383                                  ;        CH    = 0
 36384                                  ; ------------------------------------------------------
 36385                                  
 36386                                  gxn20:	
 36387 00002C1F 268A0C                  	mov	cl,[es:si]	; Now DX:AX=current total, CH=0/CL=char
 36388 00002C22 46                      	inc	si
 36389                                  
 36390 00002C23 E891FF                  	call	toDigit		; Accepts only valid digits, A-F -> 10-16
 36391 00002C26 720D                    	jc	short gxnQ	; <- Ah... wasn't a digit. Stop.
 36392                                  
 36393 00002C28 E80E00                  	call	mul32		; Multiply DX:AX by gnradix
 36394 00002C2B 720A                    	jc	short gxnX	; (if it's too big, error out)
 36395                                  
 36396 00002C2D 01C8                    	add	ax,cx		; Add the digit
 36397 00002C2F 11DA                    	adc	dx,bx		; (BX is 0!)--Adds 1 iff last add wrapped
 36398                                  	;jc	short gxnX	; If _that_ wrapped, it's too big.
 36399                                  	;jmp	short gxn20
 36400 00002C31 73EC                    	jnc	short gxn20
 36401                                  gxnE:	
 36402                                  	;stc			; In this case, we need to set the carry
 36403 00002C33 EB02                    	jmp	short gxnX	; and leave--there were no digits given.
 36404                                  gxnQ:	
 36405 00002C35 4E                      	dec	si		; Don't read in the offensive character.
 36406 00002C36 F8                      	clc			; And clear carry, so they know it's okay.
 36407                                  gxnX:	
 36408                                  	; 01/01/2023
 36409                                  	;pop	ds
 36410 00002C37 59                      	pop	cx ; *
 36411                                  	;pop	bx
 36412 00002C38 C3                      	retn
 36413                                  
 36414                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36415                                  ;*** mul32 - multiplies the number in DX:AX by gnradix
 36416                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36417                                  ; ENTRY:   DX:AX = the number to be multiplied, BX = 0, gnradix = multiplier
 36418                                  ; EXIT:    DX:AX has been multiplied by gnradix if carry clear; BX still 0
 36419                                  ; ERROR:   Carry set if number was too large
 36420                                  ; USES:    Flags, AX, DX
 36421                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36422                                  
 36423                                  mul32:
 36424 00002C39 50                      	push	ax		; DX=old:hi, AX=old:lo, TOS=old:lo, BX=0
 36425 00002C3A 89D0                    	mov	ax,dx		; DX=old:hi, AX=old:hi, TOS=old:lo, BX=0
 36426 00002C3C 2EF726[B52B]            	mul	word [cs:gnradix] ; DX=?, AX=new:hi, TOS=old:lo, BX=0
 36427 00002C41 7211                    	jc	short m32E	; Too big?
 36428                                  
 36429 00002C43 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax		; DX=new:hi, AX=new:hi, TOS=old:lo, BX=0
 36430 00002C45 58                      	pop	ax		; DX=new:hi, AX=old:lo, TOS=orig, BX=0
 36431                                  
 36432 00002C46 87D3                    	xchg	dx,bx		; DX=0, AX=old:lo, TOS=orig, BX=new:hi
 36433 00002C48 2EF726[B52B]            	mul	word [cs:gnradix] ; DX=carry,  AX=new:lo, TOS=orig, BX=new:hi
 36434 00002C4D 87D3                    	xchg	dx,bx		; DX=new:hi, AX=new:lo, TOS=orig, BX=carry
 36435 00002C4F 01DA                    	add	dx,bx		; DX=new:hi, AX=new:lo, TOS=orig, BX=carry
 36436 00002C51 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx		; DX=new:hi, AX=new:lo, TOS=orig, BX=0
 36437 00002C53 C3                      	retn
 36438                                  m32E:	
 36439 00002C54 58                      	pop	ax
 36440 00002C55 C3                      	retn
 36441                                  
 36442                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36443                                  ;*** toPara - divides DX:AX by 16; result in AX only (discards extra DX data)
 36444                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36445                                  ; ENTRY:   DX:AX = the number to be divided
 36446                                  ; EXIT:    Interpereting DX:AX as bytes, AX=paragraph equivalent, 0xFFFF max
 36447                                  ; ERROR:   None
 36448                                  ; USES:    Flags, AX, DX
 36449                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36450                                  ; Note: The 386 has a 32-bit SHR, which would work perfectly for this... but we
 36451                                  ;       can't ensure a 386 host machine. Sorry.
 36452                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36453                                  
 36454                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 36455                                  toPara:
 36456 00002C56 51                      	push	cx		; DX:AX=HHHH hhhh hhhh hhhh:LLLL llll llll llll
 36457                                  
 36458 00002C57 B104                    	mov	cl,4		;

 36468                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36469                                  ;*** UmbHead - returns in AX the address of the first UMB block (0x9FFF)
 36470                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36471                                  ; ENTRY:  Nothing
 36472                                  ; EXIT:   AX contains 0x9FFF for most systems
 36473                                  ; ERROR:  Carry set if pointer is 0xFFFF (if not set up yet--DH runs into this)
 36474                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 36475                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36476                                  ; Early in the boot-cycle, the pointer used to obtain this value isn't set up;
 36477                                  ; to be precise, before a UMB provider is around. In this event, the pointer
 36478                                  ; is always set to 0xFFFF; it changes once a provider is around. On most
 36479                                  ; machines (all of 'em I've seen), it changes to 0x9FFF at that point.
 36480                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36481                                  
 36482                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36483                                  UmbHead:
 36484                                  	; 13/05/2019 (because of callers, pushs & pops are not needed here)
 36485                                  
 36486                                  	;push	si ; ?
 36487                                  	;push	ds ; ? 
 36488                                  	;push	es
 36489                                  	;push	bx ; *	
 36490                                  
 36491                                  	; 09/04/2019
 36492                                  	; !!! No need to save es,bx,ds,si above !!! (es,bx are changed here)
 36493

 36495 00002C66 CD21                    	int	21h
 36496                                  
 36497 00002C68 26A18C00                	mov	ax,[es:DOS_UMB_HEAD]	; And read what's in ES:[008C]
 36498                                  	
 36499                                  	; 01/01/2023
 36500 00002C6C 83F8FF                  	cmp	ax,0FFFFh
 36501 00002C6F F5                      	cmc
 36502                                  	; if AX=0FFFFh -> CF=1
 36503 00002C70 C3                      	retn
 36504                                  
 36505                                  ; 01/01/2023
 36506                                  ;%if 0
 36507                                  ;	cmp	ax,0FFFFh
 36508                                  ;	je	short uhE		; If it's 0xFFFF, it's an error...

 36526                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36527                                  ; ENTRY:  ES:0 should point to a valid MCB
 36528                                  ; EXIT:   ZF set if owned by SC+8 or SC+9 (for japan)
 36529                                  ; USES:   Flags
 36530                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36531                                  
 36532                                  isSysMCB:
 36533                                  	;push	ax
 36534

 36537                                  	;je	short ism10

 36539                                  	;;je	short ism10
 36540                                  	;;jmp	short ismX		; Anything else isn't.
 36541                                  	;jne	short ismX
 36542 00002C71 26833E010008            	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; 8  ; 09/04/2019
 36543 00002C77 7507                    	jne	short ismX 
 36544                                  ism10:	
 36545                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME]	; Check the name...
 36546                                  	;cmp	ax,'SC' ; 4353h
 36547 00002C79 26813E08005343          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 36548                                  ismX:	
 36549                                  	;pop	ax

 36554                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36555                                  ;*** AddrToUmb - converts a segment address in AX to its appropriate UMB number
 36556                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36557                                  ; ENTRY:  AX contains a segment address
 36558                                  ; EXIT:   AX will contain the UMB number which contains the address (0==conv)
 36559                                  ; ERROR:  If the address is above UM Range, AX will return as FFFF.
 36560                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 36561                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36562                                  ; An address in the following areas is treated as:
 36563                                  ;    0      <-> umbhead (0x9FFF)          = Conventional memory
 36564                                  ;    0x9FFF <-> addr of first UM sys MCB  = UMB #1
 36565                                  ;      ...
 36566                                  ;    addr of last UM sys MCB <-> TOM      = invalid; returns #0xFFFF
 36567                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36568                                  
 36569                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 36570                                  AddrToUmb:
 36571                                  	; 01/01/2023
 36572                                  	;push	cx
 36573                                  	;push	dx
 36574 00002C81 06                      	push	es
 36575                                  
 36576 00002C82 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax		; DX = address to search for
 36577                                  
 36578 00002C84 E8DDFF                  	call	UmbHead		; AX = first segment
 36579 00002C87 7222                    	jc	short atuE	; If it couldn't get it, error out.
 36580                                  
 36581                                  	; 22/07/2023
 36582                                  	;mov	es,ax ; *	; ES = first UMB segment
 36583 00002C89 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx ; 0	; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now... (cx = UMB#)
 36584                                  
 36585                                  	; 22/07/2023
 36586                                  atu10:
 36587 00002C8B 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax ; * ; ** ; 22/07/2023
 36588                                  ; ----------------------------------------
 36589                                  ; ATU10--ES - Current MCB address
 36590                                  ;        DX - Address given for conversion
 36591                                  ;        CX - Current UMB #
 36592                                  ; ----------------------------------------
 36593                                  
 36594                                  ;atu10:	
 36595                                  	;mov	ax,es ; * ; 18/07/2023
 36596 00002C8D 39D0                            cmp	ax,dx		; Present segment >= given segment?
 36597 00002C8F 731D                    	jae	short atuX	; Yep--done.
 36598                                  
 36599 00002C91 E8DDFF                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if this is a system MCB
 36600 00002C94 7501                    	jnz	short atu20
 36601                                  
 36602 00002C96 41                      	inc	cx		; If it _was_ a system MCB, we're in a new UMB.
 36603                                  atu20:	
 36604                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 36605                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'
 36606                                  	; 22/07/2023
 36607                                  	; ax = es
 36608                                  	;mov	ax,es ; **
 36609 00002C97 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 36610 00002C9C 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 36611 00002CA2 7403                    	je	short atu30		; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 36612                                  
 36613                                  	;NextMCB es,ax
 36614                                  
 36615                                  	;mov	ax,es ; **
 36616                                  	;;add	ax,[es:3]
 36617                                  	;add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 36618 00002CA4 40                      	inc	ax
 36619                                  	; 22/07/2023
 36620                                  	;mov	es,ax ; *
 36621 00002CA5 EBE4                    	jmp	short atu10
 36622                                  
 36623                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36624                                  ; if we get to atu30, they specified a number that was past the last MCB.
 36625                                  ; make sure it's not _inside_ that MCB before we return an error condition.
 36626                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36627                                  
 36628                                  atu30:	
 36629                                  	; 22/07/2023
 36630                                  	; ax = es + [es:ARENA.SIZE] 
 36631                                  	;mov	ax,es ; **
 36632                                  	;add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE] ; **
 36633 00002CA7 39D0                    	cmp	ax,dx		; Present >= given?
 36634 00002CA9 7303                    	jae	short atuX	; Yep! It _was_ inside.
 36635                                  atuE:	
 36636 00002CAB 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx ; 0	; Else, fall through with UMB # == -1
 36637 00002CAD 49                      	dec	cx		; (that makes it return 0xFFFF and sets CF)
 36638                                  atuX:	
 36639 00002CAE 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx		; Return the UMB number in AX
 36640                                  	
 36641 00002CB0 07                      	pop	es	
 36642                                  	; 01/01/2023
 36643                                  	;pop	dx
 36644                                  	;pop	cx
 36645 00002CB1 C3                      	retn
 36646                                  
 36647                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36648                                  ;*** convUMB - checks after GetXNum to convert an address to a UMB number
 36649                                  ;            -- if GetXNum read a hex number, we interperete that as a segment
 36650                                  ; address rather than a UMB number... and use that address to look up a UMB.
 36651                                  ; This routine checks for that condition and calls AddrToUmb if necessary.
 36652                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36653                                  ; ENTRY:  AX contains a UMB number or segment, gnradix has been set by GetXNum
 36654                                  ; EXIT:   AX will contain a UMB number
 36655                                  ; ERROR:  None
 36656                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 36657                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36658                                  
 36659                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 36660                                  convUMB:
 36661 00002CB2 2E833E[B52B]10          	cmp	word [cs:gnradix],16
 36662 00002CB8 7507                    	jne	short cu10	; If it didn't read in hex, it's not an address
 36663 00002CBA E8C4FF                  	call	AddrToUmb	; Else, convert the address to a UMB number
 36664                                  	;cmp	ax,0FFFFh
 36665                                  	;jne	short cu10

 36667                                  	; 01/01/2023
 36668 00002CBD 40                      	inc	ax
 36669 00002CBE 7401                    	jz	short cu10	; If too high, ignore it (make it conventional)
 36670 00002CC0 48                      	dec	ax
 36671                                  cu10:	
 36672 00002CC1 C3                      	retn

 36702                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36703                                  ;*** loadLow - returns AL==0 if UMB0 == 0, else AL==1
 36704                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36705                                  ; ENTRY:  None
 36706                                  ; EXIT:   AL==0 if mem strategy should be set to LOW_FIRST, else AL==1
 36707                                  ;         Carry set if UMB0 not specified (_NOT_ an error)
 36708                                  ; ERROR:  None
 36709                                  ; USES:   Flags, fm_strat, fm_umb
 36710                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36711                                  ; We want to set the memory strategy to LOW_FIRST if the user specified a
 36712                                  ; load UMB, and it is 0. That 0 can be either from the user having _specified_
 36713                                  ; zero (/L:0;...), or from having specified a too-big min size (/L:1,99999999)
 36714                                  ; such that the load UMB is too small, and shouldn't be used.
 36715                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36716                                  
 36717                                  loadLow:

 36720                                  	;pop	ds

 36724                                  	cmp	al,UNSPECIFIED ; 0FFh, -1
 36725                                  	jne	short ll10
 36726                                  
 36727                                  	stc
 36728                                  ll15:
 36729                                  	mov	al,1		; Return with AL==1 && STC if no UMBs specified
 36730                                  	;stc
 36731                                  	;jmp	short llX
 36732                                  	retn
 36733                                  ll10:	
 36734                                  	or	al,al		; AL=the load UMB: Is it == 0?
 36735                                  	;jz	short llX	; Yep... CF==0 (from OR) && AL=0, so just exit
 36736                                  
 36737                                  	jnz	short ll15	; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36738                                  	retn
 36739                                  
 36740                                  	;mov	al,1
 36741                                  	;clc
 36742                                  ;llX:
 36743                                  	;pop	ds		; Return DS to where it was
 36744                                  	;retn
 36745                                  
 36746                                  %endif

 37209                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37210                                  ;*** findUMB - makes ES:0 point to the first MCB in UMB given as AL
 37211                                  ;            -- returns UmbHEAD pointer (0x9FFF) if passed AL==0
 37212                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37213                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 37214                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to first MCB in UMB (_not_ the 8+SC MCB that heads it)
 37215                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (too high)
 37216                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 37217                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37218                                  
 37219                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37220                                  	; (SYSINIT:3344h)
 37221                                  findUMB:
 37222                                  	; 01/01/2023
 37223                                  	;push	ax
 37224                                  	; 02/01/2023
 37225 00002D8A 51                      	push	cx ; *
 37226                                  	;push	dx
 37227                                  
 37228 00002D8B 30E4                    	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 37229                                  
 37230 00002D8D 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax		; Store the to-be-found UMB number in DX
 37231                                  
 37232 00002D8F E8D2FE                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 37233                                  	; 22/07/2023
 37234                                  	;mov	es,ax ; *
 37235 00002D92 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 37236                                  
 37237                                  	; 22/07/2023
 37238                                  fu10:
 37239 00002D94 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax ; * ; **
 37240                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 37241                                  ; FU10--CX - This UMB number; 0 == conventional
 37242                                  ;       DX - The UMB number they're looking for
 37243                                  ;       ES - The current MCB address
 37244                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 37245                                  
 37246                                  ;fu10:	
 37247 00002D96 39D1                    	cmp	cx,dx		; If CX==DX, we've found the UMB we're
 37248 00002D98 7417                    	je	short fuX	; searching for--so exit.
 37249                                  
 37250 00002D9A E8D4FE                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 37251 00002D9D 7501                    	jnz	short fu20
 37252                                  
 37253 00002D9F 41                      	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 37254                                  fu20:	
 37255                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 37256                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 37257                                  	; 19/07/2023
 37258 00002DA0 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end 
 37259 00002DA6 7408                    	je	short fuE	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 37260                                  
 37261                                  	;NextMCB es,ax		; Go on forward.
 37262                                  	; 22/07/2023
 37263                                  	; ax = es
 37264                                  	;mov	ax,es ; * ; 22/07/2023
 37265                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 37266 00002DA8 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 37267 00002DAD 40                      	inc	ax
 37268                                  	; 22/07/2023
 37269                                  	;mov	es,ax ; **
 37270 00002DAE EBE4                    	jmp	short fu10
 37271                                  fuE:	
 37272 00002DB0 F9                      	stc
 37273                                  fuX:
 37274                                  	; 01/01/2023
 37275                                  	;pop	dx
 37276                                  	; 02/01/2023
 37277 00002DB1 59                      	pop	cx ; *
 37278                                  	;pop	ax		; The address is already in ES.
 37279 00002DB2 C3                      	retn
 37280                                  
 37281                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37282                                  ;*** BigFree - makes ES:0 point to the largest free MCB in UMB given as AL
 37283                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37284                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 37285                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to largest free MCB in UMB, AX returns its size
 37286                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (0 or too high)
 37287                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 37288                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37289                                  
 37290                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 37291                                  BigFree:
 37292                                  	; 01/01/2023
 37293                                  	;push	bx
 37294 00002DB3 51                      	push	cx
 37295                                  
 37296 00002DB4 E8D3FF                  	call	findUMB			; Returns with CF if err, else ES==MCB
 37297 00002DB7 723A                    	jc	short bfX		; (would be "jc bfE"; it just does stc)
 37298                                  
 37299 00002DB9 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; Segment address of largest free MCB
 37300 00002DBB 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx			; Size of largest free MCB
 37301                                  
 37302                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 37303                                  ; BF10--ES - Current MCB address
 37304                                  ;       BX - Address of largest free MCB so far
 37305                                  ;       CX - Size of largest free MCB so far
 37306                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 37307                                  
 37308                                  bf10:	
 37309 00002DBD E8B1FE                  	call	isSysMCB		; If we've left the MCB, we're done.
 37310 00002DC0 7428                    	jz	short bf30
 37311                                  
 37312                                  	;call	isFreeMCB		; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 37313 00002DC2 26830E010000            	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 37314 00002DC8 750C                    	jnz	short bf20
 37315                                  
 37316 00002DCA 26A10300                	mov	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 37317                                  	;cmp	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; Compare sizes...
 37318 00002DCE 39C1                    	cmp	cx,ax
 37319                                  	;jg	short bf20		; Unless we're bigger,
 37320                                  	; 19/07/2023
 37321 00002DD0 7D04                    	jge	short bf20
 37322                                  
 37323 00002DD2 8CC3                    	mov	bx,es			; Store this new element's address,
 37324                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; and its size.
 37325 00002DD4 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 37326                                  
 37327                                  bf20:	
 37328                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 37329                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end	; 'Z'
 37330                                  	; 19/07/2023
 37331                                  	;cmp	byte [es:0],'Z'
 37332 00002DD6 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 37333 00002DDC 740C                    	jz	short bf30		; 'Z' means this was the last MCB.
 37334                                  
 37335                                  	;NextMCB es,ax			; Go on forward.
 37336 00002DDE 8CC0                    	mov     ax,es
 37337                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 37338 00002DE0 2603060300              	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 37339 00002DE5 40                      	inc     ax
 37340 00002DE6 8EC0                    	mov     es,ax
 37341                                  
 37342 00002DE8 EBD3                    	jmp	short bf10
 37343                                  
 37344 00002DEA 8EC3                    bf30:	mov	es,bx			; Return the address
 37345 00002DEC 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx			; Return the size
 37346 00002DEE 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 37347 00002DF0 7501                    	jnz	short bfX		; (if size==0, there's nothing free)
 37348                                  bfE:	
 37349 00002DF2 F9                      	stc
 37350                                  bfX:
 37351 00002DF3 59                      	pop	cx
 37352                                  	; 01/01/2023
 37353                                  	;pop	bx
 37354 00002DF4 C3                      	retn
 37355

 37395                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37396                                  ;*** shrinkMCB - breaks an MCB into two pieces, the lowest one's size==AX
 37397                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37398                                  ; ENTRY:    AX == new size, ES:0 == current MCB
 37399                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB broken if carry clear
 37400                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if MCB isn't as large as AX+0x20 (not a useful split)
 37401                                  ; USES:     Flags
 37402                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37403                                  ; If the size of the to-be-split MCB isn't at least 0x20 bytes greater than
 37404                                  ; the specified new size, the split is useless; if it's only 0x10 bytes, that
 37405                                  ; 0x10 will be used to make a header that mentions a 0-byte free space, and
 37406                                  ; that just sucks up 0x10 bytes for nothing. So we make 0x20 bytes the
 37407                                  ; minimum for performing a split.
 37408                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37409                                  
 37410                                  MIN_SPLIT_SIZE	equ	20h
 37411                                  
 37412                                  	; 02/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37413                                  
 37414                                  shrinkMCB:
 37415                                  	;pushreg <bx,cx,es>
 37416                                  	; 02/01/2023
 37417                                  	;push	bx
 37418 00002E00 51                      	push	cx
 37419 00002E01 06                      	push	es
 37420                                  
 37421 00002E02 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; Move things around... and
 37422                                  	; 02/01/2023
 37423                                  	;mov	ax,es			; save this one for later.
 37424                                  
 37425 00002E04 268B0E0300              	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 37426                                  	; 02/01/2023
 37427 00002E09 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx 
 37428                                  
 37429 00002E0B 83E820                  	sub	ax,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 37430                                  	;sub	cx,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 37431                                  	;;cmp	bx,cx			; {New size} vs {Current Size-20h}
 37432                                  	;ja	short smE		; if wanted_size > cur-20h, abort.
 37433                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37434                                  	;cmp	cx,bx
 37435                                  	; 02/01/2023
 37436 00002E0E 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx
 37437 00002E10 7228                    	jb	short smE ; (*)
 37438                                  
 37439 00002E12 268A160000              	mov	dl,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 37440                                  	
 37441                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 37442                                  	; 02/01/2023
 37443 00002E17 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 37444                                  
 37445 00002E19 26891E0300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],bx
 37446 00002E1E 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],'M'
 37447                                  
 37448 00002E24 01D8                    	add	ax,bx
 37449 00002E26 40                      	inc	ax
 37450 00002E27 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax			; Move to new arena area
 37451                                  
 37452 00002E29 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx
 37453 00002E2B 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx
 37454                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37455                                  	; ax > 0
 37456 00002E2D 48                      	dec	ax			; And prepare the new size
 37457                                  
 37458                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37459 00002E2E 2688160000              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],dl
 37460                                  	;mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0 ; (**)
 37461 00002E33 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax
 37462                                  	;mov	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 37463                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax ; (**)
 37464                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax ; (**)
 37465                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax ; (**)
 37466                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax ; (**)
 37467                                  
 37468                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37469 00002E37 E8A801                  	call	freeMCB	; (**)
 37470                                  
 37471                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37472                                  	; cf=0
 37473                                  	;clc
 37474                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37475                                  	;jmp	short smX
 37476                                  smE:	
 37477                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37478                                  	; cf=1 (*)
 37479                                  	;stc
 37480                                  smX:	
 37481                                  	;popreg	<es,cx,bx>
 37482 00002E3A 07                      	pop	es
 37483 00002E3B 59                      	pop	cx
 37484                                  	; 02/01/2023
 37485                                  	;pop	bx
 37486 00002E3C C3                      	retn
 37487                                  
 37488                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37489                                  ;*** hideUMB? - hides as appropriate the UMB in CL
 37490                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37491                                  ; ENTRY:    CL should be to a valid UMB number, and AX to its address (findUMB)
 37492                                  ; EXIT:     None; UMB is hidden as necessary
 37493                                  ; ERROR:    None
 37494                                  ; USES:     Flags, AX, CX
 37495                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37496                                  ; PRIMARY LOGIC:
 37497                                  ;
 37498                                  ; If the UMB is specified in the DH/LH statement, then:
 37499                                  ;    If the largest free segment is too small (check specified size), then:
 37500                                  ;       Pretend it wasn't ever specified, and fall out of this IF.
 37501                                  ;    Else, if largest free segment is LARGER than specified size, then:
 37502                                  ;       If /S was given on the command-line, then:
 37503                                  ;          Break that element into two pieces
 37504                                  ;          Set a flag that we're shrinking
 37505                                  ;       Endif
 37506                                  ;    Endif
 37507                                  ; Endif
 37508                                  ; If the UMB is NOT specified (or was removed by the above):
 37509                                  ;    Hide all free elements in the UMB
 37510                                  ;    If the flag that we're shrinking was set, then:
 37511                                  ;       UN-hide the lower portion of the shrunken UMB
 37512                                  ;    ENDIF
 37513                                  ; ENDIF
 37514                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37515                                  
 37516                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37517                                  	; (SYSINIT:3426h)
 37518                                  _hideUMB_:
 37519                                  	; 02/01/2023
 37520                                  	; ds = cs
 37521                                  
 37522                                  	; 01/01/2023
 37523                                  	;push	bx
 37524                                  	;push	dx
 37525 00002E3D 06                      	push	es
 37526                                  
 37527 00002E3E 88C8                    	mov	al,cl
 37528 00002E40 E8B2FF                  	call	isSpecified	; Returns ZF set if al's umb was NOT specified
 37529 00002E43 742D                    	jz	short hu_20
 37530                                  
 37531 00002E45 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the size of the largest
 37532 00002E47 E869FF                  	call	BigFree		; free element in AX; put its address in ES
 37533 00002E4A 7226                    	jc	short hu_20	; Oops. Errors mean skip this part.
 37534                                  
 37535 00002E4C 50                      	push	ax		; TOS==size of BigFree in UMB (popped as BX)
 37536 00002E4D 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the user's specified
 37537 00002E4F E8AAFE                  	call	GetSize		; minimum size for this umb (into AX)
 37538 00002E52 5B                      	pop	bx		; Now BX==BigFree, AX==Specified Size
 37539                                  
 37540 00002E53 09C0                    	or	ax,ax		; If they didn't specify one,
 37541 00002E55 741B                    	jz	short hu_20	; Skip over all this.
 37542                                  
 37543 00002E57 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx		; Ah... if (specified > max free)
 37544 00002E59 7607                    	jbe	short hu_10
 37545                                  
 37546 00002E5B 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		;  Then mark that UMB as unused. Nya nya.
 37547 00002E5D E81DFD                  	call	unMarkUMB
 37548 00002E60 EB10                    	jmp	short hu_20
 37549                                  hu_10:	
 37550                                  	;call	isTiny		; Returns ZF clear if user specified /S
 37551                                  	;jz	short hu_20
 37552                                  	; 02/01/2023
 37553                                  ;isTiny:
 37554                                  	;mov	al,[fUmbTiny] ; ds = cs
 37555                                  	;or	al,al
 37556 00002E62 800E[5B1F]00            	or	byte [fUmbTiny],0
 37557 00002E67 7409                    	jz	short hu_20
 37558                                  
 37559 00002E69 E894FF                  	call	shrinkMCB	; They specified /S, so shrink the MCB to AX
 37560 00002E6C 7204                    	jc	short hu_20	; Ah... if didn't shrink after all, skip this:
 37561                                  
 37562 00002E6E 8CC2                    	mov	dx,es
 37563 00002E70 EB09                    	jmp	short hu_30	; Skip the spec check.. we wanna hide this one.
 37564                                  
 37565 00002E72 89C8                    hu_20:	mov	ax,cx
 37566 00002E74 E87EFF                  	call	isSpecified	; If they specified this UMB, we're done...
 37567 00002E77 7510                    	jnz	short hu_X	; so leave.
 37568                                  
 37569 00002E79 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 37570                                  hu_30:	
 37571 00002E7B 88C8                    	mov	al,cl
 37572                                  
 37573 00002E7D E89DFE                  	call	hideUMB		; Hides everything in UMB #al
 37574                                  
 37575 00002E80 09D2                    	or	dx,dx		; Did we shrink a UMB? If not, DX==0,
 37576 00002E82 7405                    	jz	short hu_X	; So we should leave.
 37577                                  
 37578 00002E84 8EC2                    	mov	es,dx		; Ah, but if it isn't, DX==the MCB's address;
 37579 00002E86 E8E6FE                  	call	unHideMCB	; Un-hides the lower portion of that MCB.
 37580                                  hu_X:	
 37581 00002E89 07                      	pop	es
 37582                                  	; 01/01/2023
 37583                                  	;pop	dx
 37584                                  	;pop	bx
 37585 00002E8A C3                      	retn
 37586                                  
 37587                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37588                                  ;*** UnFreeze - Marks FROZEN elements as FREE
 37589                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37590                                  ; Entry:  None
 37591                                  ; Exit:   None; all 8+FROZEN elements are marked as FREE, from any UMB.
 37592                                  ; Error:  None
 37593                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 37594                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37595                                  
 37596                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37597                                  UnFreeze:
 37598                                  	; 03/01/2023
 37599                                  	;push	ax
 37600 00002E8B 06                      	push	es
 37601                                  
 37602 00002E8C E8D5FD                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 37603 00002E8F 721C                    	jc	short ufX
 37604                                  
 37605                                  	; 22/07/2023
 37606                                  uf10:
 37607 00002E91 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax ; *
 37608                                  
 37609                                  ; ------------------------------
 37610                                  ; UF10--ES - Current MCB address
 37611                                  ; ------------------------------
 37612                                  
 37613                                  ;uf10:	
 37614 00002E93 E81900                  	call	isFrozMCB	; Returns with ZF set if MCB is FROZEN
 37615 00002E96 7505                    	jnz	short uf20
 37616 00002E98 E8D4FE                  	call	unHideMCB
 37617                                  	; 09/09/2023
 37618                                  	; ax <> es
 37619 00002E9B 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es ; *
 37620                                  uf20:	
 37621                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 37622                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 37623                                  	; 22/07/2023
 37624 00002E9D 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 37625 00002EA3 7408                    	jz	short ufX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB.. that's it.
 37626                                  
 37627                                  	;NextMCB es,ax		; Go on forward.
 37628                                  	; 22/07/2023
 37629                                  	; ax = es
 37630                                  	;mov	ax,es ; *
 37631                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 37632 00002EA5 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 37633 00002EAA 40                      	inc	ax
 37634                                  	; 22/07/2023
 37635                                  	;mov	es,ax
 37636 00002EAB EBE4                    	jmp	short uf10
 37637                                  ufX:	
 37638 00002EAD 07                      	pop	es
 37639                                  	; 03/01/2023
 37640                                  	;pop	ax
 37641 00002EAE C3                      	retn
 37642                                  
 37643                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37644                                  ;*** isFrozMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is FROZEN
 37645                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37646                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 37647                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is frozen, else !ZF
 37648                                  ; ERROR:    None
 37649                                  ; USES:     Flags
 37650                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37651                                  
 37652                                  isFrozMCB:
 37653                                  	;push	ax
 37654                                  
 37655                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.OWNER]	; Check the owner...
 37656                                  	;cmp	ax,SystemPSPOwner	; 8 (for US OR Japan) is valid
 37657 00002EAF 26833E010008            	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner
 37658 00002EB5 7522                    	jne	short ifmX
 37659                                  
 37660                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+0]
 37661                                  	;cmp	ax,'FR' ; 5246h
 37662 00002EB7 26813E08004652          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'
 37663 00002EBE 7519                    	jne	short ifmX
 37664                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 37665                                  	;cmp	ax,'OZ' ; 5A4Fh
 37666 00002EC0 26813E0A004F5A          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'OZ'
 37667 00002EC7 7510                    	jne	short ifmX
 37668                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 37669                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 37670 00002EC9 26813E0C00454E          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 37671 00002ED0 7507                    	jne	short ifmX
 37672                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 37673                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 37674 00002ED2 26813E0E002020          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 37675                                  ifmX:	
 37676                                  	;pop	ax
 37677 00002ED9 C3                      	retn
 37678                                  
 37679                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37680                                  ;*** frezMCB - marks as 8+FROZEN the MCB at ES:0
 37681                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37682                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 37683                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB frozen
 37684                                  ; ERROR:    None
 37685                                  ; USES:     None

 37688                                  frezMCB:
 37689 00002EDA 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; 8
 37690 00002EE1 26C70608004652          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'
 37691 00002EE8 26C7060A004F5A          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'OZ'
 37692 00002EEF 26C7060C00454E          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 37693 00002EF6 26C7060E002020          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 37694 00002EFD C3                      	retn

 37696                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37697                                  ;*** FreezeUM - Marks FROZEN all UM elements now FREE, save those in load UMB
 37698                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37699                                  ; Entry:  None
 37700                                  ; Exit:   None; all free elements not in load UMB marked as 8+FROZEN
 37701                                  ; Error:  None
 37702                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 37703                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37704                                  
 37705                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2  
 37706                                  FreezeUM:
 37707                                  	; 01/01/2023
 37708                                  	;push	ax
 37709                                  	;push	cx
 37710                                  	;push	dx
 37711 00002EFE 06                      	push	es
 37712                                  
 37713                                  	;;call	GetLoadUMB
 37714                                  	; 01/01/2023
 37715                                  	; ds = cs
 37716                                  	;mov	al,[cs:UmbLoad] ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 37717 00002EFF A0[5E1F]                	mov	al,[UmbLoad] 	
 37718                                  
 37719 00002F02 30E4                    	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 37720 00002F04 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax		; Store the load UMB in DX, so we can skip it
 37721                                  
 37722 00002F06 E85BFD                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 37723                                  	; 22/07/2023
 37724                                  	;mov	es,ax ; *
 37725 00002F09 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 37726                                  
 37727                                  	; 22/07/2023
 37728                                  fum10:
 37729 00002F0B 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax ; *
 37730                                  
 37731                                  ; -----------------------------------------
 37732                                  ; FUM10--ES - Current MCB address
 37733                                  ;        CX - Current UMB number
 37734                                  ;        DX - UMB number to skip (load UMB)
 37735                                  ; -----------------------------------------
 37736                                  
 37737                                  ;fum10:	
 37738 00002F0D E861FD                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 37739 00002F10 7501                    	jnz	short fum20
 37740                                  
 37741 00002F12 41                      	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 37742                                  fum20:	
 37743 00002F13 39D1                    	cmp	cx,dx		; If this is the load UMB, we don't want to
 37744 00002F15 740B                    	je	short fum30	; freeze anything... so skip that section.
 37745                                  
 37746                                  	;call	isFreeMCB	; Oh. If it's not free, we can't freeze it
 37747 00002F17 26830E010000            	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 37748 00002F1D 7503                    	jnz	short fum30	; either.
 37749

 37752                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 37753                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 37754                                  	; 22/07/2023
 37755 00002F22 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 37756 00002F28 7408                    	je	short fumX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB.. that's it.
 37757

 37759                                  	; 22/07/2023

 37772                                  	;pop	cx

 37776                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37777                                  ;*** UmbTest - returns with carry set if UMBs are not available, else CF==false
 37778                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37779                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 37780                                  ; EXIT:     Carry is clear if UMBs are available, or set if they are not
 37781                                  ; ERROR:    None

 37809                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37810                                  ;*** WalkMem - travels memory chain and returns carry clear iff UMBs are linked
 37811                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37812                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 37813                                  ; EXIT:     Carry SET if MCB chain stops before 9FFF, CLEAR if stops >= 9FFF.
 37814                                  ; ERROR:    None
 37815                                  ; USES:     Flags
 37816                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37817                                  
 37818                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)

 37821                                  WalkMem:
 37822                                  	;push	ax ; ?
 37823                                  	;push	bx ; ?
 37824                                  	;;push	ds ; ? ; 01/01/2023 (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS, SYSINIT:352Fh)
 37825                                  	;push	es ; ? no need to save contents of these registers ?
 37826

 37828 00002F46 CD21                    	int	21h

 37831                                  	; 22/07/2023
 37832                                  um10:

 37859

 37865

 37870                                  	;pop	bx ; ?
 37871                                  	;pop	ax ; ?
 37872                                  	
 37873 00002F61 C3                      	retn
