 38193                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38194                                  ;
 38195                                  ; procedure : InitDevLoad
 38196                                  ;
 38197                                  ;	Input : DeviceHi = 0 indicates load DD in low memory
 38198                                  ;			 = 1 indicates load in UMB:
 38199                                  ;		           ConvLoad = 0 indicates a new-style load (see below)
 38200                                  ;		                    = 1 indicates a DOS 5-style load
 38201                                  ;		DevSize  = Size of the device driver file in paras
 38202                                  ;
 38203                                  ;	Output : none
 38204                                  ;
 38205                                  ;	Initializes DevLoadAddr, DevLoadEnd & DevEntry.
 38206                                  ;	Also sets up a header for the Device driver entry for mem utility
 38207                                  ;
 38208                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38209                                  ; For a "new-style load", we break off the current DevEntry and link the umbs
 38210                                  ; as we see fit, using HideUMBs (and UnHideUMBs at exit, though _it_ decides
 38211                                  ; whether it's entitled to do anything). HideUMBs uses the chart built by
 38212                                  ; ParseVar to determine which UMBs to leave FREE, and which not.
 38213                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38214                                  
 38215                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 38216                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38217                                  	; (SYSINIT:364Ah)
 38218                                  InitDevLoad:
 38219                                  	; 01/01/2023
 38220                                  	;push	es ; *
 38221                                  
 38222                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38223                                  	; ds = cs
 38224 0000301C 803E[B01F]00            	cmp	byte [DeviceHi],0
 38225                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; Are we loading in UMB ?
 38226                                  	;je	short InitForLo		; no, init for lo mem
 38227 00003021 7439                    	je	short initforlo_x ; 09/04/2019
 38228                                  
 38229                                  ; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38230                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38231                                  ; %if 0
 38232                                  	; 01/01/2023
 38233 00003023 803E[A01F]01            	cmp	byte [ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 38234                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 38235 00003028 7413                    	je	short InitForConv
 38236                                  
 38237                                  ; There are two stages to preparing upper-memory; first, we mark as 8+HIDDEN
 38238                                  ; any areas not specified on the /L:... chain. Second, we mark as 8+FROZEN
 38239                                  ; any areas left in upper-memory, except for elements in the load UMB...
 38240                                  ; we then malloc space as per Dos-5 style, and mark as free any spaces which
 38241                                  ; are 8+FROZEN (but leave 8+HIDDEN still hidden). The load is performed,
 38242                                  ; and UnHideUMBs later on marks all 8+HIDDEN as free.
 38243                                  
 38244 0000302A E85904                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; Stop using the old device arena
 38245                                  
 38246 0000302D E892FC                  	call	HideUMBs		; Mark up the UM area as we see fit
 38247 00003030 E8CBFE                  	call	FreezeUM		; Hide everything BUT the load area
 38248 00003033 E85700                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; And grab that load area as needed
 38249 00003036 9C                      	pushf
 38250 00003037 E851FE                  	call	UnFreeze		; Then unhide everything frozen
 38251 0000303A 9D                      	popf
 38252                                  	;jc	short InitForLo		; (if carry, it's loading low)
 38253                                  	;jmp	short InitForHi
 38254                                  	; 06/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 38255 0000303B EB0B                    	jmp	short idl0
 38256                                  
 38257                                  ;%endif ; 01/11/2022
 38258                                  
 38259                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 38260                                  	; (SYSINIT:2B67h)
 38261                                  InitForConv:
 38262                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38263                                  	; ds = cs
 38264 0000303D E83700                  	call	SpaceInUMB		; Do we have space left in the
 38265                                  					;  current UMB ?
 38266 00003040 7308                    	jnc	short InitForHi		; yes, we have
 38267 00003042 E84104                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; shrink the current UMB in use
 38268 00003045 E84500                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; else try to allocate new UMB
 38269                                  idl0: ; 06/07/2023
 38270 00003048 720D                    	jc	short InitForLo		; we didn't succeed, so load
 38271                                  					;  in low memory
 38272                                  InitForHi:
 38273                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38274                                  	; ds = cs
 38275                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; get Para addr of free mem
 38276                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; UMB start addr
 38277                                  	;add	dx,[cs:DevUMBSize]	; DX = UMB End addr
 38278 0000304A A1[A61F]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBFree]
 38279 0000304D 8B16[A21F]              	mov	dx,[DevUMBAddr]
 38280 00003051 0316[A41F]              	add	dx,[DevUMBSize]
 38281 00003055 EB0C                    	jmp	short idl1
 38282                                  
 38283                                  InitForLo:
 38284                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38285                                  	; ds = cs
 38286                                  	;mov	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; in case we failed to load
 38287 00003057 C606[B01F]00            	mov	byte [DeviceHi],0
 38288                                  initforlo_x:
 38289                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38290                                  	; ds = cs
 38291                                  					;  into UMB indicate that
 38292                                  					;  we are loading low
 38293                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; AX = start of Low memory
 38294                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; DX = End of Low memory
 38295 0000305C A1[6403]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 38296 0000305F 8B16[A502]              	mov	dx,[ALLOCLIM]
 38297                                  idl1:
 38298 00003063 E86600                  	call	DevSetMark		; setup a sub-arena for DD
 38299                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38300                                  	; ds = cs
 38301                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadAddr],ax	; init the Device load address
 38302                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadEnd],dx	; init the limit of the block
 38303                                  	;mov	word [cs:DevEntry],0	; init Entry point to DD
 38304                                  	;mov	[cs:DevEntry+2],ax
 38305 00003066 A3[941F]                	mov	[DevLoadAddr],ax
 38306 00003069 8916[961F]              	mov	[DevLoadEnd],dx
 38307 0000306D C706[981F]0000          	mov	word [DevEntry],0
 38308 00003073 A3[9A1F]                	mov	[DevEntry+2],ax
 38309                                  	; 01/01/2023
 38310                                  	;pop	es ; *
 38311 00003076 C3                      	retn
 38312                                  
 38313                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38314                                  ;
 38315                                  ; procedure : SpaceInUMB?
 38316                                  ;
 38317                                  ;	Input : DevUMBAddr, DevUMBSize, DevUMBFree & DevSize
 38318                                  ;	Output : Carry set if no space in UMB
 38319                                  ;		 Carry clear if Space is available for the device in
 38320                                  ;		   current UMB
 38321                                  ;
 38322                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38323                                  
 38324                                  SpaceInUMB:
 38325                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38326                                  	; ds = cs
 38327                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBSize]
 38328                                  	;add	ax,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; End of UMB
 38329                                  	;sub	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; - Free = Remaining space
 38330 00003077 A1[A41F]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBSize]
 38331 0000307A 0306[A21F]              	add	ax,[DevUMBAddr]		; End of UMB
 38332 0000307E 2B06[A61F]              	sub	ax,[DevUMBFree]		; - Free = Remaining space
 38333                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38334                                  	;or	ax,ax			; Nospace ?
 38335                                  	;jnz	short spcinumb1
 38336                                  	;stc
 38337                                  	;retn
 38338                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38339 00003082 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1
 38340 00003085 7205                    	jb	short spcinumb2	; cf=1
 38341                                  spcinumb1:
 38342 00003087 48                      	dec	ax			; space for sub-arena
 38343                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38344                                  	; ds = cs
 38345 00003088 3B06[921F]              	cmp	ax,[DevSize]
 38346                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:DevSize]		; do we have space ?
 38347                                  spcinumb2:
 38348 0000308C C3                      	retn
 38349                                  
 38350                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38351                                  ;
 38352                                  ; procedure : PrepareMark
 38353                                  ;
 38354                                  ;	Input : AX==Address of MCB (not addr of free space), BX==Size
 38355                                  ;	Output : None; MCB marked appropriately and DevUMB* set as needed.
 38356                                  ;
 38357                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38358                                  
 38359                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38360                                  ;
 38361                                  ;PrepareMark:
 38362                                  ;	push	ds
 38363                                  ;	mov	ds,ax
 38364                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 38365                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 38366                                  ;	pop	ds
 38367                                  ;
 38368                                  ;	inc	ax
 38369                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 38370                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 38371                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 38372                                  ;	retn
 38373                                  
 38374                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38375                                  ;
 38376                                  ; procedure : GetUMBForDev
 38377                                  ;
 38378                                  ;	Input : DevSize
 38379                                  ;	Output : Carry set if couldn't allocate a UMB to fit the
 38380                                  ;		 the device.
 38381                                  ;		 If success carry clear
 38382                                  ;
 38383                                  ;	Allocates the biggest UMB for loading devices and updates
 38384                                  ;	DevUMBSize, DevUMBAddr & DevUMBFree if it succeeded in allocating
 38385                                  ;	UMB.
 38386                                  ;
 38387                                  ;	This routine relies on the fact that all of the low memory
 38388                                  ;	is allocated, and any DOS alloc calls should return memory
 38389                                  ;	from the UMB pool.
 38390                                  ;
 38391                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38392                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 38393                                  	; (SYSINIT:2BC6h)
 38394                                  
 38395                                  GetUMBForDev:
 38396                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38397                                  	; ds = cs
 38398 0000308D BBFFFF                  	mov	bx,0FFFFh
 38399 00003090 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 38400 00003093 CD21                    	int	21h
 38401                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ALLOCATE MEMORY
 38402                                  		; BX = number of 16-byte paragraphs desired
 38403                                  
 38404 00003095 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 38405                                  	;jz	short gufd_err
 38406                                  	; 09/09/2023
 38407 00003097 742E                    	jz	short gufd_error ; bx = 0
 38408                                  
 38409 00003099 4B                      	dec	bx
 38410                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38411                                  	; ds = cs
 38412 0000309A 391E[921F]              	cmp	[DevSize],bx
 38413                                  	;cmp	[cs:DevSize],bx
 38414 0000309E 7725                    	ja	short gufd_err
 38415                                  
 38416 000030A0 43                      	inc	bx
 38417                                  
 38418 000030A1 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 38419 000030A4 CD21                    	int	21h
 38420 000030A6 721D                    	jc	short gufd_err
 38421                                  
 38422                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38423                                  	;dec	ax
 38424                                  	;call	PrepareMark
 38425                                  	;
 38426                                  PrepareMark:
 38427 000030A8 1E                      	push	ds
 38428 000030A9 48                      	dec	ax
 38429 000030AA 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 38430 000030AC C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 38431 000030B2 C70608005344            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 38432 000030B8 40                      	inc	ax
 38433 000030B9 1F                      	pop	ds
 38434                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38435                                  	; ds = cs
 38436                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 38437                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 38438                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 38439                                  gufd_x:		; 09/09/2023
 38440 000030BA 891E[A41F]              	mov	[DevUMBSize],bx		; update the UMB Variables
 38441 000030BE A3[A21F]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 38442 000030C1 A3[A61F]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 38443                                  	;
 38444                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38445                                  	; cf=0
 38446                                  	;clc				; mark no error
 38447 000030C4 C3                      	retn
 38448                                  
 38449                                  	; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 38450                                  %if 1
 38451                                  gufd_err:
 38452 000030C5 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx ; 0
 38453                                  gufd_error:
 38454 000030C7 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 38455 000030C9 F9                      	stc	; cf=1
 38456 000030CA EBEE                    	jmp	short gufd_x	
 38457                                  %endif
 38458                                  
 38459                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 38460                                  %if 0
 38461                                  gufd_err:
 38462                                  	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 38463                                  	; 11/12/2022
 38464                                  	; ds = cs
 38465                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],ax	; erase the previous values
 38466                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 38467                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 38468                                  	mov	[DevUMBSize],ax		; erase the previous values
 38469                                  	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 38470                                  	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 38471                                  	stc
 38472                                  	retn
 38473                                  %endif
 38474                                  
 38475                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38476                                  ;
 38477                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 38478                                  ;
 38479                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 38480                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 38481                                  ;
 38482                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 38483                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena
 38484                                  ;	Put the owner of the sub-arena as (AX+1)
 38485                                  ;	Copies the file name into sub-arena name field
 38486                                  ;
 38487                                  ;	Size field of the sub-arena will be set only at succesful
 38488                                  ;	completion of Device load.
 38489                                  ;
 38490                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38491                                  
 38492                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 38493                                  	; (SYSINIT:2C13h)
 38494                                  
 38495                                  DevSetMark:
 38496 000030CC 06                      	push	es
 38497                                  	; 03/01/2023
 38498                                  	;push	di
 38499 000030CD 1E                      	push	ds
 38500 000030CE 56                      	push	si
 38501 000030CF 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 38502 000030D1 26C606000044            	mov	byte [es:devmark.id],devmark_device ; 'D'
 38503 000030D7 40                      	inc	ax
 38504 000030D8 26A30100                	mov	[es:devmark.seg],ax
 38505                                  
 38506                                  ;-------------- Copy file name
 38507                                  
 38508 000030DC 50                      	push	ax			; save load addr
 38509                                  
 38510                                  	; 09/09/2023
 38511                                  	; ds = cs
 38512                                  	;lds	si,[cs:bpb_addr]	; command line is still there
 38513 000030DD C536[8103]              	lds	si,[bpb_addr]
 38514                                  
 38515 000030E1 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 38516 000030E3 FC                      	cld
 38517                                  dsm_again:
 38518 000030E4 AC                      	lodsb
 38519 000030E5 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 38520 000030E7 7504                    	jne	short isit_slash
 38521 000030E9 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 38522 000030EB EBF7                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 38523                                  isit_slash:
 38524 000030ED 3C5C                    	cmp	al, '\'
 38525 000030EF 7504                    	jne	short isit_null
 38526 000030F1 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 38527 000030F3 EBEF                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 38528                                  isit_null:
 38529 000030F5 08C0                    	or	al,al
 38530 000030F7 75EB                    	jnz	short dsm_again
 38531 000030F9 89FE                    	mov	si,di
 38532                                  
 38533 000030FB BF0800                  	mov	di,devmark.filename ; 8
 38534 000030FE B90800                  	mov	cx,8			; maximum 8 characters
 38535                                  dsm_next_char:
 38536 00003101 AC                      	lodsb
 38537 00003102 08C0                    	or	al, al
 38538 00003104 7407                    	jz	short blankout
 38539 00003106 3C2E                    	cmp	al, '.'
 38540 00003108 7403                    	je	short blankout
 38541 0000310A AA                      	stosb
 38542 0000310B E2F4                    	loop	dsm_next_char
 38543                                  blankout:
 38544 0000310D E304                    	jcxz	dsm_exit
 38545 0000310F B020                    	mov	al, ' '
 38546 00003111 F3AA                    	rep	stosb			; blank out the rest
 38547                                  dsm_exit:
 38548 00003113 58                      	pop	ax			; restore load addr
 38549 00003114 5E                      	pop	si
 38550 00003115 1F                      	pop	ds
 38551                                  	; 03/01/2023
 38552                                  	;pop	di
 38553 00003116 07                      	pop	es
 38554 00003117 C3                      	retn

 38594                                  					; assuming that we fail later

 38601 0000314A B10C                    	mov	cl,12

 38620                                  	; 12/12/2022

 39007                                  ;
 39008                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 39009                                  ;
 39010                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 39011                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 39012                                  ;
 39013                                  ;	Returns in AX the number number of paras equivalent to the
 39014                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 39015                                  ;
 39016                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 39017                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 39018                                  ;
 39019                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39020                                  
 39021                                  ; 13/05/2019
 39022                                  
 39023                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 39024                                  	; (SYSINIT:38C5h)
 39025                                  
 39026                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 39027                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)
 39028                                  GetHexNum:
 39029 00003250 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 39030 00003252 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 39031                                  ghn_next:
 39032 00003254 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 39033 00003257 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh
 39034 0000325A 7436                    	je	short ghn_err
 39035 0000325C 80FB0A                  	cmp	bl,lf  ; 0Ah
 39036 0000325F 7431                    	je	short ghn_err
 39037 00003261 50                      	push	ax
 39038 00003262 88D8                    	mov	al,bl
 39039 00003264 E8DA0F                  	call	delim
 39040 00003267 58                      	pop	ax
 39041                                  	; 03/01/2023
 39042 00003268 B90400                  	mov	cx,4
 39043 0000326B 7410                    	jz	short ghn_into_paras
 39044 0000326D E82400                  	call	GetNibble
 39045                                  	;jc	short ghn_err
 39046                                  	; 11/12/2022
 39047 00003270 7221                    	jc	short ghn_ret ; cf=1
 39048                                  	; 03/01/2023
 39049                                  	;mov	cx,4
 39050                                  ghn_shift1:
 39051 00003272 D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 39052 00003274 D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 39053 00003276 E2FA                    	loop	ghn_shift1
 39054 00003278 08D8                    	or	al,bl
 39055 0000327A 46                      	inc	si
 39056 0000327B EBD7                    	jmp	short ghn_next
 39057                                  ghn_into_paras:
 39058 0000327D 83C00F                  	add	ax,15
 39059 00003280 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 39060 00003283 F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h
 39061 00003287 7509                    	jnz	short ghn_err
 39062                                  	; 03/01/2023
 39063                                  	;mov	cx,4
 39064                                  ghn_shift2:
 39065 00003289 F8                      	clc
 39066 0000328A D1DA                    	rcr	dx,1
 39067 0000328C D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 39068 0000328E E2F9                    	loop	ghn_shift2
 39069 00003290 F8                      	clc
 39070 00003291 C3                      	retn
 39071                                  	; 11/12/2022
 39072                                  ghn_err:
 39073                                  gnib_err:
 39074 00003292 F9                      	stc
 39075                                  ghn_ret:
 39076                                  gnib_ret:
 39077 00003293 C3                      	retn
 39078                                  
 39079                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39080                                  ;
 39081                                  ; procedure : GetNibble
 39082                                  ;
 39083                                  ;	Convert one nibble (hex digit) in BL into binary
 39084                                  ;
 39085                                  ;	Returns binary value in BL
 39086                                  ;
 39087                                  ;	Returns carry if BL contains non-hex digit
 39088                                  ;
 39089                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39090                                  
 39091                                  GetNibble:
 39092 00003294 80FB30                  	cmp	bl,'0'
 39093                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 39094                                  	; 11/12/2022
 39095 00003297 72FA                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 39096 00003299 80FB39                  	cmp	bl,'9'
 39097 0000329C 7704                    	ja	short is_it_hex
 39098 0000329E 80EB30                  	sub	bl,'0'		; clc
 39099 000032A1 C3                      	retn
 39100                                  is_it_hex:
 39101 000032A2 80FB41                  	cmp	bl,'A'
 39102                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 39103                                  	; 11/12/2022
 39104 000032A5 72EC                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 39105 000032A7 80FB46                  	cmp	bl,'F'
 39106 000032AA 77E6                    	ja	short gnib_err ; 11/12/2022
 39107 000032AC 80EB37                  	sub	bl,'A'- 10	; clc
 39108 000032AF C3                      	retn
 39109                                  
 39110                                  	; 11/12/2022
 39111                                  ;gnib_err:
 39112                                  ;	stc
 39113                                  ;gnib_ret:
 39114                                  ;	retn

 39119                                  
 39120                                  ; umb.inc (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 39121                                  DOS_ARENA	equ 24h		; offset of arena_head var in DOS data segm.
 39122                                  UMB_ARENA	equ 8Ch		; offset of umb_head in DOS data
 39123

 39125                                  XMM_RELEASE_UMB	equ 11h
 39126                                  
 39127                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 39128                                  
 39129                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39130                                  ;
 39131                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 39132                                  ;
 39133                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 39134                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 39135                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 39136                                  ;			; DS = data
 39137                                  ;
 39138                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 39139                                  ;
 39140                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 39141                                  ;
 39142                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39143                                  
 39144                                  umb_insert:
 39145 000032B0 1E                      	push	ds
 39146                                  
 39147                                  	; 31/12/2022
 39148                                  	; ds = cs
 39149                                  
 39150                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]
 39151 000032B1 8E1E[BF1F]              	mov	ds,[DevDOSData] ; 31/12/2022 
 39152                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]
 39153 000032B5 8E1E8C00                	mov	ds,[UMB_ARENA]		; es = UMB_HEAD
 39154 000032B9 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 39155 000032BB 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 39156                                  ui_next:
 39157 000032BD 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 39158                                  					;    new block
 39159 000032BF 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 39160                                  					; Q: is current block the
 39161                                  					;    last
 39162 000032C1 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 39163 000032C7 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 39164                                  					; N: get next block
 39165 000032C9 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; M005
 39166                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 39167 000032CB E83B01                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 39168 000032CE EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 39169                                  
 39170                                  ui_insert:
 39171 000032D0 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 39172 000032D2 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 39173                                  
 39174 000032D3 29D9                    	sub	cx,bx
 39175 000032D5 F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 39176                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 39177 000032D7 C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 39178                                  	;mov	word [1],8
 39179 000032DC C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 39180                                  	;mov	[3],cx
 39181 000032E2 890E0300                	mov	[ARENA.SIZE],cx	
 39182                                  	;mov	word [8],4353h ; 'SC'
 39183 000032E6 C70608005343            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 39184                                  
 39185                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 39186                                  
 39187 000032EC 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 39188 000032EE 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 39189 000032F4 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0
 39190                                  					; mark as free
 39191 000032FB 83EA02                  	sub	dx,2			; make room for arena at
 39192                                  					; start & end of new block
 39193 000032FE 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 39194                                  
 39195                                  ; prepare arena at end of new block
 39196                                  	
 39197 00003303 01D3                    	add	bx,dx
 39198 00003305 43                      	inc	bx
 39199 00003306 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es=arena at top of new block
 39200 00003308 43                      	inc	bx			; bx=top of new block
 39201                                  
 39202                                  					; ax contains arena just above
 39203                                  					; this block
 39204 00003309 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = size of used block
 39205                                  	
 39206 0000330B 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 39207 00003311 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 39208 00003318 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 39209 0000331C 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 39210                                  
 39211 00003323 EB47                    	jmp	short ui_done
 39212                                  
 39213                                  ui_append:
 39214                                  					; es = arena of last block	
 39215 00003325 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para
 39216 0000332A 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1	; reflect the space we are
 39217                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 39218                                  					; block for the next arena.
 39219                                  	; 13/05/2019
 39220 00003330 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 39221                                  
 39222 00003336 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx=top of prev block-1
 39223 00003338 40                      	inc	ax
 39224 00003339 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax=top of prev block - 
 39225                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 39226 0000333B F7D8                    	neg	ax
 39227                                  
 39228 0000333D 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; ds = arena of unused block
 39229                                  
 39230 0000333F 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 39231 00003345 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 39232 0000334C 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 39233 00003350 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 39234                                  
 39235                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 39236 00003357 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 39237 00003359 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 39238 0000335F 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system
 39239                                  					; mark as free
 39240 00003366 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 39241 00003367 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 39242                                  ui_done:
 39243                                  uc_done: ; 31/12/2022 ; *!
 39244 0000336C 1F                      	pop	ds
 39245                                  	; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 39246                                  ;uc_done:	; 18/12/2022
 39247                                  au_exit:	; 09/09/2023
 39248 0000336D C3                      	retn

 39263                                  au_next:
 39264 00003373 E87000                  	call	umb_allocate		; allocate
 39265 00003376 7205                    	jc	short au_coalesce
 39266 00003378 E835FF                  	call	umb_insert		; & insert till no UMBs
 39267 0000337B EBF6                    	jmp	short au_next
 39268                                  au_coalesce:
 39269                                  	; 09/09/2023
 39270                                  ;	call	umb_coalesce		; coalesce all UMBs
 39271                                  ;au_exit:
 39272                                  ;	; 31/12/2022
 39273                                  ;	; ds = cs
 39274                                  ;	retn
 39275                                  
 39276                                  	; 09/09/2023
 39277                                  	;jmp	short umb_coalesce
 39278                                  
 39279                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 39280                                  
 39281                                  ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 39282                                  
 39283                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39284                                  ;
 39285                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 39286                                  ;
 39287                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 39288                                  ;	if it's free. Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 39289                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 39290                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 39291                                  ;
 39292                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 39293                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 39294                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IF not at end
 39295                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 39296                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 39297                                  ;
 39298                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39299                                  
 39300                                  umb_coalesce:
 39301                                  	; 31/12/2022
 39302                                  	; ds = cs
 39303 0000337D 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 39304                                  
 39305 0000337E 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 39306                                  
 39307                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 39308                                  	; 31/12/2022
 39309 00003380 8E06[BF1F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 39310 00003384 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 39311                                  uc_nextfree:
 39312 00003389 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 39313 0000338B 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 39314                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 39315 0000338D 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 39316 00003392 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 39317                                  					; N: get next arena
 39318 00003394 E86B00                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 39319 00003397 72D3                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 39320 00003399 EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 39321                                  uc_again:
 39322 0000339B E86400                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 39323 0000339E 72CC                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 39324                                  uc_check:
 39325 000033A0 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 39326 000033A5 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 39327                                  					; Y: coalesce
 39328 000033A7 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 39329 000033AC 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 39330                                  	;add	[3],cx
 39331 000033AD 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 39332 000033B1 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 39333 000033B4 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 39334 000033B6 EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 39335                                  
 39336                                  	; 18/12/2022
 39337                                  ;uc_done:
 39338                                  	;retn

 39356 000033C1 8C06[BF1F]              	mov	[DevDOSData],es		; & save it for later
 39357 000033C5 B81043                  	mov	ax,4310h
 39358 000033C8 CD2F                    	int	2Fh

 39360                                  	;mov	[cs:DevXMSAddr+2],es
 39361 000033CA 891E[A81F]              	mov	[DevXMSAddr],bx		; get XMS driver address
 39362 000033CE 8C06[AA1F]              	mov	[DevXMSAddr+2],es	
 39363                                  	; 31/12/2022
 39364 000033D2 803E[BE1F]00            	cmp	byte [FirstUMBLinked],0

 39366                                  	;jne	short ia_1		; quit if we already did it

 39387                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39388                                  ;
 39389                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_allocate
 39390                                  ;
 39391                                  ; Inputs		: DS = data
 39392                                  ;
 39393                                  ; Outputs		: if UMB available
 39394                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 39395                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 39396                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block
 39397                                  ;				NC
 39398                                  ;			  else 
 39399                                  ;				CY
 39400                                  ;
 39401                                  ; Uses			: BX, DX
 39402                                  ;
 39403                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39404                                  
 39405                                  umb_allocate:
 39406                                  	; 31/12/2022
 39407                                  	; ds = cs
 39408 000033E6 50                      	push	ax
 39409 000033E7 B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 39410 000033E9 BAFFFF                  	mov	dx,0FFFFh		; try to allocate largest
 39411                                  					;   possible
 39412                                  	; 31/12/2022
 39413 000033EC FF1E[A81F]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 39414                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 39415                                  					; dx now contains the size of
 39416                                  					; the largest UMB
 39417 000033F0 09D2                    	or	dx,dx
 39418 000033F2 740B                    	jz	short ua_err
 39419                                  	
 39420 000033F4 B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 39421                                  
 39422                                  	; 31/12/2022
 39423 000033F6 FF1E[A81F]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 39424                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 39425                                  
 39426 000033FA 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1			; Q: was the reqst successful
 39427                                  	;jne	short ua_err		; N: error
 39428                                  	; 27/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 39429 000033FD 7601                    	jna	short ua_done ; if ax=1 then cf=0, else cf=1 (ax=0)
 39430                                  ua_err:
 39431 000033FF F9                      	stc	
 39432                                  
 39433                                  	;clc
 39434                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 39435                                  	; 12/12/2022
 39436                                  	; cf=0
 39437                                  	;clc 
 39438                                  ua_done:
 39439 00003400 58                      	pop	ax
 39440 00003401 C3                      	retn
 39441                                  	; 27/07/2023
 39442                                  ;ua_err:
 39443                                  	;stc
 39444                                  	;jmp	short ua_done
 39445                                  
 39446                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39447                                  ;
 39448                                  ;**	get_next - Find Next item in Arena
 39449                                  ;
 39450                                  ;	ENTRY	dS - pointer to block head
 39451                                  ;	EXIT	AX,ES - pointers to next head
 39452                                  ;		'C' set if arena damaged
 39453                                  ;
 39454                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39455                                  
 39456                                  	; 01/11/2022
 39457                                  get_next:
 39458 00003402 803E00005A              	cmp	byte [0],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 39459 00003407 740A                    	je	short gn_err
 39460                                  _get_next_:
 39461 00003409 8CD8                    	mov     ax,ds                   ; ax=current block
 39462 0000340B 03060300                	add     ax,[ARENA.SIZE]		; ax=ax + current block length
 39463 0000340F 40                      	inc     ax                      ; remember that header!
 39464 00003410 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 39465                                  	;clc
 39466                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 39467                                  	; 11/12/2022
 39468                                  	; cf=0
 39469                                  	;clc
 39470 00003412 C3                      	retn
 39471                                  gn_err:
 39472 00003413 F9                      	stc
 39473                                  	; 11/12/2022	
 39474                                  lfu_err:	 ; cf=1
 39475 00003414 C3                      	retn

 39477                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39478                                  ;
 39479                                  ; procedure : LinkFirstUMB
 39480                                  ;
 39481                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39482                                  
 39483                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 39484                                  	; (SYSINIT:2F81h)
 39485                                  LinkFirstUMB:
 39486                                  	; 31/12/2022
 39487                                  	; ds = cs

 39489 00003418 72FA                    	jc	short lfu_err  ; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 39490

 39492                                  ; dx = size of UMB
 39493                                  
 39494                                  	; 31/12/2022
 39495                                  	; ds = cs
 39496                                  
 39497 0000341A CD12                    	int	12h			; ax = size of memory
 39498 0000341C B106                    	mov	cl,6
 39499 0000341E D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; ax = size in paragraphs
 39500                                  
 39501 00003420 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx = size in paras
 39502 00003422 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = - size of unused block
 39503                                  
 39504 00003424 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 39505                                  
 39506                                  	;sub	cx,1			; cx = first umb_arena
 39507                                  	; 09/09/2023
 39508 00003426 49                      	dec	cx
 39509 00003427 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; es = first umb_arena
 39510                                  	
 39511 00003429 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'

 39576                                  ; procedure : ShrinkUMB
 39577                                  ;
 39578                                  ;	Shrinks the current UMB in use, so that the unused portions
 39579                                  ;	of the UMB is given back to the DOS free mem pool

 39584                                  	; 12/12/2022

 39586 00003486 833E[A21F]00            	cmp	word [DevUMBAddr],0
 39587                                  	;cmp	word [cs:DevUMBAddr],0
 39588 0000348B 741F                    	je	short su_exit
 39589 0000348D 06                      	push	es
 39590                                  	; 01/01/2023
 39591                                  	;push	bx
 39592                                  	; 12/12/2022
 39593                                  	;mov	bx,[cs:DevUMBFree]
 39594                                  	;sub	bx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 39595                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 39596 0000348E 8B1E[A61F]              	mov	bx,[DevUMBFree]
 39597 00003492 2B1E[A21F]              	sub	bx,[DevUMBAddr]
 39598 00003496 8E06[A21F]              	mov	es,[DevUMBAddr]
 39599                                  	
 39600 0000349A B8004A                  	mov	ax,4A00h
 39601 0000349D CD21                    	int	21h
 39602                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ADJUST MEMORY BLOCK SIZE (SETBLOCK)
 39603                                  		; ES = segment address of block to change
 39604                                  		; BX = new size in paragraphs
 39605 0000349F 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 39606 000034A1 48                      	dec	ax
 39607 000034A2 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 39608 000034A4 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8
 39609                                  	; 01/01/2023
 39610                                  	;pop	bx

 39634                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]	; get DOS data seg
 39635 000034BA 268E1E2400              	mov	ds,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 39636 000034BF 268B3E8C00              	mov	di,[es:UMB_ARENA]
 39637                                  ulu_next:

 39639 000034C7 720D                    	jc	short ulu_x
 39640 000034C9 39C7                    	cmp	di,ax			; is the next one UMB ?
 39641 000034CB 7404                    	je	short ulu_found

 39652                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 39653                                  ; SYSINIT2.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 39654                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 39655                                  ; 14/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 39656                                  
 39657                                  ; Multiple configuration block support  Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 39658                                  ;
 39659                                  ; Summary:
 39660                                  ;
 39661                                  ;   The procedure "organize" crunches the in-memory copy of config.sys
 39662                                  ;   into lines delimited by CR/LF (sometimes no CR, but *always* an LF)
 39663                                  ;   with the leading "keyword=" replaced by single character codes (eg, B
 39664                                  ;   for BUFFERS, D for DEVICE, Z for any unrecognized keyword); see comtab
 39665                                  ;   and/or config.inc for the full list.
 39666                                  ;
 39667                                  ;   [blockname] and INCLUDE are the major syntactical additions for multi-
 39668                                  ;   configuration support. blockname is either MENU, which contains one
 39669                                  ;   or more MENUITEM lines, an optional MENUDEFAULT (which includes optional
 39670                                  ;   time-out), or any user-defined keyword, such as NETWORK, CD-ROM, etc.
 39671                                  ;   INCLUDE allows the current block to name another block for inclusion
 39672                                  ;   during the processing phase of CONFIG.SYS. An INCLUDE is only honored
 39673                                  ;   once, precluding nasty infinite-loop scenarios. If blocks are present
 39674                                  ;   without a MENU block, then only lines inside COMMON blocks are processed.
 39675                                  ;
 39676                                  ; Example:
 39677                                  ;
 39678                                  ;   [menu]
 39679                                  ;   menuitem=misc,Miscellaneous
 39680                                  ;   menuitem=network,Network Configuration
 39681                                  ;   menudefault=network,15
 39682                                  ;
 39683                                  ;   [network]
 39684                                  ;   include misc
 39685                                  ;   device=foo
 39686                                  ;
 39687                                  ;   [misc]
 39688                                  ;   device=bar
 39689                                  ;   include alternate
 39690                                  ;
 39691                                  ;   [alternate]
 39692                                  ;   device=tar
 39693                                  ;
 39694                                  ;
 39695                                  ;   When the menu is displayed
 39696                                  ;
 39697                                  ;    1. Miscellaneous
 39698                                  ;    2. Network Configuration
 39699                                  ;
 39700                                  ;   #2 is highlighted as the default option, and will be automatically
 39701                                  ;   selected after 15 seconds. It will invoke the following lines in the
 39702                                  ;   following order:
 39703                                  ;
 39704                                  ;       DEVICE=BAR
 39705                                  ;       DEVICE=TAR
 39706                                  ;       DEVICE=FOO
 39707                                  ;
 39708                                  
 39709                                  ;MULTI_CONFIG equ 1
 39710                                  
 39711                                  ; the following depend on the positions of the various letters in switchlist
 39712                                  
 39713                                  switchnum	equ 11111000b ; 0F8h	; which switches require number
 39714                                  
 39715                                  flagec35	equ 00000100b ; 4	; electrically compatible 3.5 inch disk drive
 39716                                  flagdrive	equ 00001000b ; 8 
 39717                                  flagcyln	equ 00010000b ; 16
 39718                                  flagseclim	equ 00100000b ; 32
 39719                                  flagheads	equ 01000000b ; 64
 39720                                  flagff		equ 10000000b ; 128
 39721                                  
 39722                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39723                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 39724                                  
 39725                                  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3E78h
 39726                                  
 39727                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 39728                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3054h
 39729                                  
 39730 000034D9 00                      insert_blank:	db 	0

 39866                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39867                                  ;
 39868                                  ; procedure : parseline
 39869                                  ;
 39870                                  ; entry point is parseline. al contains the first character in command line.
 39871                                  ;
 39872                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39873                                  
 39874                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 39875                                  	; (SYSINIT:3EDFh)
 39876                                  
 39877                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 39878                                  	; (SYSINIT:30ACh)
 39879                                  parseline:
 39880                                  	; 03/01/2023
 39881                                  	; ds = cs ; *
 39882                                  
 39883                                  	;push	ds ; *
 39884                                  
 39885                                  	;push	cs ; *
 39886                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 39887                                  
 39888                                  nextswtch:
 39889                                  	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 39890                                  	je	short done_line
 39891                                  	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 39892                                  	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 39893                                  
 39894                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 39895                                  
 39896                                  	cmp	al,' '                  ; space?
 39897                                  	jbe	short getnext		; skip over space
 39898                                  	cmp	al,'/'
 39899                                  	je	short getparm
 39900                                  	stc				; mark error invalid-character-in-input
 39901                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 39902                                  	; 03/01/2023
 39903                                  swterr:
 39904                                  	retn
 39905                                  
 39906                                  getparm:
 39907                                  	call	check_switch
 39908                                  	mov	[switches],bx		; save switches read so far
 39909                                  	jc	short swterr
 39910                                  getnext:
 39911                                  	call	getchr
 39912                                  	;jc	short done_line
 39913                                  	;jmp	short nextswtch
 39914                                  	; 03/01/2023
 39915                                  	jnc	short nextswtch
 39916                                  ;swterr:
 39917                                  	;jmp	short exitpl		; exit if error
 39918                                  
 39919                                  done_line:
 39920                                  	; 12/12/2022
 39921                                  	test	byte [switches],flagdrive ; 8
 39922                                  	;test	word [switches],flagdrive ; 8 ; see if drive specified
 39923                                  	jnz	short okay
 39924                                  	stc				; mark error no-drive-specified
 39925                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 39926                                  	; 03/01/2023
 39927                                  	retn
 39928                                  
 39929                                  okay:
 39930                                  	mov	ax,[switches]
 39931                                  	and	ax,0003h	    ; get flag bits for changeline and non-rem
 39932                                  	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES],ax
 39933                                  	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_TRACKTABLEENTRIES],0
 39934                                  	;clc			    ; everything is fine
 39935                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 39936                                  	; 12/12/2022
 39937                                  	; cf=0
 39938                                  	;clc
 39939                                  	;call	setdeviceparameters
 39940                                  	; 03/01/2023
 39941                                  	jmp	setdeviceparameters
 39942                                  ;exitpl:
 39943                                  	; 03/01/2023
 39944                                  	; ds = cs
 39945                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 39946                                  	retn
 39947                                  put_back:
 39948                                  	inc	word [count]		; one more char to scan
 39949                                  	dec	word [chrptr]		; back up over linefeed
 39950                                  	jmp	short done_line
 39951                                  
 39952                                  %endif

 39956                                  ; procedure : check_switch
 39957                                  ;
 39958                                  ; processes a switch in the input. it ensures that the switch is valid, and
 39959                                  ; gets the number, if any required, following the switch. the switch and the
 39960                                  ; number *must* be separated by a colon. carry is set if there is any kind of
 39961                                  ; error.
 39962                                  ;
 39963                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39964                                  
 39965                                  ; 09/09/2023
 39966                                  
 39967                                  err_swtch:
 39968 0000353B 31CB                    	xor	bx,cx			; remove this switch from the records
 39969                                  err_check:
 39970 0000353D F9                      	stc
 39971                                  err_chk:
 39972                                  done_swtch:	; 09/09/2023 (cf=0)
 39973 0000353E C3                      	retn
 39974                                  
 39975                                  	; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)

 39982 00003546 3C41                    	cmp	al,'A'
 39983                                  	;jb	short err_check
 39984 00003548 72F4                    	jb	short err_chk ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0

 39996                                  	; 09/09/2023

 39998 00003554 8A0D                    	mov	cl,[di]
 39999 00003556 B500                    	mov	ch,0
 40000 00003558 47                      	inc	di	; 1+switchlist
 40001                                  
 40002 00003559 F2AE                    	repne	scasb
 40003                                  
 40004 0000355B 07                      	pop	es
 40005 0000355C 75DF                    	jnz	short err_check
 40006                                  
 40007 0000355E B80100                  	mov	ax,1
 40008 00003561 D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; set bit to indicate switch
 40009 00003563 8B1E[9549]              	mov	bx,[switches]		; get switches so far
 40010 00003567 09C3                    	or	bx,ax			; save this with other switches
 40011 00003569 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax

 40019

 40021 00003576 75C3                    	jne	short err_swtch
 40022                                  
 40023 00003578 E8EB0C                  	call	getchr
 40024 0000357B 53                      	push	bx			; preserve switches

 40232                                  ; procedure : setdeviceparameters
 40233                                  ;
 40234                                  ; setdeviceparameters sets up the recommended bpb in each bds in the
 40235                                  ; system based on the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the
 40236                                  ; various form factors are present in the bpbtable. for hard files,
 40237                                  ; the recommended bpb is the same as the bpb on the drive.
 40238                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers since we are going to jump to
 40239                                  ; sysinit straight after this routine.
 40240                                  ;
 40241                                  ;	if we return carry, the DRIVPARM will be aborted, but presently
 40242                                  ;	  we always return no carry
 40243                                  ;
 40244                                  ;	note:  there is a routine by the same name in msdioctl.asm
 40245                                  ;
 40246                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40247                                  
 40248                                  ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 40249                                  
 40250                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 40251                                  
 40252                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 40253                                  	; (SYSINIT:3FC4h)
 40254                                  
 40255                                  	; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 40256                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4236h)
 40257

 40259                                  	; 03/01/2023

 40274                                  got_80:

 40320 0000363F A2[7548]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 2
 40321                                  
 40322 00003642 B3F0                    	mov	bl,0F0h			; get default mediabyte
 40323

 40325                                  
 40326                                  	;mov	bh,[deviceparameters+17]
 40327                                  	; 02/11/2022
 40328 00003644 8A3E[7D48]              	mov	bh,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 40329                                  	
 40330                                  	; 03/01/2023
 40331                                  	; ax = 2
 40332 00003648 3906[8248]              	cmp	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],ax ; >2 heads?
 40333                                  	;cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],2 ; >2 heads?
 40334 0000364C 773C                    	ja	short got_correct_mediad ; just use default if heads>2
 40335                                  
 40336 0000364E 7524                    	jne	short only_one_head	; one head, do one head stuff
 40337                                  
 40338                                  ;	two head drives will use the mediadescriptor from the bpb
 40339                                  
 40340 00003650 88FB                    	mov	bl,bh			; get mediadescriptor from bpb
 40341                                  
 40342                                  ;	two sided drives have two special cases to look for. One is
 40343                                  ;	   a 320K diskette (40 tracks, 8 secs per track). It uses
 40344                                  ;	   a mediaid of 0fch. The other is 1.44M, which uses only
 40345                                  ;	   one sector/cluster.
 40346                                  
 40347                                  ;	any drive with 18secs/trk, 2 heads, 80 tracks, will be assumed
 40348                                  ;	   to be a 1.44M and use only 1 sector per cluster. Any other
 40349                                  ;	   type of 2 headed drive is all set.
 40350                                  
 40351 00003652 833E[8048]12            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],18
 40352 00003657 7509                    	jne	short not_144m
 40353 00003659 833E[7048]50            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],80
 40354 0000365E 7502                    	jne	short not_144m
 40355                                  
 40356                                  ;	We've got cyl=80, heads=2, secpertrack=18. Set cluster size to 1.
 40357                                  
 40358 00003660 EB24                    	jmp	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 40359                                  
 40360                                  ;	check for 320K
 40361                                  
 40362                                  not_144m:
 40363 00003662 833E[7048]28            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 40364 00003667 7521                    	jne	short got_correct_mediad
 40365 00003669 833E[8048]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 40366 0000366E 751A                    	jne	short got_correct_mediad
 40367                                  
 40368 00003670 B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh
 40369 00003672 EB16                    	jmp	short got_correct_mediad
 40370                                  
 40371                                  only_one_head:
 40372                                  
 40373                                  ;	if we don't have a 360K drive, then just go use 0f0h as media descr.
 40374                                  
 40375 00003674 803E[6D48]00            	cmp	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],DEV_5INCH ; 0
 40376 00003679 740B                    	je	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 40377                                  
 40378                                  ;	single sided 360K drive uses either 0fch or 0feh, depending on
 40379                                  ;	  whether sectorspertrack is 8 or 9. For our purposes, anything
 40380                                  ;	  besides 8 will be considered 0fch
 40381                                  
 40382 0000367B B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh			; single sided 9 sector media id
 40383 0000367D 833E[8048]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 40384                                  	; 12/12/2022
 40385 00003682 7502                    	jne	short got_one_secperclus_drive ; okay if anything besides 8
 40386

 40388                                  
 40389                                  ;	we've either got a one sided drive, or a 1.44M drive

 40391

 40393                                  	; 03/01/2023
 40394                                  	; ax = 2
 40395 00003686 48                      	dec	ax  ; ax = 1
 40396 00003687 A2[7548]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 1
 40397                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],1
 40398                                  
 40399                                  got_correct_mediad:
 40400 0000368A 881E[7D48]              	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR],bl
 40401                                  
 40402                                  ;	 Calculate the correct number of Total Sectors on medium
 40403                                  
 40404 0000368E A1[7048]                	mov	ax,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS]
 40405 00003691 F726[8248]              	mul	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS]
 40406 00003695 F726[8048]              	mul	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK]
 40407 00003699 A3[7B48]                	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_TOTALSECTORS],ax
 40408 0000369C F8                      	clc				; we currently return no errors
 40409                                  
 40410 0000369D C3                      	retn
