 41895                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41896                                  ;
 41897                                  ;   copy_block:  copy the current block to the new config.sys workspace
 41898                                  ;
 41899                                  ;   INPUT
 41900                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 41901                                  ;    ES:SI -> remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 41902                                  ;    DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace (equal in size to the original
 41903                                  ;             config.sys image) where the current block is to be copied
 41904                                  ;
 41905                                  ;   OUTPUT
 41906                                  ;       Same as above
 41907                                  ;       AL also equals the last character read from the organized image
 41908                                  ;
 41909                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 41910                                  ;       All
 41911                                  ;
 41912                                  ;   NOTES
 41913                                  ;       None
 41914                                  ;
 41915                                  ;   HISTORY
 41916                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 41917                                  ;
 41918                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 41919                                  
 41920                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 41921                                  	; (SYSINIT:4759h)
 41922                                  
 41923                                  copy_block:
 41924 00003D51 E87103                          call    get_char        ; check for include
 41925 00003D54 72FA                            jc	short copy_done	;
 41926 00003D56 247F                    	and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 41927 00003D58 3C5B                    	cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; another BEGIN implies END as well
 41928 00003D5A 74F4                            je	short copy_done ;
 41929                                  
 41930 00003D5C 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE ; 'J'
 41931 00003D5E 88E0                            mov     al,ah           ; AL == the original line code
 41932 00003D60 753A                            jne	short copy_line	; not an "include" line
 41933                                  
 41934                                  ;   We have hit an "INCLUDE" line; first, REM out the line so that we
 41935                                  ;   never try to include the block again (no infinite include loops please),
 41936                                  ;   then search for the named block and call copy_block again.
 41937                                  
 41938 00003D62 26C644FF30                      mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM ; '0'
 41939 00003D67 57                              push    di              ;
 41940                                  
 41941 00003D68 BF[7D47]                        mov     di,szMenu
 41942 00003D6B E8D400                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE MENU
 41943 00003D6E 7426                            je	short copy_skip	;
 41944                                  
 41945 00003D70 BF[8247]                        mov     di,szCommon
 41946 00003D73 E8CC00                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE COMMON
 41947 00003D76 741E                            je	short copy_skip	;
 41948                                  
 41949 00003D78 89F7                            mov     di,si           ; try to find the block
 41950 00003D7A E86400                          call    srch_block      ;
 41951 00003D7D 89FA                            mov     dx,di           ;
 41952                                  	; 10/09/2023
 41953                                  	;pop    di              ;
 41954 00003D7F 7514                            jne	short copy_error ; no such block
 41955 00003D81 5F                      	pop	di  ; 10/09/2023
 41956 00003D82 51                              push    cx              ;
 41957 00003D83 89D9                            mov     cx,bx           ;
 41958 00003D85 56                              push    si              ;
 41959 00003D86 4A                              dec     dx              ;
 41960 00003D87 89D6                            mov     si,dx           ;
 41961 00003D89 E80E03                          call    skip_line       ; skip the rest of the "block name" line
 41962 00003D8C E8C2FF                          call    copy_block      ; and copy in the rest of that block
 41963 00003D8F 5E                              pop     si              ;
 41964 00003D90 59                              pop     cx              ;
 41965 00003D91 28C0                            sub     al,al           ; force skip_opt_line to skip...
 41966 00003D93 EB2B                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 41967                                  
 41968                                  copy_error:
 41969                                  	; 10/09/2023
 41970 00003D95 F8                      	clc
 41971                                  copy_skip:
 41972 00003D96 5F                              pop     di
 41973                                  ;copy_error:
 41974                                  	; 10/09/2023 (cf=0)
 41975                                  	;clc                    ;
 41976 00003D97 E80004                          call    print_error     ; note that carry is clear, no pause
 41977 00003D9A EB24                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 41978                                  
 41979                                  ;   Copy the line at ES:SI to the current location at DS:DI
 41980                                  
 41981                                  copy_line:
 41982 00003D9C 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 41983 00003D9E 47                              inc     di              ;
 41984 00003D9F 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ; is this is a "real" line with a "real" code?
 41985 00003DA1 721D                            jb	short copy_nextline ; no
 41986 00003DA3 2E803E[EA14]00                  cmp     byte [cs:config_multi],0
 41987 00003DA9 7409                            je	short copy_loop	; not a multi-config config.sys, don't embed #s
 41988 00003DAB E81700                          call    get_linenum	; BX == line # of line @ES:SI
 41989 00003DAE 891D                            mov     [di],bx         ; stash it immediately following the line code
 41990 00003DB0 47                              inc     di              ;
 41991 00003DB1 47                              inc     di              ;
 41992 00003DB2 EB08                            jmp     short copy_next ;
 41993                                  copy_loop:                      ;
 41994 00003DB4 E80E03                          call    get_char        ;
 41995 00003DB7 7297                            jc	short copy_done ; end of file
 41996 00003DB9 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 41997 00003DBB 47                              inc     di              ;
 41998                                  copy_next:
 41999 00003DBC 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah	; done with line?
 42000 00003DBE 75F4                            jne	short copy_loop	; nope
 42001                                  
 42002                                  copy_nextline:
 42003 00003DC0 E8DC02                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 42004 00003DC3 EB8C                            jmp     short copy_block
 42005                                  
 42006                                  	; 18/12/2022
 42007                                  ;copy_done:
 42008                                          ;retn
 42009                                  
 42010                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42011                                  ;
 42012                                  ;   get_linenum:  return line # (in BX) of current line (@ES:SI)
 42013                                  ;
 42014                                  ;   INPUT
 42015                                  ;    ES:SI -> some line in the config.sys memory image
 42016                                  ;
 42017                                  ;   OUTPUT
 42018                                  ;       BX == line # (relative to 1)
 42019                                  ;
 42020                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 42021                                  ;       DX
 42022                                  ;
 42023                                  ;   NOTES
 42024                                  ;       None
 42025                                  ;
 42026                                  ;   HISTORY
 42027                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 42028                                  ;
 42029                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42030                                  
 42031                                  get_linenum:
 42032 00003DC5 50                              push    ax              ;
 42033 00003DC6 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX == line # (to be returned)
 42034 00003DC8 51                              push    cx              ;
 42035 00003DC9 89F2                            mov     dx,si           ; DX == the offset we're looking for
 42036 00003DCB 56                              push    si              ;
 42037 00003DCC 2E8B0E[5603]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 42038 00003DD1 29F6                            sub     si,si           ; prepare to scan entire file
 42039                                  get_linenum_loop:               ;
 42040 00003DD3 E8C402                          call    skip_line       ;
 42041 00003DD6 7205                            jc	short get_linenum_done
 42042 00003DD8 43                              inc     bx              ;
 42043 00003DD9 39D6                            cmp     si,dx           ; have we exceeded the desired offset yet?
 42044 00003DDB 72F6                            jb	short get_linenum_loop ; no
 42045                                  get_linenum_done:               ;
 42046 00003DDD 5E                              pop     si              ;
 42047 00003DDE 59                              pop     cx              ;
 42048 00003DDF 58                              pop     ax              ;
 42049 00003DE0 C3                              retn
 42050                                  
 42051                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42052                                  ;
 42053                                  ;   srch_block:  searches entire config.sys for block name @ES:DI
 42054                                  ;
 42055                                  ;   INPUT
 42056                                  ;       ES -> config.sys image
 42057                                  ;    ES:DI -> block name to find
 42058                                  ;
 42059                                  ;   OUTPUT
 42060                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found
 42061                                  ;    ES:DI -> just past the name in the block heading, if found
 42062                                  ;       BX == # bytes remaining from that point, if found
 42063                                  ;
 42064                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 42065                                  ;       None
 42066                                  ;
 42067                                  ;   NOTES
 42068                                  ;       This differs from "find_block" in that it searches the ENTIRE
 42069                                  ;       config.sys image, not merely the remaining portion, and that it
 42070                                  ;       takes a pointer to block name that is *elsewhere* in the image
 42071                                  ;       (ie, ES) as opposed to some string constant in our own segment (DS).
 42072                                  ;
 42073                                  ;   HISTORY
 42074                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 42075                                  ;
 42076                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42077                                  
 42078                                  srch_block:	          ; returns BX -> named block in CONFIG.SYS
 42079 00003DE1 50                              push    ax              ;
 42080 00003DE2 51                              push    cx              ;
 42081 00003DE3 2E8B0E[5603]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 42082 00003DE8 56                              push    si              ;
 42083 00003DE9 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 42084 00003DEB 1E                              push    ds              ;
 42085 00003DEC 06                              push    es              ;
 42086 00003DED 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 42087 00003DEE E80900                          call    find_block      ;
 42088 00003DF1 89F7                            mov     di,si           ;
 42089 00003DF3 89CB                            mov     bx,cx           ;
 42090 00003DF5 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 42091 00003DF6 5E                              pop     si              ;
 42092 00003DF7 59                              pop     cx              ;
 42093 00003DF8 58                              pop     ax              ;
 42094                                  find_exit: ; 16/04/2019
 42095 00003DF9 C3                              retn			;
 42096                                  
 42097                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42098                                  ;
 42099                                  ;   find_block:  searches rest of config.sys for block name @DS:DI
 42100                                  ;
 42101                                  ;   INPUT
 42102                                  ;    DS:DI -> block name to find
 42103                                  ;    ES:SI -> remainder of config.sys image
 42104                                  ;       CX == remaining size of config.sys image
 42105                                  ;
 42106                                  ;   OUTPUT
 42107                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found (also, CF set if EOF)
 42108                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the search stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 42109                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 42110                                  ;
 42111                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 42112                                  ;       AX
 42113                                  ;
 42114                                  ;   NOTES
 42115                                  ;       This differs from "srch_block" in that it searches only the
 42116                                  ;       remaining portion of the config.sys image and leaves SI and CX
 42117                                  ;       pointing to where the search left off, and that it takes a pointer
 42118                                  ;       to search string in our own segment (DS:DI instead of ES:DI).
 42119                                  ;
 42120                                  ;   HISTORY
 42121                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 42122                                  ;
 42123                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42124                                  
 42125                                  find_block:
 42126 00003DFA E8C802                          call    get_char        ; get line code
 42127 00003DFD 72FA                            jc	short find_exit	; end of file
 42128 00003DFF 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY
 42129 00003E01 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; beginning of a block?
 42130 00003E03 740C                            je	short check_line ; no
 42131 00003E05 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE
 42132 00003E07 7513                            jne	short next_line	;
 42133 00003E09 2E800E[EA14]01                  or	byte [cs:config_multi],1
 42134 00003E0F EB0B                            jmp     short next_line ;
 42135                                  check_line:
 42136 00003E11 2E800E[EA14]01                  or      byte [cs:config_multi],1
 42137 00003E17 E80700                          call    comp_names      ; compare block names
 42138 00003E1A 76DD                            jbe	short find_exit	; end of file, or names matched
 42139                                  next_line:
 42140 00003E1C E88002                          call    skip_opt_line   ; no, so skip to next line
 42141 00003E1F EBD9                            jmp	short find_block  ;
 42142                                  ;find_exit:
 42143                                  ;	retn
 42144                                  
 42145                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42146                                  ;
 42147                                  ;   comp_names:  compares keyword @DS:DI to position in config.sys @ES:SI
 42148                                  ;
 42149                                  ;   INPUT
 42150                                  ;    DS:DI -> keyword to compare
 42151                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 42152                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 42153                                  ;
 42154                                  ;   OUTPUT
 42155                                  ;       ZF flag set, if match (also, CF set if EOF)
 42156                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the comparison stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 42157                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 42158                                  ;
 42159                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 42160                                  ;       AX
 42161                                  ;
 42162                                  ;   NOTES
 42163                                  ;       None
 42164                                  ;
 42165                                  ;   HISTORY
 42166                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 42167                                  ;
 42168                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42169                                  
 42170                                  comp_names:
 42171 00003E21 57                              push    di              ;
 42172                                  comp_loop:                      ;
 42173 00003E22 E8A002                          call    get_char        ;
 42174 00003E25 7210                            jc	short comp_exit	;
 42175 00003E27 E80704                          call    any_delim       ; is next character a delimiter?
 42176 00003E2A 8A25                            mov     ah,[di]         ; (get next character we're supposed to match)
 42177 00003E2C 740B                            je	short comp_almost ; yes, it *could* be a match
 42178 00003E2E 47                              inc     di              ;
 42179 00003E2F 25DFDF                          and     ax,~2020h ; 0DFDFh 
 42180                                  				; BUGBUG -- assumes both names are alphanumeric -JTP
 42181 00003E32 38E0                            cmp     al,ah           ; match?
 42182 00003E34 74EC                            je	short comp_loop ; yes, keep looking at the characters
 42183 00003E36 F8                              clc                     ; prevent erroneous eof indication: clear carry
 42184                                  comp_exit:                      ;
 42185 00003E37 5F                              pop     di              ;
 42186 00003E38 C3                              retn			;
 42187                                  comp_almost:                    ;
 42188 00003E39 86C4                            xchg    al,ah           ; we don't know for sure if it's a match
 42189 00003E3B E8F303                          call    any_delim       ; until we verify that the second string has
 42190 00003E3E 86C4                            xchg    al,ah           ; been exhausted also...
 42191 00003E40 EBF5                            jmp     short comp_exit ; if we are, this call to any_delim will tell...
 42192                                  
 42193                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42194                                  
 42195                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 42196                                  comp_names_x:
 42197                                  	;
 42198                                  comp_names_safe:
 42199 00003E42 50                              push    ax
 42200 00003E43 51                              push    cx
 42201 00003E44 56                              push	si
 42202 00003E45 1E                              push    ds
 42203 00003E46 0E                              push    cs
 42204 00003E47 1F                              pop     ds
 42205 00003E48 E8D6FF                          call    comp_names
 42206 00003E4B 1F                              pop     ds
 42207 00003E4C 5E                      	pop	si
 42208 00003E4D 59                              pop     cx
 42209 00003E4E 58                              pop     ax
 42210 00003E4F C3                              retn

 42214                                  ;   print_item:  display menu item #BL
 42215                                  ;
 42216                                  ;   INPUT
 42217                                  ;       BL == menu item # to display
 42218                                  ;
 42219                                  ;   OUTPUT

 42221                                  ;

 42223                                  ;       None
 42224                                  ;
 42225                                  ;   NOTES
 42226                                  ;       This function saves/restores the current cursor position, so you
 42227                                  ;       needn't worry about it.
 42228                                  ;
 42229                                  ;   HISTORY
 42230                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 42231                                  ;
 42232                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42233                                  
 42234                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 42235                                  	; (SYSINIT:485Ah)
 42236                                  
 42237                                  print_item:		; prints menu item #BL (1 to N)
 42238 00003E50 50                              push    ax              ;
 42239 00003E51 53                              push    bx              ;
 42240 00003E52 51                              push    cx              ;
 42241 00003E53 52                              push    dx              ;
 42242 00003E54 56                              push    si              ;
 42243 00003E55 B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 42244 00003E57 8A3E[3447]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; always page zero
 42245 00003E5B CD10                            int     10h             ; DH/DL = row/column
 42246 00003E5D 52                              push    dx              ; save it
 42247 00003E5E B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 42248 00003E60 88DE                            mov     dh,bl           ;
 42249 00003E62 80C603                          add     dh,3            ;
 42250 00003E65 B205                            mov     dl,5            ;
 42251 00003E67 CD10                            int     10h             ; set cursor position for correct row/col
 42252 00003E69 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 42253 00003E6B 0430                            add     al,'0'          ; convert menu item # to ASCII digit
 42254 00003E6D 8A26[3347]                      mov     ah,[bMenuColor] ; normal attribute
 42255 00003E71 3A1E[3D47]                      cmp     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; are we printing the current block?
 42256 00003E75 7510                            jne	short print_other ; no
 42257 00003E77 80CC70                          or      ah,70h          ; yes, set bgnd color to white
 42258 00003E7A 88E5                            mov     ch,ah           ;
 42259 00003E7C B104                            mov     cl,4            ;
 42260 00003E7E D2C5                            rol     ch,cl           ;
 42261 00003E80 38E5                            cmp     ch,ah           ; are fgnd/bgnd the same?
 42262 00003E82 7503                            jne	short print_other ; no
 42263 00003E84 80F408                          xor     ah,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 42264                                  print_other:                    ;
 42265 00003E87 B700                            mov     bh,0            ;
 42266 00003E89 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 42267 00003E8B 8BBF[6147]                      mov     di,[aoffBlockDesc+bx]
 42268 00003E8F 88E3                            mov     bl,ah           ; put the attribute in the correct register now
 42269 00003E91 8A3E[3447]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; get correct video page #
 42270 00003E95 B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; write char/attr
 42271 00003E97 B90100                          mov     cx,1            ;
 42272 00003E9A CD10                            int     10h             ;
 42273 00003E9C FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 42274 00003E9E B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 42275 00003EA0 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 42276                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+'.'    ;
 42277 00003EA2 B82E09                          mov	ax,092Eh
 42278 00003EA5 CD10                    	int     10h             ; display '.'
 42279 00003EA7 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 42280 00003EA9 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 42281 00003EAB CD10                            int     10h             ;
 42282                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+' '    ;
 42283 00003EAD B82009                          mov	ax,0920h
 42284 00003EB0 CD10                    	int     10h             ; display ' '
 42285 00003EB2 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 42286 00003EB4 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 42287 00003EB6 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 42288 00003EB8 06                              push    es              ;
 42289                                  print_loop:                     ;
 42290 00003EB9 268A05                          mov     al,[es:di]	; get a character of the description
 42291 00003EBC 47                              inc     di              ;
 42292 00003EBD 3C09                            cmp     al,TAB ; 9	; substitute spaces for tabs
 42293 00003EBF 7502                            jne	short print_nontab ;
 42294 00003EC1 B020                            mov     al,' '          ;
 42295                                  print_nontab:                   ;
 42296 00003EC3 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ;
 42297 00003EC5 7215                            jb	short print_done ; stop at the 1st character < space
 42298 00003EC7 3C24                            cmp     al,'$'          ;
 42299 00003EC9 7411                            je	short print_done ; also stop on $
 42300 00003ECB B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; display function #
 42301 00003ECD CD10                            int     10h             ;
 42302 00003ECF FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 42303 00003ED1 80FA4E                          cmp     dl,78           ; far enough?
 42304 00003ED4 7306                            jae	short print_done ; yes
 42305 00003ED6 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 42306 00003ED8 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 42307 00003EDA EBDD                            jmp	short  print_loop
 42308                                  print_done:                     ;
 42309 00003EDC 07                              pop     es              ;
 42310 00003EDD 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 42311 00003EDE B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 42312 00003EE0 CD10                            int     10h             ; restore previous row/col
 42313 00003EE2 5E                              pop     si              ;
 42314 00003EE3 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 42315 00003EE4 59                              pop     cx              ;
 42316 00003EE5 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 42317 00003EE6 58                              pop     ax              ;
 42318 00003EE7 C3                              retn			;
 42319                                  
 42320                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42321                                  ;
 42322                                  ;   select_item:  wait for user to select menu item, with time-out
 42323                                  ;
 42324                                  ;   INPUT
 42325                                  ;       None
 42326                                  ;
 42327                                  ;   OUTPUT
 42328                                  ;       BX == menu item # (1-N), or -1 for clean boot
 42329                                  ;       Selected menu item highlighted
 42330                                  ;       Cursor positioned beneath menu, ready for tty-style output now
 42331                                  ;
 42332                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 42333                                  ;       None
 42334                                  ;
 42335                                  ;   NOTES
 42336                                  ;       None
 42337                                  ;
 42338                                  ;   HISTORY
 42339                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 42340                                  ;
 42341                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42342                                  
 42343                                  select_item:		; returns digit value in BX (trashes AX/CX/DX)
 42344 00003EE8 8A1E[3D47]                      mov     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; BL will be the default block #
 42345 00003EEC 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 42346 00003EEE E83701                          call    disp_num        ;
 42347 00003EF1 E84401                          call    show_status     ; display current interactive status
 42348 00003EF4 803E[4147]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 42349 00003EF9 7452                            je	short input_key	; no time-out, just go to input
 42350 00003EFB B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME ; 2Ch
 42351 00003EFD CD21                            int     21h             ;
 42352 00003EFF 88F7                            mov     bh,dh           ; BH = initial # of seconds
 42353                                  check_time:
 42354 00003F01 A0[4147]                        mov     al,[secTimeOut] ;
 42355 00003F04 2A06[4247]                      sub     al,[secElapsed] ;
 42356 00003F08 730D                            jae	short show_time	;
 42357 00003F0A 800E[3C47]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2  ; disable all further prompting
 42358 00003F0F C606[4247]00                    mov     byte [secElapsed],0
 42359 00003F14 E9F600                          jmp	select_done	; time's up!
 42360                                  show_time:
 42361 00003F17 53                              push    bx              ;
 42362 00003F18 88C3                            mov     bl,al           ; save # in BL
 42363 00003F1A 8A3E[3447]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 42364 00003F1E B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 42365 00003F20 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 42366 00003F22 52                              push    dx              ;
 42367 00003F23 80C208                  	add	dl,8		; move cursor to the right
 42368 00003F26 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 42369 00003F28 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 42370 00003F2A BA[9B4D]                        mov     dx,_$TimeOut
 42371 00003F2D E8DB05                          call    print           ; print the "Time remaining: " prompt
 42372 00003F30 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ; recover # from BL
 42373 00003F32 98                              cbw                     ; this works because AL is always <= 90
 42374 00003F33 B10A                            mov     cl,10           ;
 42375 00003F35 F6F1                            div     cl              ; AL = tens digit, AH = ones digit
 42376 00003F37 88E1                            mov     cl,ah           ;
 42377 00003F39 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 42378 00003F3B B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 42379 00003F3D CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY tens digit
 42380 00003F3F 88C8                            mov     al,cl           ;
 42381 00003F41 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 42382 00003F43 B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 42383 00003F45 CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY ones digit
 42384 00003F47 5A                              pop     dx
 42385 00003F48 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position back to where it was
 42386 00003F4A CD10                            int     10h             ;
 42387 00003F4C 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 42388                                  input_key:
 42389 00003F4D B406                            mov     ah,RAW_CON_IO ; 6
 42390 00003F4F B2FF                            mov     dl,0FFh         ; input request
 42391 00003F51 CD21                            int     21h             ;
 42392 00003F53 751F                            jnz	short got_key	;
 42393 00003F55 803E[4147]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1; is there a time-out?
 42394 00003F5A 74F1                            je	short input_key	; no, just go back to input
 42395 00003F5C B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME     ;
 42396 00003F5E CD21                            int     21h             ; DH = seconds
 42397 00003F60 88F4                            mov     ah,dh           ;
 42398 00003F62 28FE                            sub     dh,bh           ; should generally be zero or one
 42399 00003F64 88E7                            mov     bh,ah           ;
 42400 00003F66 7302                            jnc	short got_time	;
 42401 00003F68 B601                            mov     dh,1            ; it wrapped back to zero, so assume one
 42402                                  got_time:
 42403 00003F6A 08F6                            or      dh,dh           ; any change?
 42404 00003F6C 74DF                            jz	short input_key	; no
 42405 00003F6E 0036[4247]                      add     [secElapsed],dh ;
 42406 00003F72 EB8D                            jmp	short check_time ;
 42407                                  got_key:
 42408 00003F74 50                              push    ax              ;
 42409 00003F75 B8FFFF                          mov     ax,-1           ; zap both secTimeOut and secElapsed
 42410 00003F78 8706[4147]                      xchg    [secTimeOut],ax
 42411 00003F7C 3CFF                            cmp     al,-1           ; was time-out already disabled?
 42412 00003F7E 740E                            je	short timeout_disabled ; yes
 42413 00003F80 53                              push    bx              ; let's disable # seconds display
 42414 00003F81 B8200A                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 42415 00003F84 8B1E[3347]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 42416 00003F88 B95000                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be safe
 42417 00003F8B CD10                            int     10h             ; to completely obliterate # seconds display
 42418 00003F8D 5B                              pop     bx   		;
 42419                                  
 42420                                  timeout_disabled:
 42421 00003F8E 58                              pop     ax              ;
 42422 00003F8F 08C0                            or      al,al           ; extended key pressed?
 42423 00003F91 755A                            jnz	short normal_key ; no
 42424 00003F93 CD21                            int     21h             ; get the next part of the key then
 42425 00003F95 74B6                            jz	short input_key	; hmmm, what happened to the second part?
 42426                                  
 42427 00003F97 3C48                            cmp     al,48h          ; up arrow?
 42428 00003F99 7510                            jne	short not_up	; no
 42429 00003F9B 80FB01                          cmp     bl,1            ; are we as up as up can get?
 42430 00003F9E 76AD                            jbe	short input_key	; yes, ignore it
 42431 00003FA0 FE0E[3D47]                      dec     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 42432 00003FA4 E8A9FE                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 42433 00003FA7 FECB                            dec     bl              ; and then print the new current item
 42434 00003FA9 EB12                            jmp     short print1
 42435                                  not_up:
 42436 00003FAB 3C50                            cmp     al,50h          ; down arrow?
 42437 00003FAD 7518                            jne	short not_down	; no
 42438 00003FAF 3A1E[3E47]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; are we as down as down can get?
 42439 00003FB3 7310                            jae	short to_input_key ; yes, ignore it
 42440 00003FB5 FE06[3D47]                      inc     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 42441 00003FB9 E894FE                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 42442 00003FBC 43                              inc     bx              ; and then print the new current item
 42443                                  print1: 
 42444 00003FBD 88D8                    	mov     al,bl           ;
 42445                                  print2: 
 42446 00003FBF E88EFE                  	call    print_item      ;
 42447 00003FC2 E86300                          call    disp_num        ;
 42448                                  to_input_key:
 42449 00003FC5 EB86                            jmp	short input_key ; 10/09/2023
 42450                                  not_down:
 42451 00003FC7 F606[3847]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 42452 00003FCC 75F7                            jnz	short to_input_key ; don't allow F8 or F5
 42453 00003FCE 3C42                            cmp     al,42h          ; F8 function key?
 42454 00003FD0 750B                            jne	short not_f8	; no
 42455 00003FD2 8036[3C47]01                    xor     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 42456 00003FD7 E85E00                          call    show_status     ;
 42457 00003FDA E970FF                          jmp     input_key	;
 42458                                  not_f8:
 42459 00003FDD 3C3F                            cmp     al,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 42460 00003FDF 75E4                            jne	short to_input_key ; no
 42461                                  	; 02/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 42462                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:49EBh
 42463                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4C32h)
 42464 00003FE1 800E[3C47]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4 ; no more queries
 42465 00003FE6 BBFFFF                          mov     bx,-1           ; special return code (-1) indicating clean boot
 42466 00003FE9 B020                            mov     al,' '          ; don't want to display anything really;
 42467 00003FEB EB26                            jmp     short disp_input ; just want to display the cr/lf sequence...
 42468                                  
 42469                                  normal_key:
 42470 00003FED 3C0D                            cmp     al,0Dh          ; Enter?
 42471 00003FEF 741C                            je	short select_done ; yes
 42472 00003FF1 3C08                            cmp     al,08h          ; backspace?
 42473 00003FF3 7504                            jne	short not_backspace ; no
 42474 00003FF5 BBFEFF                          mov     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; yes, special return code
 42475 00003FF8 C3                              retn			;
 42476                                  not_backspace:
 42477 00003FF9 2C30                            sub     al,'0'          ; is greater than '0'?
 42478 00003FFB 76C8                            jbe	short to_input_key ; no
 42479 00003FFD 3A06[3E47]                      cmp     al,[bMaxBlock]  ; is less than or equal to the maximum digit?
 42480 00004001 77C2                            ja	short to_input_key ; no
 42481 00004003 A2[3D47]                        mov	[bDefBlock],al  ;
 42482 00004006 E847FE                          call    print_item      ; redisplay the current selection
 42483 00004009 88C3                            mov     bl,al           ; set new selection
 42484 0000400B EBB2                            jmp	short print2
 42485                                  
 42486                                  select_done:
 42487 0000400D B700                            mov     bh,0            ; return a full 16-bit value (for indexing)
 42488 0000400F 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 42489 00004011 0430                            add     al,'0'          ; convert it into a digit, then display it
 42490                                  
 42491                                  	; fall into disp_input
 42492                                  
 42493                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0

 42496                                  ;
 42497                                  ;   disp_input:  display a single character + cr/lf
 42498                                  ;
 42499                                  ;   INPUT
 42500                                  ;       AL == character to display
 42501                                  ;
 42502                                  ;   OUTPUT
 42503                                  ;       None
 42504                                  ;
 42505                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 42506                                  ;       None
 42507                                  ;
 42508                                  ;   NOTES
 42509                                  ;       This function is used not only for the menu input selection but
 42510                                  ;       also for the interactive line prompting (the y/n/a thing).
 42511                                  ;
 42512                                  ;   HISTORY
 42513                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 42514                                  ;

 42518                                  disp_input:
 42519 00004013 50                      	push	ax
 42520                                  	;cmp	al,' '
 42521                                  	;jae	short disp_ok
 42522                                  	;mov	al,' '
 42523                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO:SYS (Optimization)
 42524 00004014 B220                    	mov	dl,' ' ; 20h
 42525 00004016 38D0                    	cmp	al,dl
 42526 00004018 7602                    	jna	short disp_input_ok
 42527                                  disp_ok:
 42528 0000401A 88C2                    	mov	dl,al
 42529                                  disp_input_ok:
 42530 0000401C B402                    	mov	ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 42531 0000401E CD21                    	int	21h
 42532 00004020 BA[E84A]                	mov	dx,crlfm
 42533 00004023 E8E504                  	call	print
 42534 00004026 58                      	pop	ax
 42535 00004027 C3                      	retn

 42543 0000402D 8B1E[3347]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]

 42545 00004034 CD10                            int     10h
 42546 00004036 5B                              pop     bx
 42547 00004037 C3                              retn

 42550                                  ;
 42551                                  ;   show_status:  display current interactive mode setting (on/off/none)
 42552                                  ;
 42553                                  ;   INPUT
 42554                                  ;       None
 42555                                  ;
 42556                                  ;   OUTPUT
 42557                                  ;       None
 42558                                  ;
 42559                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 42560                                  ;       None
 42561                                  ;
 42562                                  ;   NOTES
 42563                                  ;       None
 42564                                  ;
 42565                                  ;   HISTORY
 42566                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 42567                                  ;
 42568                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42569                                  
 42570                                  show_status:
 42571 00004038 53                              push    bx              ; BL = video page #
 42572 00004039 8B1E[3347]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 42573 0000403D B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 42574 0000403F CD10                            int     10h             ;

 42576 00004042 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 42577 00004044 8B16[3647]                      mov     dx,[bLastCol]   ; set correct row/col
 42578 00004048 F606[3847]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 42579 0000404D 740C                            jz	short show_onoff ; just show on/off
 42580 0000404F B200                            mov     dl,0            ;
 42581 00004051 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 42582 00004053 B8200A                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 42583 00004056 B95000                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be exact
 42584                                  	; 10/09/2023
 42585                                  	;int	10h             ; to obliterate the status line
 42586 00004059 EB11                            jmp     short show_done ;
 42587                                  show_onoff: 
 42588 0000405B CD10                            int     10h
 42589                                  		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTERS ONLY AT CURSOR POSITION
 42590                                  		; AL = character, BH = display page - alpha mode
 42591                                  		; BL = color of character (graphics mode, PCjr only)
 42592                                  		; CX = number of times to write character
 42593                                  
 42594 0000405D A0[974D]                        mov     al,[_$NO]	; assume OFF
 42595 00004060 803E[3C47]01                    cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; is interactive mode on?
 42596 00004065 7503                            jne	short show_noton ; no
 42597 00004067 A0[934D]                        mov     al,[_$YES]	; yes
 42598                                  show_noton:                     ;
 42599 0000406A B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ; write TTY
 42600                                  show_done:	; 10/09/2023
 42601 0000406C CD10                            int     10h             ;
 42602                                  ;show_done:                     ;
 42603 0000406E 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 42604 0000406F B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 42605 00004071 CD10                            int     10h             ; restore original cursor position
 42606 00004073 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 42607 00004074 C3                              retn			;

 42612                                  ;
 42613                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 42614                                  ;
 42615                                  ;   INPUT
 42616                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 42617                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 42618                                  ;
 42619                                  ;   OUTPUT
 42620                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 42621                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 42622                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 42623                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 42624                                  ;
 42625                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 42626                                  ;       AX
 42627                                  ;
 42628                                  ;   NOTES
 42629                                  ;       None
 42630                                  ;
 42631                                  ;   HISTORY
 42632                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 42633                                  ;
 42634                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42635                                  
 42636                                  skip_token:
 42637 00004075 E84D00                          call    get_char
 42638 00004078 7210                            jc	short skip_token_done
 42639 0000407A E8B401                          call    any_delim
 42640 0000407D 75F6                            jne	short skip_token
 42641                                  skip_check_eol:
 42642 0000407F 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 42643 00004081 7406                            je	short skip_token_eol
 42644 00004083 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 42645 00004085 7402                            je	short skip_token_eol
 42646 00004087 F8                              clc
 42647                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 42648 00004088 C3                      	retn
 42649                                  skip_token_eol:
 42650 00004089 F9                              stc
 42651                                  skip_token_done:
 42652 0000408A C3                              retn
 42653                                  
 42654                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42655                                  ;
 42656                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 42657                                  ;
 42658                                  ;   INPUT
 42659                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 42660                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 42661                                  ;
 42662                                  ;   OUTPUT
 42663                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 42664                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 42665                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 42666                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 42667                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 42668                                  ;
 42669                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 42670                                  ;       AX
 42671                                  ;
 42672                                  ;   NOTES
 42673                                  ;       None
 42674                                  ;
 42675                                  ;   HISTORY
 42676                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 42677                                  ;
 42678                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42679                                  
 42680                                  skip_delim:	; returns carry set if eol/eof
 42681 0000408B E83700                          call    get_char        ;
 42682 0000408E 8D5CFF                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 42683 00004091 72F7                            jc	short skip_token_done ;
 42684 00004093 E8AB01                          call    delim           ;
 42685 00004096 74F3                            je	short skip_delim ;
 42686 00004098 EBE5                            jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 42687                                  
 42688                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42689                                  ;
 42690                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 42691                                  ;
 42692                                  ;   INPUT
 42693                                  ;       AL == last character read
 42694                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 42695                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 42696                                  ;
 42697                                  ;   OUTPUT
 42698                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 42699                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 42700                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 42701                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 42702                                  ;
 42703                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 42704                                  ;       AX
 42705                                  ;
 42706                                  ;   NOTES
 42707                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 42708                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 42709                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 42710                                  ;
 42711                                  ;   HISTORY
 42712                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 42713                                  ;
 42714                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42715                                  
 42716                                  ; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 42717                                  ;skip_opt_line:
 42718                                  ;	cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 42719                                  ;	je	short skip_line_done
 42720                                       
 42721                                  	; fall into skip_line
 42722                                  
 42723                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42724                                  ;
 42725                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 42726                                  ;
 42727                                  ;   INPUT
 42728                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 42729                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 42730                                  ;
 42731                                  ;   OUTPUT
 42732                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 42733                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 42734                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 42735                                  ;
 42736                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 42737                                  ;       AX
 42738                                  ;
 42739                                  ;   NOTES
 42740                                  ;       None
 42741                                  ;
 42742                                  ;   HISTORY
 42743                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 42744                                  ;
 42745                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42746                                  
 42747                                  skip_line:
 42748 0000409A E82800                          call    get_char
 42749 0000409D 7204                            jc	short skip_line_done
 42750                                  skip_opt_line:	; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 42751 0000409F 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 42752 000040A1 75F7                            jne	short skip_line
 42753                                  skip_line_done:
 42754                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 42755 000040A3 C3                              retn
 42756                                  
 42757                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42758                                  ;
 42759                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 42760                                  ;
 42761                                  ;   INPUT
 42762                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 42763                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 42764                                  ;
 42765                                  ;   OUTPUT
 42766                                  ;       AL == non-digit encountered
 42767                                  ;       BX == binary #
 42768                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st non-digit
 42769                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 42770                                  ;
 42771                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 42772                                  ;       AX
 42773                                  ;
 42774                                  ;   NOTES
 42775                                  ;       None
 42776                                  ;
 42777                                  ;   HISTORY
 42778                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 42779                                  ;
 42780                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42781                                  
 42782                                  ; 13/05/2019
 42783                                  
 42784                                  get_number:
 42785 000040A4 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX = result
 42786                                  num_loop:
 42787 000040A6 E81C00                          call    get_char        ;
 42788 000040A9 72F8                            jc	short num_done	;
 42789 000040AB 3C30                            cmp     al,'0'          ; convert to value
 42790 000040AD 72F4                            jb	short num_done	; no more number
 42791 000040AF 3C39                            cmp     al,'9'          ;
 42792 000040B1 77F0                            ja	short num_done	;
 42793 000040B3 50                              push    ax              ;
 42794 000040B4 B80A00                          mov     ax,10           ;
 42795 000040B7 52                              push    dx              ;
 42796 000040B8 F7E3                            mul     bx              ;
 42797 000040BA 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 42798 000040BB 89C3                            mov     bx,ax           ;
 42799 000040BD 58                              pop     ax              ;
 42800 000040BE 2C30                            sub     al,'0'          ;
 42801 000040C0 98                              cbw                     ;
 42802 000040C1 01C3                            add     bx,ax           ;
 42803 000040C3 EBE1                            jmp	short num_loop	;
 42804                                  
 42805                                  	; 18/12/2022
 42806                                  ;num_done:
 42807                                          ;retn
 42808                                  
 42809                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42810                                  ;
 42811                                  ;   get_char:  return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 42812                                  ;
 42813                                  ;   INPUT
 42814                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 42815                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 42816                                  ;
 42817                                  ;   OUTPUT
 42818                                  ;       AL == next character
 42819                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 42820                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 42821                                  ;
 42822                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 42823                                  ;       AX
 42824                                  ;
 42825                                  ;   NOTES
 42826                                  ;       None
 42827                                  ;
 42828                                  ;   HISTORY
 42829                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 42830                                  ;
 42831                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42832                                  
 42833                                  get_char:
 42834 000040C5 83E901                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 42835 000040C8 7205                            jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 42836                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 42837 000040CA 26                      	es	
 42838 000040CB AC                      	lodsb
 42839 000040CC 88C4                            mov     ah,al           ;
 42840 000040CE C3                              retn			;
 42841                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 42842 000040CF B90000                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 42843                                  nearby_ret:
 42844 000040D2 C3                              retn
 42845                                  
 42846                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42847                                  ;
 42848                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 42849                                  ;
 42850                                  ;   INPUT
 42851                                  ;       AL == current command code
 42852                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 42853                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 42854                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 42855                                  ;
 42856                                  ;   OUTPUT
 42857                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 42858                                  ;
 42859                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 42860                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 42861                                  ;
 42862                                  ;   NOTES
 42863                                  ;       None
 42864                                  ;
 42865                                  ;   HISTORY
 42866                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 42867                                  ;
 42868                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 42869                                  
 42870                                  	; 31/12/2022 - Retro UNIX 386 v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 42871                                  	; (SYSINIT:4AE5h)
 42872                                  
 42873                                  	; 12/12/2022
 42874                                  query_user:
 42875 000040D3 F606[3C47]04                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 42876                                  	; 01/01/2023
 42877 000040D8 7403                    	jz	short qu_1		;
 42878 000040DA E9B900                  	jmp	skip_all
 42879                                  	; 12/12/2022
 42880                                  	;;jmp	short skip_all		;
 42881                                  	;jnz	short skip_all
 42882                                  qu_1:
 42883 000040DD F606[3C47]02            	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 42884 000040E2 75EE                            jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 42885 000040E4 50                              push    ax                      ;
 42886 000040E5 A0[E914]                        mov     al,[config_cmd]         ;
 42887 000040E8 F606[3C47]01                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 42888 000040ED 7506                            jnz	short query_all		; yes
 42889 000040EF A880                            test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 42890                                  	; 01/01/2023
 42891 000040F1 7502                    	jnz	short query_all		;
 42892                                  	; 12/12/2022
 42893                                  	;;jmp	short do_cmd		;
 42894                                  	;jz	short do_cmd ; cf=0
 42895                                  
 42896                                  	; 01/01/2023
 42897 000040F3 58                      	pop	ax
 42898 000040F4 C3                      	retn
 42899                                  
 42900                                  query_all:
 42901                                  
 42902                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 42903                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 42904                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 42905                                  
 42906 000040F5 56                              push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 42907 000040F6 BA[ED4D]                        mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 42908 000040F9 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 42909 000040FB 7450                            jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 42910                                  
 42911 000040FD 88C6                            mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 42912 000040FF 29DB                            sub     bx,bx                   ;
 42913 00004101 BF[8947]                        mov     di,comtab		;
 42914                                  find_match:                             ;
 42915 00004104 8A1D                            mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 42916 00004106 08DB                            or      bl,bl                   ;
 42917 00004108 7425                            jz	short line_print	; end of table
 42918 0000410A 47                              inc     di                      ;
 42919 0000410B 3A01                            cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 42920 0000410D 7405                            je	short cmd_match		; yes
 42921 0000410F 8D7901                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 42922                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 42923 00004112 EBF0                            jmp	short find_match	; loop
 42924                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 42925 00004114 8A4DFF                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 42926 00004117 B500                            mov	ch,0                    ;
 42927 00004119 B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 42928                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 42929 0000411B 8A05                            mov     al,[di]                 ;
 42930 0000411D 47                              inc     di                      ;
 42931 0000411E 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 42932 00004120 CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 42933 00004122 E2F7                            loop    cmd_print               ;
 42934 00004124 B23D                            mov     dl,'='                  ;
 42935 00004126 80FE56                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 42936 00004129 7502                            jne	short cmd_notset	;
 42937 0000412B B220                            mov     dl,' '                  ;
 42938                                  cmd_notset:
 42939 0000412D CD21                            int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 42940                                  line_print:                             ;
 42941                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 42942 0000412F 26                              es
 42943 00004130 AC                      	lodsb
 42944 00004131 08C0                    	or      al,al                   ;
 42945 00004133 7502                            jnz	short non_null		;
 42946 00004135 B020                            mov     al,' '                  ;
 42947                                  non_null:                               ;
 42948 00004137 3C20                            cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 42949 00004139 720F                            jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 42950 0000413B 7505                            jne	short non_space		;
 42951                                          ; 10/09/2023
 42952 0000413D 263804                  	cmp	[es:si],al ; 20h
 42953                                  	;cmp	byte [es:si],' '	;
 42954 00004140 7208                            jb	short prompt_user	;
 42955                                  non_space:                              ;
 42956 00004142 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 42957 00004144 B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 42958 00004146 CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 42959 00004148 EBE5                            jmp	short line_print	;
 42960                                  
 42961                                  prompt_user:                            ;
 42962 0000414A BA[8B4D]                        mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 42963                                  
 42964                                  generic_prompt:
 42965 0000414D E8BB03                          call    print                   ;
 42966                                  input_loop:                             ;
 42967 00004150 B400                            mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 42968 00004152 CD16                            int     16h                     ;
 42969 00004154 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 42970 00004156 750F                            jnz	short not_func		; no
 42971 00004158 80FC3F                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 42972 0000415B 75F3                            jne	short input_loop	; no
 42973 0000415D A0[974D]                        mov     al,[_$NO]                  ;
 42974 00004160 800E[3C47]04                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 42975 00004165 EB21                            jmp     short legal_char        ;
 42976                                  not_func:
 42977 00004167 24DF                            and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 42978 00004169 3A06[974D]                      cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 42979 0000416D 7419                            je	short legal_char	;
 42980 0000416F 3A06[934D]                      cmp     al,[_$YES]		;
 42981 00004173 7413                            je	short legal_char	;
 42982 00004175 803E[E914]00                    cmp     byte [config_cmd],0	;
 42983 0000417A 74D4                            je	short input_loop	; don't allow Esc on this query
 42984 0000417C 3C1B                            cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?
 42985 0000417E 75D0                            jne	short input_loop	;
 42986 00004180 800E[3C47]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2	; no more interactive boot prompts
 42987 00004185 A0[934D]                        mov     al,[_$YES]
 42988                                  legal_char:                             ;
 42989 00004188 E888FE                          call    disp_input              ;
 42990 0000418B 5E                              pop     si                      ; restore pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 42991                                  
 42992 0000418C 3A06[974D]                      cmp     al,[_$NO]		; process line?
 42993 00004190 7403                            je	short skip_cmd		; no
 42994                                  	; 12/12/2022
 42995 00004192 F8                      	clc
 42996                                  do_cmd:
 42997 00004193 58                      	pop     ax			;
 42998                                  	; 12/12/2022
 42999                                  	; cf=0
 43000                                  	;clc				; just do the command
 43001 00004194 C3                      	retn
 43002                                  
 43003                                  skip_cmd:
 43004 00004195 58                      	pop     ax			;
 43005                                  skip_all:
 43006 00004196 B430                    	mov     ah,CONFIG_REM ; '0'	; fake out the rest of sysinit's processing
 43007 00004198 F9                      	stc
 43008 00004199 C3                      	retn
