 43065                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43066                                  
 43067                                  ;   This function is very simple: it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 43068                                  ;   command-line for the shell; this (undocumented) switch disables
 43069                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 43070                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 43071                                  
 43072                                  disable_autoexec:
 43073                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 43074                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 43075                                  
 43076 000041CE F606[3C47]04            	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 43077 000041D3 7443                    	jz	short disable_exit
 43078 000041D5 F606[3247]01            	test	byte [dae_flag],1
 43079 000041DA 753C                    	jnz	short disable_exit
 43080 000041DC 800E[3247]01            	or	byte [dae_flag],1
 43081                                          ;or	byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 43082 000041E1 810E[3C47]0201          	or      word [bQueryOpt],102h	; [bDefBlock] = 1
 43083 000041E7 BA4420                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 43084                                  dae_1:
 43085                                  	; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 43086 000041EA A0[7146]                        mov	al,[def_swchr]
 43087                                  	;mov	al,[command_line-1]     ; get default switchchar
 43088 000041ED 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; anything there?
 43089 000041EF 7427                            jz	short disable_exit	; no, disable_autoexec already called
 43090 000041F1 8A1E[7246]                      mov     bl,[command_line]       ;
 43091 000041F5 B700                            mov     bh,0                    ; BX == command-line length
 43092 000041F7 89D9                            mov     cx,bx                   ;
 43093 000041F9 80C303                          add     bl,3                    ;
 43094 000041FC 80FB7E                          cmp     bl,126                  ;
 43095 000041FF 7717                            ja	short disable_exit	;
 43096 00004201 881E[7246]                      mov     [command_line],bl       ; update length
 43097 00004205 81C3[7346]                      add     bx,command_line+1	; make sure we move the NULL too
 43098 00004209 41                              inc     cx                      ; (just for consistency sake)
 43099                                  disable_loop:                           ;
 43100 0000420A 8A67FD                          mov     ah,[bx-3]               ;
 43101 0000420D 8827                            mov     [bx],ah                 ;
 43102 0000420F 4B                              dec     bx                      ;
 43103 00004210 E2F8                            loop    disable_loop            ;
 43104 00004212 8847FE                          mov     [bx-2],al               ;
 43105                                  	;mov	word [bx-1],'D ' ; 2044h ; /D is stuffed into place now
 43106 00004215 8957FF                  	mov	[bx-1],dx  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4C29h		
 43107                                          ;mov	byte [command_line-1],0 ;
 43108                                  disable_exit:                           ;
 43109 00004218 C3                              retn
 43110

 43141                                  ;
 43142                                  any_delim:
 43143 00004231 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr
 43144 00004233 7427                    	je	short delim_ret
 43145 00004235 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf
 43146 00004237 7423                    	je	short delim_ret
 43147 00004239 3C5B                    	cmp	al,'['
 43148 0000423B 741F                    	je	short delim_ret
 43149 0000423D 3C5D                    	cmp	al,']'
 43150 0000423F 741B                    	je	short delim_ret
 43151                                  ;
 43152                                  ;;endif ;MULTI_CONFIG
 43153                                  ;%endif ; 02/11/2022

 43156                                  	; (SYSINIT:3450h)	
 43157                                  delim:

 43159 00004243 7417                    	je	short delim_ret

 43162 00004247 7413                    	je	short delim_ret

 43165 00004249 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '          ; the filename.

 43170 00004253 7407                    	je	short delim_ret

 43172 00004257 7403                    	je	short delim_ret
 43173 00004259 3C3B                    	cmp	al,';'
 43174

 43176

 43179                                  ;   Make sure there's no chance of a false EOF indication
 43180 0000425B F8                      	clc
 43181                                  ;endif

 43183                                  delim_ret:
 43184                                  	; 04/01/2023
 43185                                  	; cf = 0
 43186                                  nl_ret:	; 10/09/2023
 43187 0000425C C3                      	retn

 43250                                  ; procedure : mapcase
 43251                                  ;
 43252                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43253                                  
 43254                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 43255                                  
 43256                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 43257                                  	; (SYSINIT:4C7Eh)
 43258                                  mapcase:
 43259 0000427D 51                      	push	cx
 43260 0000427E 56                      	push	si
 43261 0000427F 1E                      	push	ds
 43262                                  
 43263 00004280 06                      	push	es
 43264 00004281 1F                      	pop	ds
 43265                                  
 43266                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 43267                                  
 43268                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 43269                                  
 43270                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 43271 00004282 88C3                    	mov	bl,al			; same cmd code this line
 43272                                  ;else
 43273                                  ;	xor	si,si
 43274                                  ;endif
 43275                                  	; 02/11/2022
 43276                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 43277                                  	;xor	si, si
 43278                                  
 43279                                  convloop:
 43280 00004284 AC                      	lodsb
 43281 00004285 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 43282 00004287 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 43283 00004289 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 43284 0000428B 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 43285 0000428D 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 43286 0000428F 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 43287                                  noconv:
 43288                                  
 43289                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 43290                                  
 43291                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 43292                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 43293                                  
 43294                                  ;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 43295                                  ;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 43296                                  ;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 43297                                  ;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 43298                                  ;
 43299 00004292 80FB56                  	cmp	bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 43300 00004295 7504                    	jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 43301 00004297 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 43302 00004299 740A                    	je	short convdone		; yes
 43303                                  check_eol:
 43304 0000429B 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr
 43305 0000429D 7406                    	je	short convdone
 43306 0000429F 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf
 43307 000042A1 7402                    	je	short convdone
 43308                                  ;endif
 43309                                  	; 02/11/2022
 43310 000042A3 E2DF                    	loop	convloop
 43311                                  convdone:
 43312 000042A5 1F                      	pop	ds
 43313 000042A6 5E                      	pop	si
 43314 000042A7 59                      	pop	cx
 43315 000042A8 C3                      	retn

 43317                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43318                                  ;
 43319                                  ; procedure : round
 43320                                  ;
 43321                                  ; round the values in memlo and memhi to paragraph boundary.
 43322                                  ; perform bounds check.
 43323                                  ;
 43324                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43325                                  
 43326                                  round:
 43327                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 43328 000042A9 1E                      	push	ds
 43329 000042AA 0E                      	push	cs
 43330 000042AB 1F                      	pop	ds
 43331                                  
 43332 000042AC 50                      	push	ax
 43333                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memlo]
 43334 000042AD A1[6203]                	mov	ax,[memlo]
 43335                                  
 43336 000042B0 E8C9CE                  	call	ParaRound		; para round up
 43337                                  
 43338                                  	;add	[cs:memhi],ax
 43339 000042B3 0106[6403]              	add	[memhi],ax
 43340                                  	;mov	word [cs:memlo],0
 43341 000042B7 C706[6203]0000          	mov	word [memlo],0
 43342                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; ax = new memhi
 43343 000042BD A1[6403]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 43344                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; if new memhi >= alloclim, error
 43345 000042C0 3B06[A502]              	cmp	ax,[ALLOCLIM]
 43346 000042C4 7320                    	jae	short mem_err
 43347                                  	;test	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],for_devmark ; 2
 43348 000042C6 F606[EE14]02            	test	byte [setdevmarkflag],for_devmark ; 2
 43349 000042CB 7416                    	jz	short skip_set_devmarksize
 43350 000042CD 06                      	push	es
 43351 000042CE 56                      	push	si
 43352                                  	;mov	si,[cs:devmark_addr]
 43353 000042CF 8B36[EC14]              	mov	si,[devmark_addr]
 43354 000042D3 8EC6                    	mov	es,si
 43355 000042D5 29F0                    	sub	ax,si
 43356 000042D7 48                      	dec	ax
 43357                                  	;mov	[es:3],ax
 43358 000042D8 26A30300                	mov	[es:devmark.size],ax	; paragraph
 43359                                  	;and	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],not_for_devmark ; 0FDh
 43360 000042DC 8026[EE14]FD            	and	byte [setdevmarkflag],not_for_devmark ; 0FDh
 43361 000042E1 5E                      	pop	si
 43362 000042E2 07                      	pop	es
 43363                                  skip_set_devmarksize:
 43364 000042E3 58                      	pop	ax

 43368

 43370                                  	; cf = 0
 43371                                  	; 02/11/2022
 43372                                  	;clc	; ? (not needed here)	; clear carry
 43373 000042E5 C3                      	retn

 43418 00004316 7203                    	jb	short notdig2
 43419                                  	;cmp	al,9
 43420                                  	;ja	short notdig
 43421                                  	;clc
 43422                                  	;retn

 43431                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43432                                  ;
 43433                                  ; procedure : getnum
 43434                                  ;
 43435                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 43436                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 43437                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 43438                                  ;
 43439                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43440                                  
 43441                                  getnum:
 43442 0000431C 53                      	push	bx
 43443 0000431D 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 43444                                  b2:
 43445 0000431F E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 43446 00004322 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 43447                                  
 43448 00004324 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 43449 00004325 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 43450                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 43451                                  	; 12/12/2022
 43452 00004326 B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 43453 00004328 F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 43454 0000432A 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 43455 0000432B 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 43456 0000432D 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 43457 00004330 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 43458                                  
 43459 00004332 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 43460                                  
 43461 00004333 E830FF                  	call	getchr			;get next digit
 43462 00004336 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 43463 00004338 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 43464 0000433A 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 43465 0000433C 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 43466 0000433E 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 43467 00004340 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 43468 00004342 7417                    	je	short b15
 43469 00004344 2E3A06[AE02]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 43470 00004349 7410                    	je	short b15
 43471 0000434B 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 43472                                  	; 12/12/2022
 43473                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 43474                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 43475                                  	;nop
 43476 0000434D 740C                    	je	short b15
 43477 0000434F 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 43478 00004351 7408                    	je	short b15
 43479 00004353 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 43480 00004355 7404                    	je	short b15
 43481 00004357 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 43482 00004359 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 43483                                  b15:
 43484 0000435B 2EFF06[5603]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 43485 00004360 2EFF0E[5A03]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 43486                                  b1:
 43487 00004365 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 43488 00004367 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 43489 00004369 5B                      	pop	bx
 43490 0000436A C3                      	retn
 43491                                  badnum:
 43492                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 43493                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 43494 0000436B 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 43495                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 43496 0000436D 2EA2[AE02]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 43497 00004371 5B                      	pop	bx
 43498 00004372 F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 43499 00004373 C3                      	retn
 43500

 43502                                  
 43503                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 43504                                  
 43505                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43506                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 43507                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 43508                                  ;	si = 0
 43509                                  ;	ax = country id
 43510                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 43511                                  ;	bx = file handle
 43512                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 43513                                  ;
 43514                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 43515                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 43516                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 43517                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 43518                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43519                                  
 43520                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 43521                                  	; (SYSINIT:4D83h)
 43522                                  
 43523                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 43524                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4FCAh)	
 43525                                  
 43526 00004374 57                      	push	di
 43527 00004375 50                      	push	ax
 43528 00004376 52                      	push	dx
 43529                                  
 43530 00004377 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 43531 00004379 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 43532 0000437B B80002                  	mov	ax,512			;read 512 bytes
 43533 0000437E E84301                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read the file header
 43534 00004381 724A                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 43535                                  
 43536 00004383 06                      	push	es
 43537 00004384 56                      	push	si
 43538                                  
 43539 00004385 0E                      	push	cs
 43540 00004386 07                      	pop	es
 43541                                  
 43542 00004387 BF[D745]                	mov	di,country_file_signature ; db 0FFh,'COUNTRY'
 43543 0000438A B90800                  	mov	cx,8			;length of the signature
 43544 0000438D F3A6                    	repz	cmpsb
 43545                                  
 43546 0000438F 5E                      	pop	si
 43547 00004390 07                      	pop	es
 43548 00004391 753A                    	jnz	short setdosdata_fail 	;signature mismatch
 43549                                  
 43550 00004393 83C612                  	add	si,18			;si -> county info type
 43551 00004396 803C01                  	cmp	byte [si],1		;only accept type 1 (currently only 1 header type)
 43552 00004399 7532                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail 	;cannot proceed. error return
 43553                                  
 43554 0000439B 46                      	inc	si			;si -> file offset
 43555 0000439C 8B14                    	mov	dx,[si]			;get the info file offset.
 43556 0000439E 8B4C02                  	mov	cx,[si+2]
 43557 000043A1 B80018                  	mov	ax,6144			;read 6144 bytes.
 43558 000043A4 E81D01                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read info
 43559 000043A7 7224                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 43560                                  
 43561 000043A9 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the # of country, codepage combination entries
 43562 000043AB 81F9B601                	cmp	cx,438			;cannot handle more than 438 entries.
 43563 000043AF 771C                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 43564                                  
 43565 000043B1 46                      	inc	si
 43566 000043B2 46                      	inc	si			;si -> entry information packet
 43567 000043B3 5A                      	pop	dx			;restore code page id
 43568 000043B4 58                      	pop	ax			;restore country id
 43569 000043B5 5F                      	pop	di
 43570                                  
 43571                                  setdoscntry_find:			;search for desired country_id,codepage_id.
 43572 000043B6 3B4402                  	cmp	ax,[si+2]		;compare country_id
 43573 000043B9 7509                    	jne	short setdoscntry_next
 43574                                  
 43575                                  	;cmp	dx,0			;no user specified code page ?
 43576                                  	;je	short setdoscntry_any_codepage ;then no need to match code page id.
 43577                                  	; 10/09/2023
 43578 000043BB 09D2                    	or	dx,dx ; cmp dx,0
 43579 000043BD 7413                    	jz	short setdoscntry_any_codepage
 43580 000043BF 3B5404                  	cmp	dx,[si+4]		;compare code page id
 43581 000043C2 7411                    	je	short setdoscntry_got_it
 43582                                  
 43583                                  setdoscntry_next:
 43584 000043C4 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;next entry
 43585 000043C6 46                      	inc	si
 43586 000043C7 46                      	inc	si			;take a word for size of entry itself
 43587 000043C8 E2EC                    	loop	setdoscntry_find
 43588                                  
 43589                                  	;mov	cx,-1			;signals that bad country id entered.
 43590                                  	; 10/09/2023
 43591 000043CA 49                      	dec	cx ; 0 -> -1
 43592                                  setdoscntry_fail:
 43593 000043CB F9                      	stc
 43594 000043CC C3                      	retn
 43595                                  
 43596                                  setdosdata_fail:
 43597 000043CD 5E                      	pop	si
 43598 000043CE 59                      	pop	cx
 43599 000043CF 5F                      	pop	di
 43600 000043D0 EBF9                    	jmp	short setdoscntry_fail
 43601                                  
 43602                                  setdoscntry_any_codepage:		;use the code_page_id of the country_id found.
 43603 000043D2 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]
 43604                                  
 43605                                  setdoscntry_got_it:			;found the matching entry
 43606 000043D5 2E8916[DF45]            	mov	[cs:cntrycodepage_id],dx ;save code page id for this country.
 43607 000043DA 8B540A                  	mov	dx,[si+10]		;get the file offset of country data
 43608 000043DD 8B4C0C                  	mov	cx,[si+12]
 43609 000043E0 B80002                  	mov	ax,512 			;read 512 bytes
 43610 000043E3 E8DE00                  	call	readincontrolbuffer
 43611 000043E6 72E3                    	jc	short setdoscntry_fail

 43616

 43618 000043EC 57                      	push	di			;es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info

 43621

 43632

 43636 0000440D F9                      	stc
 43637 0000440E CD21                    	int	21h			;read the country.sys data
 43638 00004410 72BB                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail 	;read failure
 43639                                  
 43640 00004412 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 43641 00004414 75B7                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail ; 13/05/2019
 43642

 43644 00004419 8B4C06                  	mov	cx,[si+6]

 43646 0000441F F9                      	stc

 43648 00004422 72A9                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 43649

 43652 00004428 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]
 43653 0000442A 5E                      	pop	si
 43654 0000442B BA0002                  	mov	dx,512			;start of data buffer
 43655 0000442E 83C10A                  	add	cx,10			;signature + a word for the length itself
 43656 00004431 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read the data from the file.
 43657 00004433 F9                      	stc
 43658 00004434 CD21                    	int	21h
 43659 00004436 7295                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 43660                                  
 43661 00004438 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 43662 0000443A 7591                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail
 43663

 43766                                  getcountrydestination:
 43767                                  
 43768                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43769                                  ;get the destination address in the dos country info table.
 43770                                  ;
 43771                                  ;input: al - data id
 43772                                  ;	es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 43773                                  ;on return:
 43774                                  ;	es:di -> destination address of the matching data id
 43775                                  ;	carry set if no matching data id found in dos.
 43776                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43777                                  
 43778                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 43779                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EB2h)
 43780                                  
 43781                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 43782                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:50F9h)
 43783                                  
 43784 00004499 51                      	push	cx
 43785                                  	;add	di,74
 43786 0000449A 83C74A                  	add	di,country_cdpg_info.ccNumber_of_entries	
 43787                                  					;skip the reserved area, syscodepage etc.
 43788 0000449D 268B0D                  	mov	cx,[es:di]		;get the number of entries
 43789 000044A0 47                      	inc	di

 43836                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43837                                  
 43838                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 43839                                  
 43840                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43841                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 43842                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 43843                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 43844                                  ;
 43845                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 43846                                  ;	 be moved.
 43847                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 43848                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 43849                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 43850                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 43851                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 43852                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 43853                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43854                                  
 43855 000044C4 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 43856 000044C5 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 43857 000044C8 F9                      	stc
 43858 000044C9 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 43859 000044CB 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 43860 000044CC 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 43861                                  
 43862 000044CE 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 43863 000044D0 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 43864 000044D2 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 43865 000044D4 F9                      	stc
 43866 000044D5 CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 43867                                  ricb_exit:
 43868 000044D7 C3                      	retn
 43869

 43871                                  
 43872                                  ;! set_country_path procedure is not called from anywhere !
 43873                                  ; Erdogan Tan - 04/08/2023
 43874                                  %if 0
 43875                                  
 43876                                  set_country_path:
 43877                                  
 43878                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43879                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 43880                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 43881                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 43882                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 43883                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 43884                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 43885                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43886                                  
 43887                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 43888                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EF4h)
 43889                                  
 43890                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 43891                                  	; (Retrodos v5.0 Pre-Works)
 43892                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:513Bh)
 43893                                  
 43894                                  	push	si
 43895                                  
 43896                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 43897                                  	push	es
 43898                                  	pop	ds
 43899                                  	pop	es			;now ds -> confbot, es -> sysinitseg
 43900                                  
 43901                                  	call	chk_drive_letter	;current ds:[si] is a drive letter?
 43902                                  	jc	short scp_default_drv 	;no, use current default drive.
 43903                                  
 43904                                  	mov	al,[si]
 43905                                  	inc	si
 43906                                  	inc	si			;si -> next char after ":"
 43907                                  	jmp	short scp_setdrv
 43908                                  
 43909                                  scp_default_drv:
 43910                                  	mov	ah,19h
 43911                                  	int	21h
 43912                                  	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 43913                                  
 43914                                  scp_setdrv:
 43915                                  	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 43916                                  	mov	di,cntry_path
 43917                                  	mov	al,[si]
 43918                                  	cmp	al, "\"
 43919                                  	je	short scp_root_dir
 43920                                  
 43921                                  	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 43922                                  	;je	short scp_root_dir
 43923                                  	;jmp	short scp_path
 43924                                  	; 04/01/2023
 43925                                  	jne	short scp_path
 43926                                  
 43927                                  scp_root_dir:
 43928                                  	dec	di			;di -> cntry_root
 43929                                  scp_path:
 43930                                  	call	move_asciiz		;copy it
 43931                                  
 43932                                  	mov	di,cntry_drv
 43933                                  scpath_exit:
 43934                                  
 43935                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 43936                                  	push	es
 43937                                  	pop	ds
 43938                                  	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 43939                                  
 43940                                  	pop	si
 43941                                  	retn
 43942                                  
 43943                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 43944                                  
 43945                                  chk_drive_letter:
 43946                                  
 43947                                  ;check if ds:[si] is a drive letter followed by ":".
 43948                                  ;assume that every alpha character is already converted to upper case.
 43949                                  ;carry set if not.
 43950                                  
 43951                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2
 43952                                  
 43953                                  	push	ax
 43954                                  	cmp	byte [si],"A"
 43955                                  	;jb	short cdletter_no
 43956                                  	jb	short cdletter_exit
 43957                                  	cmp	byte [si],"Z"
 43958                                  	ja	short cdletter_no
 43959                                  	cmp	byte [si+1],":"
 43960                                  	;jne	short cdletter_no
 43961                                  	;jmp	short cdletter_exit
 43962                                  	; 04/01/2023
 43963                                  	je	short cdletter_exit
 43964                                  
 43965                                  cdletter_no:
 43966                                  	stc
 43967                                  cdletter_exit:
 43968                                  	pop	ax
 43969                                  	retn
 43970                                  
 43971                                  %endif
 43972

 43979                                  ;assumes there exists a 0.
 43980                                  
 43981                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 43982                                  	; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4F40h)
 43983                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:5187h)
 43984
